Título: Star Wars Jedi Knight: Jedi Academy
Géneros: ['Action', 'Adventure', 'Fighting', 'FPS', 'Mac', 'Multiplayer', 'RPG', 'Sci-fi', 'Third Person', 'Classic', 'Singleplayer', 'Swordplay', 'Moddable', 'Character Customization', 'Shooter', 'First-Person', 'Third-Person Shooter', 'Hack and Slash', 'Female Protagonist', 'Story Rich']
Comentario: Star Wars: Jedi Academy is in my opinion the best Star Wars game out there when it comes to lightsaber control and using the force. The story is also decent, although it has a very obvious twist. The customization of your own lightsaber, and the possibilities to learn different combat styles, use two lightsabers or a double bladed one are amazing. Other weapons like the D11 Blaster also play really well. Another noteworthy thing is the mod support. There are lots of mods out there, the most notable being Movie Battles 2. It adds a fantastic multiplayer, dimensions better than Battlefront 2 (2015), to an already amazing game.

Géneros: ['GeForce Now', 'Action', 'Adventure', 'Fighting', 'Cooperation', 'Indies', 'Multiplayer', 'RPG', 'Strategy', 'Martial Arts', 'PvP', 'Open World', 'PvE', 'Online Co-Op', 'Character Customization', 'Difficult', 'Singleplayer', 'Swordplay', 'MMORPG', 'Massively Multiplayer', 'Atmospheric', 'Souls-like']
Comentario:
Dans l'ensemble le jeu est plutôt bon:

Le style de graphisme et les musiques correspondent bien au jeu, les mécanique de combats sont vraiment pas mal (il faudra quand même un peu de temps pour bien s'approprier la technique lié à votre classe : Esquive - Blocage -Absorption).

Le fait de pouvoir faire plusieurs decks est pratique et utile, idéal si vous comptez faire des builds PVE/PVP, les pouvoirs sont une vraie aide sans pour autant être abusif, la variétés des combos fait qu'on ne tombe jamais sur le même deck concernant les adversaires (que ce soit PVE ou PVP).

Le fait de pouvoir aider ou même former des groupes avec les gens en ligne est plaisant et vous pouvez aussi faire l'inverse en voulant vous battre avec eux.

Même si le PVP est la, il manque malheureusement cruellement de contenu en solo (à voir avec les prochaines mise à jour) et pour les moins patients il est possible que ces personnes se lassent assez vite du jeu.

Je trouve que c'est un jeu qui mixe un jeu Souls (Demon's souls/Dark souls) avec Remember Me mais avec une touche personnel.

E probado el 1 y el 2 pero no los tengo y me gustaria tenerlos al igual que los otros, me a alegrado bastante encontras esta oferta, y estoi deseando que se reponga el stock para poder comprarlo y jugarlos.
Gracias por ponerlo a la venta instant gaming.

Título: Total War: Rome II Enemy At the Gates Edition
Géneros: ['Action', 'Strategy', 'Historical', 'Turn-Based Strategy', 'Grand Strategy', 'Rome', 'Tactical', 'Turn-Based', 'Real Time Tactics', 'RTS', 'Singleplayer', 'Online Co-Op', 'Turn-Based Tactics', 'Moddable', 'Atmospheric', 'Education']
Comentario: I didn't buy Rome 2 at release, because I saw it wasn't even playable, but I have to say CA did a fantastic job with patches, and since Emperor Edition the game is really enjoyable. I have played every Total War since Empire, and it is better than all three of them. The grand campaign is sick because the map, despite a few flaws is awesome, and the units are both well made and balanced, especially with mods like Radious installed. The game is way more complex as well, building cities is actually a quite realistic and fun thing to do, and combat has improved a lot, especially combat AI. The AI is actually clever now, aside from a few bugs here and there, but that and all the combat related issues come from the Warscape engine, that dates back to Empire. The same goes for the lags in large battles like sieges or bridge. All in all a very good total war game!

Título: Watch Dogs 2 - Gold Edition Xbox ONE
Géneros: ['Action', 'Adventure', 'Cooperation', 'Xbox ONE Games', 'Illuminati', 'Hacking', 'Open World', 'Parkour', 'Stealth', 'Third Person', 'Shooter', 'Crime', 'Singleplayer', 'Third-Person Shooter', 'Comedy', 'Sexual Content', 'Mature', 'Atmospheric', 'Cute', 'Gore']
Comentario:
Positiv
Haupt- und Nebenmissionen sind zahlreich.
Onlinemodus super integriert und auch abschaltbar, falls einen die Hackangriffe nerven.
Die Grafik ist auf sehr hohen Einstellungen wirklich beeindruckend, auch nach zig Stunden hält man noch gerne an, um Screenshots zu machen und Fotos zu schießen. Vor allem der San Francisco Nebel sieht toll aus. Die Portierung auf PC ist dieses Mal gelungen.
San Francisco und die ganze Bay Area sind sehr schön dargestellt und die Spielwelt wirkt im Vergleich zu WD1 viel lebendiger.
Durch das eigene Handy samt entsprechenden Apps hat man Zugriff auf Missionsinfos, seine Fotos, Nebenmissionen, usw.
Die Fahrphysik ist im Vergleich zu WD1 um Welten besser.
Im 3D-Drucker hat man eine breite Auswahl an Waffen. Ebenso groß ist die Auswahl an Klamotten und Fahrzeugen.
Tastenbelegung deutlich logischer als noch bei WD1.
Man kann nun endlich auch Fahrzeuge, Kräne, usw. hacken und nutzen.

Negativ
Die Hacker sind alle so Mitte 20, reden aber wie Teenager. Auf Dauer ziemlich nervig.
Die Missionen sind teils sehr repetitiv.
Es gibt keinen Chat, d.h. mit anderen Spielern muss man sich umständlich über Uplay unterhalten.
Einige Bugs sind noch vorhanden. Will man bspw aus einem Fahrzeug aussteigen wenn die Fahrertür blockiert ist, rutscht Marcus (der Protagonist) auf den Beifahrersitz rüber und bleibt dann einfach sitzen.
Die Y- und Z-Taste sind bei mir vertauscht, das lässt sich auch nirgends ändern und liegt nicht an meiner Tastatur.
Spielt man mit DSR (Dynamic Super Resolution) treten manchmal am Bildschirmrand unschöne schmale Streifen auf.
Der Klang mancher Fahrzeuge ist echt fürchterlich.

Fazit
Insgesamt ist Watch Dogs 2 - im Vergleich zu dem ersten Teil - in jeglichen Punkten besser geworden. Die Story ist unterhaltsam, die Nebenmissionen zahlreich, die Spielwelt und Grafik wunderschön und auch der Onlinemodus ist gut implementiert. Eine ganz klare Kaufempfehlung.

Just the best! Ezio and Altaïr are by far the best characters in the franchise, and since AC1 came out, the gameplay has improved a thousand fold! Lots of side missions, optional objectives, challenges, gorgeous outfits and armors, but what takes the cake is the narrative! A journey of vengeance, revelations, and acceptance. Play as Ezio Auditore Da Firenze, from birth to old age, and take the fight to those who took everything from you, and further the strenght and presence of the assassin brotherhood set by Altaïr, the mentor of the creed.
Nothing is true, evrything is permitted.
Don't bother playing the other titles in the "franchise", Assassin's creed at its best, is this trilogy.
A lot of people talk trash about the third opus of the Ezio trilogy, REVELATIONS, but it's my personal favorite, you get to experience the memories of Altaïr unseen in the first game, and his last will for the future, while Ezio, tired of all the fighting of his last 40 years, struggles to see an end to the conflict. Great voice acting, great writing, mind blowing twists and endearing characters, with its fair share of humor!

Amazing game. Awesome acting by Ellen Page and Willem Dafoe. Really good story with a fantastic ending. The graphics are good. Definitely worth playing through again. I'm a huge fan of Willem Dafoe and he is excellent.

Literally nothing - not a single positive point comes in my mind for Battlefield V.
I am not going to explain why the game is one of the worst games ever developed & if you don't get why, please don't talk.
The actual best state of the game was after the release (Edited this review since then).

If you like this game; following things might be the reason:
- You are a casual & just want to play a game (that's totally okay btw)
- You were promoted/paid by EA/DICE to vote their game up (if so, no words for you)
- You started playing the BF franchise with Battlefield V and you have no idea what a good Battlefield is

Friendly reminder if you care about that point - Battlefield V reveal:
"There won't be any microtransactions! Everything can be unlocked trough just playing the game." 
Well, take a look now ;)

Just don't .. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY, NOR YOUR TIME. Why?
Worse than ever before. Just listing a few negative points:
- Lack of optimization 
- Bugs & glitches
- Complete mess called "movement"
- Input delay
- Week for week new unplayable playlists
- no RSP with plugins
- In-game / weapon & vehicle balance 
- Countless cheater 
- Skill trees instead of weapon attachments 
- Level & unlock system
- In-game UI
- Random recoil of guns
- Gunplay in general
+ 5 points down below.
... the list could go on.

@DICE SW / EA - Keep doing what you do: Ignore constructive feedback and you ruin your studio(s) even more then you already do now.

Or instead: Shut down this garbage piece of sh*t and don't ever touch Battlefield again, since you love to ruin great games and or genres anyway.

@DICE LA - Fix this game, PLEASE.

Dropped score from 30 to 10. Would even go lower than 0 if possible.

Think twice before buying Battlefield V.

Géneros: ['Action', 'Adventure', 'Platformer', 'Post-apocalyptic', 'Story Rich', 'Singleplayer', 'Hack and Slash', 'Third Person', 'Action-Adventure', 'Sci-fi', 'Atmospheric', 'Robots', 'Parkour', 'Female Protagonist', '3D Platformer', 'Controller', 'Linear', '3D Vision', 'Open World']
Comentario:
Lo jugué hace un tiempo en Xbox 360 y me pareció fantástico. Es verdad que no es muy largo, pero en mi opinión dura el tiempo que necesita para contarte su historia, que es lineal pero preciosa. 
El apartado artístico es una maravilla (escenarios de un mundo postapocalíptico, donde la naturaleza se ha comido las ciudades) y me parece una pasada el diseño de los personajes. 
Pero realmente lo que más destacaría de este juego son sus mecánicas y jugabilidad. Tiene sistemas de combate diferentes, dinámicos y muy divertidos. Hay escenas y peleas realmente memorables.

Je viens juste de le finir et je suis toute émue. C'est la sortie de Siberia 3 qui m'a intrigué et donné envie de jouer aux deux jeux précédents... et je suis vraiment heureuse d'avoir fait l'effort d'y jouer avant le 3ème !

Sibéria 2 est encore mieux que le 1er (qui, soyons honnête, a vieilli). Il est la suite logique de celui-ci avec certains flashbacks nous rendant nostalgique du premier. Plus récent, Les personnages sont moins lents. J'ai également trouvé les énigmes plus "logiques". 

Les voix sont toujours en VF et toujours bien doublées. (bon certains personnages secondaires font toutefois un peu peur au premier abord -ceux qui y ont joué sauront de qui je parle xD) mais j'ai trouvé ça drôle, au moins il y a de la vie dans les voix, ahah ^^

Les personnages secondaires sont attachants, mention spéciale à Oscar ;)
Les décors sont beaux, et les itinéraires sont logiques (on ne se perd pas ;) )
Côté histoire, nous retrouvons une Kate fidèle à celle que l'on voit à la fin de Siberia 1 : l'aventurière. Notre héroïne, qui a déjà l'incommensurable avantage d'être une femme (parce qu'on en fait peu !) est intelligente, curieuse, drôle, attachante, et n'a pas froid aux yeux ! Son évolution l'enfonce dans un monde inconnu, où personne ne s'aventure... et les cinématiques ponctuent (et accentuent) fortement cette impression de "non retour".

Justement, les cinématiques : elles sont en VO, plus sérieuses, belles, émouvantes, avec des musiques toujours aussi immersives (mention spéciale pour le peuple Youkol).

Bon, je vous laisse lire les POINTS + et les POINTS - parce que mon commentaire est beaucoup trop long x)

Comentario: Frustrating game to play. Enemy AI sometimes just walk into the battle without engaging in a firefight. Other times, my own troops don’t know what to do and run all the way around the block to get into a building that’s right in front..

As someone who beat Just Cause 1 and 2 I can say that the third installment is the best game of the series so far. 

Not only the controls feel much better, the new gadgets like the (Bavarium powered) wingsuit and the retracting tethers alone sell it for me. Out of ammo? Just pull a helicopter into a gas tank and watch it explode. The world design is just amazingly done and beautiful. It is smaller than Panau from Just Cause 2, but also better filled with interesting landmarks and a better variety of things to blow up. Yes the story and characters are as cheesy as they can get. But do you really expect some serious characters with a rich and interesting past to tell you about? This game is just like it's predecessors a playable action movie with a lot of freedom where you can play with your creativity.

But there is a few big downside which are pretty much unnecessary and could've been avoided in making this game. 

downside:+ a few negative points under this text
performance
The performance is sometimes and without tweaking a catastrophe. My PC is high-end and so way over the recommended requirements (i7 7700k, 16GB ram, GTX1070, game installed on SSD) and the FPS sometimes just tank down to ~40 FPS. But that luckily rarely happened in my hours of play time. A simple restart of the game also fixed that for me. 

There is a very helpful guide in the steam guides posted that helps fixing the performance completely. Aside from the framedrops that I mentioned earlier the game ran always at over 60 FPS with all settings on maximum.

Repetetive 
The whole game feels this way, from the stories to the bases to .. everything. They did well giving another look to each base for sure but it does not feel as rewarding as it was in Just Cause 2. 

All in all I would still recommend this game to everyone who likes a good action open world sandbox, even though the setup is annoying. But the fun you will get out of this game is worth taking the 10 minutes to configure it. As long as you don't tab out of the game of course. :p

Rating: 8/10

Géneros: ['Early Access', 'Indies', 'RPG', 'Strategy', 'Tactical RPG', 'Turn-Based Combat', 'Medieval', 'Turn-Based Strategy', 'Open World', 'Sandbox', 'Replay Value', 'Roguelite', 'Procedural Generation', 'Turn-Based', 'Tactical', 'Perma Death', 'Difficult', 'Fantasy', 'Turn-Based Tactics', 'Character Customization', '2D', 'CRPG']
Comentario:
Overview
Battle Brothers is a medieval, turn-based strategy game with management elements. This game is clearly inspired by Mount & Blade, which you can see in the way you go about trading, and travelling around the world map. The key difference from the said game is that Battle Brothers doesn’t have real-time combat, which is instead replaced by the turn-based strategy aspect. This is probably the best way to summarize this game.

Breakdown
Think before you attack
Combat in Battle Brothers has been done incredibly well, and this is coming from someone who is very picky about turn based strategy games! You have a variety of warriors, ranging from your standard archers or swordsman to people with pitchforks. You can arrange your team in various formations which have unique features and provide their own boosts. On top of that, each individual character will level up and develop their own perks. As a result, you will easily get attached to certain characters; especially when the lone survivor from a long drawn battle goes on to level up and fight for you in many successful battles. But you better be careful. Your characters love can be lost forever due to some foolish mistakes. Furthermore, There are many enemies with their own unique mechanics. Some of them even delve into the realm of fantasy. For example, you will encounter zombies who can come back to life and some monsters who will consume the dead to become stronger and you better be weary. 

Finding your golden trade route
One of the things that the game clearly take inspiration from M&B is the way trading is done, as well as the town aspect. Each town has its own kind of economy such as mining, farming, fishing etc. As a result, each town will sell certain goods cheaper and will pay more for certain goods. For example, a farming town will sell you food for cheap, but at the same time, it will pay a hefty sum for a mineral or gem. You will quickly pick up on these things and will look to find your own trade route, which will ensure you get maximum profits in no time!

It looks a bit...unappealing
The aesthetics is the only place I that can give some negative critique to this game. It isn’t the best and will definitely make a few players stay away from the game. However, once you look past the game’s looks and into what the game holds, then you will definitely be pleased with the game.

Are you ready to lose endless hours?
Battle Brothers will do just that. This is the kind of game you will start playing only to look at the clock later to see that you spent the entire day just playing it! That being said, people who don’t enjoy this kind of game will probably not enjoy this one either as it does not reinvent the wheel. However, this is very good in what it does. I wholeheartedly recommend this game. Definitely worth buying!

Reviewer: Dark0wnt UG

Géneros: ['Action', 'Adventure', 'Cooperation', 'Linux', 'Mac', 'Multiplayer', 'Simulation', 'Strategy', 'Wargame', 'World War II', 'RTS', 'Tactical', 'Historical', 'Singleplayer', 'Military', 'Online Co-Op', 'Tanks', 'Real-Time', 'Base Building', 'Real-Time with Pause', 'Atmospheric']
Comentario:
Company of Heroes 2
The gaming industry has become one of the largest industries in the world. Every year multiple games are released in the market, and it wouldn’t be wrong to state that those games earn a massive amount from gamers. A successful match comprises multiple elements including, extraordinary graphics, a good storyline, and well-designed characters.
Well, today, we are here with a review of the second part of the Company of Heroes and we are going to touch this game deeply. While discussing the details of the game, we will also let you know the rating of the Company of Heroes 2. A lot of facts about his game are going to be revealed in this article, so read it carefully to check whether this game meets your expectations or not.

Overview
Relic entertainment develops Company of Heroes 2, and a well-known company, Sega published it. It is a real-time strategy game that comes up with multiple missions, fabulous rounds, and perfectly designed characters, weapons, and other items. The game explains the tragic story of World War 2 in which thousands of people were killed, and Germany had to face a destructive moment. A great environment of war has been introduced in this game in which you have to fight along with your force to save your motherland.

Gameplay
A player has to capture the flagged points placed at the specific spots on the map to collect fuel credits and munitions. These items will be invested in assembling the units. The point can be captured only if the player’s units are inside a zone, and there mustn’t be any unit of the enemy in the same area.
You have to attack the enemy’s unit to capture the whole area, and the items present there. Units can occupy public buildings, and they can use it as their temporary area. You will get an extensive collection of guns, grenades, armors, daggers, and other items in the game. If we talk about the weather condition, it has been shown the blood-freezing cold weather. In the few maps, you will also see the dead bodies of the troops stuck inside the snow.

Requirements and other Important Details
Company of Heroes 2 is designed for multiple platforms and you can enjoy it on Microsoft Windows, macOS, and Linux platforms. It is available in both single-player and multiplayer mode, which means you can enjoy this game with your friends or solo. The company of heroes is not a big game; you can smoothly run it on a computer with a dual-core processor. Other than the processor, a high-quality 256 MB graphic card along with 30 GB free disk space should be available on your PC.

Overall Rating
The evaluation of the Company of Heroes 2 is much impressive. It holds a positive rating from multiple platforms. The leading gaming platform PCWorld has rated this game 3.5 stars out of 5, which means this game has satisfied them, but it also lacks few qualities. If we talk about the average rating of the game, it is about 8/10, which is mind-blowing. Some people have complaints about this game, but the majority of gamers convinced that they have a great experience with the company of heroes 2.

Conclusion
Company of Heroes 2 is one of the best action games. It holds a great storyline of World War 2. Through this game, you will have a good action time. Most of the gamers are confused regarding the features of this game, so in this article, we have explained everything that is related to the Company of Heroes 2. A lot of information has been shared throughout this article.
A separate paragraph is also made in which we have explained the rating of the game.

Comentario:
Très bon jeu, Rogue-like, Hack'n slash, avec une petite durée de vie, cependant uniquement en anglais, ce qui peut être un problème pour certaines personnes.
les graphismes reste dans la moyenne, mais correspondent très bien au jeu.

Prise en main au début qui peut paraître peu évidente au commencement.

Jouabilité plutôt simple, avec manette ou clavier.

Multijoueur disponible, campagne solo faisable avec deux personnes en même temps sûr le même ordinateur.

Malheureusement, beaucoup de DLC, (Personnages, Actes..) sont à acheter, pour quasiment la moitié du prix du jeu pour chaque DLC ce qui revient à dépenser actuellement environs 24 euros pour posséder le jeu en complet.

Gros problème : aucune dimension tactique.
J'avais espéré retrouver un ersatz de mon jeu préféré mission force cyberstorm, malheureusement je me rends compte au bout de 10 missions que le gameplay est très limité : on avance en ligne et on tire sur le premier ennemie en vue et on repète ad nauseum

absolutely amazing game especially with dayz mod, also the multiplayer is rather fun and seems alot more stable than the arma3 servers do to there been more optimization for lower end pc parts but overall i do recommend this to anyone :D

The game is highly recommended for those who like the Vietnam war style games, because the makers very well catch this wars feeling. To do this, add a lot of contemporary music, you can hear in the game, for example near by the Patrol Boats or in the PB tor near by the radios too. Anyway this can be a little confusing. 

The graphics are good and has been used in the Bad Company 2 "almost everything you can shoot things apart" in there too, which can improve the games experience. 

You can choose available weapon by soldier styles (assault, engineer, etc) and not by for team (vietnames, US) so you don't have to change a team if you want to use an AK or vice versa. This is a great progress compared with Battlefield:Vietnam. 

You can choose that you can be in a team, in this case the game select for you three other players, who you can fight with. But, the team speak is not the best I think. 

The biggest problem with the game that you can't throw yourself on the ground, I think. Sometimes it can be very frustrating

great game! alot of cosmetics great story and great missions! loving to play stealth :) i love marcus (the main dude) he has a fitting in the story and the game! (it's good ubisoft made it xD) love ubisoft xD

Sequel della trilogia di Deponia, è un must-have per ogni fan della serie. La storia non è incantevole come nella trilogia ma sempre godibile sotto ogni punto di vista. Il gameplay è uguale a qualsiasi punta e clicca.Il gioco spiega molto anche sulla storia pregressa dell'universo di Deponia. Consigliato ai fan della serie che vogliono vedere ancora una volta Rufus in azione!

Very great and smooth storytelling. The game makes you feel immersed with the relaxing sound of you flying through the air. The story is nice and the game is very great. i loved the game. it was short but worth my time. Thanks

La 4eme extension de se battlefield 3 qui est pour moi la plus réussite de toute. Enfin une extension qui nous plonge dans des combats réaliste, de grande envergures. Les combats nous plonge directement dans une guerre moderne et réaliste. Ce qui est du contenue pour commencer les cartes qui sont très grande et varier avec l'une des plus grande cartes que EA n'ai jamais créer dans la série battlefield.

Ces cartes mon montrer des effets visuels très beaux et des jeux de lumière réussis. Des nouveaux véhicules et armes font leur entrées aussi. 2 nouveaux mode de jeux avec des guerres de tanks qui pour moi est original et sympathique.
Pour se qui est du gameplay je trouve qu'il faut jouer différemment que dans le reste des cartes de battlefield, tout simplement car on se fait attaquer de près comme de loin, du sol et de l'air. Graphiquement rien à redire toujours au top pour mes petits yeux. 

J'en conclue que Dice à encore frappé fort. Alors tout ceux qui veulent du vrai combats de véhicules foncer sur ce DLC.

A nice action game!
The Level up system is very nice, that makes it very addicting to keep playing.
the gore and graphics are very nice. 
With a funny and badass main character makes this game very cool!

Géneros: ['Action', 'Adventure', 'Multiplayer', 'Stealth', 'Tactical', 'Short', 'Singleplayer', 'Third Person', 'Story Rich', 'Cinematic', 'Open World', 'Replay Value', 'Atmospheric', 'Third-Person Shooter', 'Shooter', 'Sandbox', 'Classic', 'Cold War', 'Dark']
Comentario:
If I have bought this game on release date and paid full price i would be pretty disappointed. For this price we actually get pretty good game. Well, more of a big prologue for Phantom Pain. Main mission Ground Zero is maybe 1h long (if you play it for first time and try to do everything) and after that you have few side missions and thats it. 
To understand whole story you need to play MGS3 and Peace Walker or you wont know who Chico or Paz are. 
New voice actor for Big Boss is Kiefer Sutherland and I must say he did good job but David Hayter is only real Snake for me.
Anyway Konami or Kojima should have told us how long this game actully is.
Definitely worth on disscount and I recommend it to every MGS fan.

Comentario: Estamos jugándolo tanto mi pareja como yo. El juego es precioso y hay una cantidad de puzles aceptables. Además hay puzles que se actualizan cada día aunque no tienen una dificultad muy elevada. Funciona perfectamente.

Título: Digimon Story Cyber Sleuth: Complete Edition
Comentario:
Este juego es un gran JRPG dividido en dos juegos pero compartiendo el mismo sistema de combate y algunas cosas más.

¿Has jugado a Digimon y te has encontrado con mecánicas absurdas de tamagotchi? Pues estás de suerte porque no están aquí. 

¿Te gusta Final Fantasy X o Dragon Quest? Pues creo que este juego te puede gustar mucho con sus turnos puros. Grindear los Digimon se parece mucho más a estos juegos que a Pokémon.

Este es un juego muy bueno que te puede aliviar la herida que nos dejó algunos jugadores después de SW/SH y dejarnos con un muy buen sabor de boca.

Descuento: No hay descuento para este juego :(

A dismal, half hearted, amateur attempt to fleece die hard fans of the original. Feels like a pre-alfa of the original game or worse. No discernable world or vehicle physics, graphics bland and feel more at home in 2001. All the world objects look the same and player buildings are indistinguishable from one another. All in all a sad attempt at a classic revival that falls tragically short of adequacyand garners no emotinal attachment from veteran players.

Géneros: ['Multiplayer', 'Strategy', 'Wargame', 'RTS', 'Classic', 'Base Building', "1990's", 'FMV', 'Singleplayer', 'Level Editor', 'Replay Value', 'PvP', 'Remake', 'Soundtrack', 'Cinematic', 'Tanks', 'Isometric', 'Games Workshop', 'Real Time Tactics']
Comentario:
Gameplay: Toujours aussi prenant des années après la sortie de la version originale. Cependant, la difficulté n'est pas très bien réglé, les missions se montrent souvent très difficile en normal, et les escarmouches sont au contraire trop simple en difficulté normal. Par ailleurs, personne ne semble vouloir rejoindre les parties online hébergé. 

Scénario: L'histoire autour du Tibérium ou bien encore autour de Einstein est sympathique, expliqué via une sorte de journal télévisé ou bien encore de message "vidéo présenté", le tout de manière assez décalé ! 

Graphisme: Le lifting opéré n'est pas négligeable, on s'en rend compte facilement grâce à la touche espace (par défaut), permettant de switché entre les graphismes originaux et ceux du remaster. 

Bande-son: Les musiques originales du titre ont également étés remasterisés, et sont toujours d'aussi bonnes qualités. Toujours plus agréable à entendre en tout cas que les "bâtiment terminé" ou autre "unité prête" !

Durée de vie: Il y a de quoi faire entre les missions du NOD, du GDI, des alliés et des soviétiques, les escarmouches, les opérations spéciales, les missions console qui sont disponibles, ainsi que la création de MAP ou bien encore le online… 

N’oublions pas qu’un avis est purement subjectif. Les points que je considèrent comme positifs peuvent être négatifs pour vous et inversement. Par ailleurs, je ne suis qu’un simple passionné et amoureux de jeux vidéo, pardonné donc la « simplicité » de mon écriture. Merci de m’avoir lu !

Título: American Truck Simulator West Coast Bundle
Comentario:
American truck simulator is spinoff of Euro Track Simulator 2, as the name says insted of Europe and EU trucks it is set in America, in California, Arizona and Nevada, map is huge and amazing and has really nice feel of US trucking, If you are new to truck simulations it might prove to be hard at start to control truck but it gets easier later, when it comes to realisam it is very good, if you drive too fast or cross red lights or crash you will get ticket, also you need to refuel your tank over time and if you drive too much you need to make a stop to sleep.
Overall this game is amazing if you love trucks, feel of US trucking while listening to 70s country music, this game is for you!

Endless Legend s'inscrit dans la grande lignée des "Civ Likes". A tel point qu'il en reprend d'ailleurs bien des éléments, associés à ceux de l'univers "Endless" (Endless Space, etc.)

Il s'agit d'un jeu d'exploration, développement, conquête sur des terres inconnues, dans une ambiance Science-Fiction. Le tout sur une carte à cases hexagonales fort colorée, ressemblant d'assez prêt à Civilization Beyond Earth. Le moteur graphique ne fait pas de miracles mais le design des unités est recherché, détaillé. Quant au décor, on note la précision des détails sur les forêts, les montagnes et les ressources.

Niveau gameplay, le jeu reprend donc un mix des mécaniques de Civ et de Endless Space. On retrouve l'implantation et le développement des villes, l'exploration et la gestion des ressources (aménagements sur des cases spécifiques, etc) propres aux jeux du studio Firaxis. Mais on doit également composer avec des éléments spécifiques comme les zones d'influence uniques ou les armées.

Pour faire simple, sachez que la carte est divisée en plusieurs zones géographiques qui reçoivent chacune un nom. Dans chacune de ces zones, une seule ville pourra être construite. Premier arrivé, premier servi donc. Il y aura une logique de rapidité d'expansion si vous souhaitez conquérir la carte dans son ensemble.
Les unités militaires quant à elles doivent être organisées en petites armées qui nécessitent de plus en plus d'entretien à mesure qu'elles grandissent. Elles peuvent être menées par un général. Une fois au combat, l'ensemble des unités se déploie sur la carte et affronte l'armée adverse. Chaque unité est autonome, gérée par l'ordinateur, en fonction des ordres donnés (attaquer, défendre, soigner, etc.). C'est là une des plus grande différence avec Civilization, et cela donne pas mal de profondeur aux combats.

Pour le reste des mécaniques, sachez que le développement va s'axer autour de la Brume, une ressource comparable à l'or ou à l'énergie dans les Civilization. Il faudra la gérer au mieux pour assurer puissance et prospérité à votre royaume.
Le système de diplomatie reprend exactement les mêmes codes qu'Endless Space via un écran spécifique. Attention à l'impacte de vos actions car si les attitudes des adversaires sont plutôt cohérentes, sachez qu'ils sont très rancuniers.
Les factions sont d'ailleurs un des très gros point fort du jeu car elles sont très différentes les unes des autres et vous serez obligés de les jouer très différemment.
De plus, votre partie sera rythmée par une quête principale et des quêtes annexes, vous incitant à choisir entre diverses formes d'expansion.

Comme d'habitude dans ce genre de jeux, la recherche scientifique sera très importante (arbre de technologie très fourni) et permettra de débloquer des avancées militaires ou de développement.
Plusieurs victoires sont possibles : scientifique, militaire, etc.

Un Civ Like très réussi en somme qui fait la jonction entre deux univers. Une très bonne alternative pour ceux qui souhaitent s'éloigner temporairement des jeux Firaxis pour changer un peu d'air.

The game's story itself leaves much to be desired, most players will feel disconnected and un-immersed with the game's story, however it's visuals and depiction of New York is extremely well done, combined with echos (fragments of past events) help create a more better experience. The atmosphere of the game is simply brilliant, but be warned that this platformer is much easier than Limbo and as such doesn't provide a particularly meaty challenge. For those players who struggled in the infernal last part of Limbo, it might actually be a good thing. The puzzles are still quite clever and will sometimes leave you scratching your head. Ultimately, like Limbo, Inside will grow on you despite its WTF ending sequence.

Le but est simple, former votre meilleur équipe et donné leur équipement le plus adapté qui seront gagné au fur et a mesure que vous avancez.
Il y a trois planète a sauvé et un vaisseau a détruire qui confluera votre aventure ainsi que des personnages caché a débloqué, si vous trouvé que le jeu est trop facile, il vous proposera 2 mode de difficulté et qu'en plus de cela vous gagnerais plus de points pour vous achetez des talents bonus.

Overview
Extinction is a Hack and Slash action game with procedurally generated worlds. You play as a hero tasked with saving humanity from...well, extinction! You have to save small pockets of civilization on each map and fight off against the bosses - giants. .

Breakdown
Attack, attack and attack!
Most of the time you will be fighting off against smaller mobs around a small group of people you are trying to save. Once you defeat the enemies in an area, you have to activate a pillar that will ensure that that group of people are saved from the monsters around. Periodically, huge giants will pop up, and you have to fight them. Basically, they are the bosses of each level. But wait, you can’t just go and hack them to death. Each giant will have pieces of armour around its legs, arms, neck, shoulders, and head. You first have to break these pieces of armour, after which you can proceed to take out said body part of the giant. As you slowly do this, you can expose more parts, and once you have exposed enough, you can strike a finishing blow on the giant.

So which map? Oh wait, it doesn’t really matter
There are a few cities you can choose from to play in, but they all are procedurally generated with minor differences. As a result, what might have been an important decision becomes an irrelevant one. This feels like a missed opportunity as they could have made each city, while being randomly generated, have its own features like different types of enemies or additional environmental elements like lava or earthquakes and such. Yet, as they are randomly generated, it does add a bit of replayability to the game which is a good thing.

Remember to fill your damage boost!
One very unique and nice mechanic is that devs have added to this game, is the boost feature. There is a “damage boost” bar next to the minimap, alongside with the health bar. As you kill more mobs and destroy more chunks of armour from the giants, this bar fills up and increases your damage. The game rewards you for playing, and the rewards encourage you to play more at the same time.

Okay, so what else?
Sadly, there isn’t anything else to do in the game which is a big shame, because it is fun to play. The game would be better with a proper progression system or co-op, but the game doesn’t have those features whatsoever.

Should you pick this up?
It’s a tough question. The game does have a bit to offer, but sometimes it feels repetitive, unless you really like melee combat; only then I would definitely say that it is worth it. You can have quite a bit of fun in this game to make it worth picking up. Also, if they add co-op at any point in the future then it would definitely be worth its price tag. In any other case, it is recommended to wait for a big price drop or a deep sale.

Reviewer: Emma UG

Géneros: ['Adventure', 'Action', 'Mac', 'Casual', 'Detective', 'Story Rich', 'Episodic', 'Point & Click', 'Noir', 'Mature', 'Comic Book', 'Choose Your Own Adventure', 'Singleplayer', 'Atmospheric', 'Mystery', 'Dark', 'Cinematic', 'Well-Written', 'Fantasy', 'Quick-Time Events', 'Nudity']
Comentario:
The Wolf Among Us est un jeu d'aventure Point & Click en cinq épisodes, mettant en scène le Bigby Wolf tiré de la série de comic books Fables de Bill Willingham. L'univers de Fable, très coloré, mais tendant de façon très portée vers le violet, le bordeau, est un univers certes fantastique, mais très glauque. Dans tous les plans, dans tous les personnages, dans toutes les situations, transpire le désespoir et la déchéance de ces personnages de contes pour enfant aujourd'hui relégués au simple statut de citoyen pas tout à fait à part entière. Et parmi eux, Bigby, alias Le Grand Méchant Loup, devenu bien entendu le sheriff de cette petite communauté.

La saison 1 de The Wolf Among Us reste un bon moment de jeu vidéo, que je recommande malgré ces quelques défauts sur lesquels je me rends compte que j'ai particulièrement insisté. L'univers mature, la direction artistique, l'ambiance particulièrement marquante des deux premiers épisodes, un scénario sans doute pas inoubliable mais quand même intéressant, et surtout des personnages comme sait les faire TellTale possédant une véritable profondeur et une vraie densité.

Le Loup est parmi nous, et heureusement, car il y a quelquechose de pourri au royaume de Fabletown. Et le pourri, finalement, on aime bien ça.

At first glance, The game appears to be long term coop survival. It isn't! It's short maps where you are instantly attacked by hoards of zombies, And then you won or lost. There are online servers for it, But the game crashes every time i try to join one. The graphics are very pretty and detailed, The zombies however look like cheap cartoon knockoffs. 
Overall, The game play is claustrophobic, Due to the tiny flashlight beam. You search for a power switch or whatever it calls for, Then bam every window and door is full of zombies, And you have to escape. Not realistic at all, And really not any fun at all.
The game could have been so much more, Like an urban H1Z1, But they blew it by doing these short timed games. And went for arcade nonsense instead of reality.
I don't regret paying three dollars for it. But five would have been too much.

Très bon petit jeu d'infiltration avec, certes, un système de combat aux fraises mais qui a le mérite de forcer le joueur à être discret. Ce jeu n'est pas une révolution en soit mais son level design se basant sur des niveaux qui se développent sur plusieurs étages est très intéressant. Son seul gros défaut est le recyclage abusif des niveaux et une IA un peu abrutie, mais nous pouvons lui pardonner.

Comentario: The planets/world feel empty, dark/dull color scheme,starting quests do not feel meaningful, and has a long "boring" prologue. It has its good moments too which includes amazing voice acting, interesting characters and a dark more "mature" feel to it. The combat system is hard to operate. Its an older game but makes up the combat system, and empty worlds with story and characters.

Resident Evil Zero HD Remaster has the look and feel of a modern game, but its real problems started in 2002 and were never solved. It’s a forgettable entry in an outstanding series that just doesn’t measure up because of its story problems, overwhelming inventory management, and horrible predictability. Reanimating this limp corpse of a survival game in high definition only brings back the disappointment I felt when I played it the first time.

Géneros: ['Action', 'Adventure', 'Cooperation', 'Xbox ONE Games', 'Multiplayer', 'RPG', 'Character Customization', 'Open World', 'Singleplayer', 'Choices Matter', 'Story Rich', 'Third Person', 'Fantasy', 'Sexual Content', 'Mature', 'Nudity', 'Action-Adventure', 'Action RPG', 'Female Protagonist', 'Atmospheric', 'Magic', 'Romance', 'Souls-like']
Comentario:
--- A SOLID FANTASY RPG ---

Greedfall (suprisingly fitting name *cough*) did what Bioware and Bethesda failed to deliver the recent years, and delivers a 3rd Person Action RPG with clear focus on its story (which I haven't completed yet though) and good gameplay. 

When creating your character, you can pick 3 from classes (Warrior, Mage and Rogue), each with their own strengths and abilities which can be tweaked as you progress through the game.

The side-quests are very entertaining as well and introduce you to a variety of characters, each with their own background and aims, those are pretty much on Bioware/Piranha Byte-level
The characters are voiced really well (English only though) and the actors made a great job in getting in with their roles, whether they are guards, priests, merchants, or peasants.

Gameplay-wise can do basically everything you'd expect from a 'classic-RPG': talk to all sorts of characters as mentioned, interact with our compatriots (you can shape the relationship to them as well), complete quests and explore dungeons to get that sweet loot, trade, craft, fight (also bosses of course), et cetera.

Now while the game doesn't offer one Open World, we instead travel through several larger environments with some very nice details, although you will often come across replicated assets.
Cities feel like like they have been copy/pasted at times because of this asset-recycling and it really starts to annoy me a little bit by now...
And this is where another negative point kicks in: Graphics.

I wish I had a better way to express it, but at times they really look like the game was made in 2013. Textures aren't that sharp in fact it gets really ugly as you close in, most noticably (I'd say at least,) the floor.

The loading times aren't all that long luckily.
Framerate has been dropping every now and then on release, but got widely fixed with a patch.

Funny DLC for base game. It is better to play a new missions - mainly a missions with killing Hitler - because you are able to XP your character and gather some achievements. I think there should be some more misions - two or more... For me 6/10.

Géneros: ['Action', 'Indies', 'Mac', 'Platformer', 'Pixel Graphics', 'Cyberpunk', 'Story Rich', '2D Platformer', '2D', 'Violent', 'Hack and Slash', 'Difficult', 'Singleplayer', 'Fast-Paced', 'Time Manipulation', 'Gore', 'Retro', 'Ninja', 'Noir', 'Sci-fi']
Comentario:
Katana Zero a été un coup de coeur !
J'ai adoré les Hotline miami pour leur gameplay et l'atmosphère synthwave qui s'en dégage.
Mais ce jeu a une aura bien à lui, qui surprend, tant dans sa forme que son fond.
Le gameplay sait s'inventer et s'utiliser sans ennuyer, voire être modifié par moments, et c'est un pur bonheur que de suivre ce maître épéiste jusqu'à la fin !
Un grand oui, qui me semble un peu trop court, surtout à cause d'une fin assez amère, qui n'en reste pas moins bonne, mais simplement certains personnages passent finalement à la trappe dans ce "dénouement".

Este juego recibió una dura crítica tras la beta, pues con las prisas del tirón comercial se sacó antes de tiempo. Los gráficos no son lo que se esperaba y la ia es muy deficiente. Dicho esto debo decir que por su precio actual no esta mal. Esta traducido y tiene cooperativo para 4 personas.

Los puntos fuentes de este título son el modo coop en la campaña, la subida de nivel del personaje y el sonido. Por un buen precio vale la pena para jugarlo coop,pero la experiencia para un jugador es menos satisfactoria.

Si eres nuevo te dan un código para desbloquear cosas, no nos ha funcionado y además a mi se me borraron los progresos al ponerlo. Respecto a esto la posventa es nula y el juego sigue lleno de bugs tanto tiempo después de salir. 

Creo que este juego puede estar bien para jugar de modo casual o pasar la campaña coop, pero para los fanáticos de la saga que busquen un juego AAA mejor prueben el isolation

An awesome game, the games difficult settings really do make the difference between and easy day out and a nightmare, harder the setting will ad more to the intense atmosphere in the game, as the alien will look in all corners and height levels, all hiding places etc, The other top thing to say is the graphics too, maxed out its just like the films, with all the smoke and lighting all around you with a balanced sense of gameplay, as you get futher into the game, you will get more distraction tools and the weapons to fight the alien with ,and you get more aliens , lots of them sneaky bastards. Overall the game is really action pact with constantly watching over your back, And in this season pass you get a nice prologue to the main aliens game with sigourney weaver herself;s main character and some time maps to do the levels as fast as possile , definately worth the buy and one the best games on the pc.

Título: Wolfenstein II: The New Colossus- Deluxe Edition
Comentario: Without a doubt best action game of 2017. Story is returning to the events after new order and with BJ you will face a nazi army who occupied USA. One of the biggest new cool thing is that you can combine different kind of weapons and shooting of nazzies if always funny mainly in the brutal way like in the game. Story is super funny and there are also a lots of side missions. It will take around 15 hours to finish the game with side missions but it depens mainly on chosen difficulty... 9/10.

Géneros: ['Multiplayer', 'Strategy', 'Cooperation', 'Mac', 'Linux', 'Casual', 'Local Multiplayer', 'Trivia', 'Comedy', 'Funny', 'Party Game', 'Party', 'Board Game', '4 Player Local', 'Local Co-Op']

Comentario:
Having played, and liked, Fallout 3, Fallout New Vegas (with all dlc), also started Fallout 4 but no liked it (lack of "charism", "commun" characters, bad dialogues.. ). I don't understand the bashing of Fallout 76, it has the great immersion of Fallout, with all things which missed before, a deep crafting, all the loots are useful now, the rpg/survival progression is excellent, great quests, PNJ are often "funny", the multi is an awesome addition (aids, trades, fights), the Fallout world is really alive now, with frequent events (rescue a nuclear plant, beat a big monster with other players...). The PVP system is also great, for example, if a high level player attack you, don't reply and the damage will be very low, so you can escape, if he kill you, he's marked as "criminal" and other players could attack him ;) otherwise, you can fight as usual, the good thing is, when a lower level try to catch your "treasure" you can shoot him a bit, to keep the place ;)
If course, it would have been even better with an Obsidian script ;)

Trine macht jedes mal wieder Spaß. Wunderschöne Welten, die wie bekannt sehr farbenreich sind. Es sind wieder einige neue Dinge hinzu gekommen. Wodurch teilweise noch komplexere Puzzle entstehen. Die alle gut gemacht worden sind. Die Gegner sind ok, nicht unbedingt abwechslungsreich. Und es ist kein Spiel mit einer überragenden Story. Aber das ist ok, da das Game eine super Mischung aus Puzzles und Kämpfen bietet. Hauptaugenmerk ist aber die Zusammenarbeit zwischen den drei Helden. Gemeinsam an das Ziel zu kommen.

Es gibt wieder einiges einzusammeln und zu suchen. Es wird auch wieder angezeigt in welchem Level was fehlt, um etwas nachzuholen. Dadurch lassen sich einfach 100 % Errungenschaften erreichen. Die Spielzeit ist auch gut, ich habe ca. 14 Stunden auf normal (wobei es für die Errungenschaften egal ist ob leicht oder normal) gebraucht und 100% erreicht. Im Mehrspieler oder Koop Modus kann man noch mehr Stunden herausholen. Jeder Trine Fan macht bei dem vierten Teil nichts falsch.


"....bis zum nächsten mal"

Crimes and Punishments pourrait être présenté comme le Sherlock Holmes total tant il nous donne l’impression de mener des enquêtes dans la peau du célèbre détective. Que ce soit grâce à la succession d’enquêtes et au nouveau tableau de déduction ou à des éléments plus anecdotiques comme l’armoire de déguisement qui nous permet à loisir de revêtir un costume vert pour visiter les serres ou un complet discret pour passer inaperçu dans les ruelles mal famées de Whitechapel, on ne se sera jamais autant senti habitant du 221b Baker Street. Mais cette force est aussi sa faiblesse, ceux qui aimaient les enquêtes aux ramifications démesurées des précédents auront du mal à retrouver leurs marques... tout comme ceux qui aiment suivre une histoire en étant très guidés. Reste que ce nouvel épisode constitue une très bonne introduction pour ceux qui ne connaissent pas la licence et une tournure intéressante pour les amateurs.

A very good game. Unlike FIFA 13 compared to FIFA 14, there are massive changes which really do affect the overall game-play. The players emotions in-game really do make you feel like you're at the stadium. A really, really good game from EA.

Ne é valsa la pena: gioco emozionante, ti invoglia ad andare avanti, musiche coinvolgenti e fantastiche, grafica abbastanza curata e molto godibile nei dettagli al massimo, tante opportunitá di personalizzazione delle abilitá e delle spade...
Da non conoscente di questa tipologia videoludica, non posso che ritenermi pienamente soddisfatto. Forse costoso, ma durante le sessioni si rimane molto concentrati e il peso del prezzo scompare :)

Le jeu est plutôt sympa, on doit défend son village contre une horde de monstres tout en gérant son or. La difficulté à la fin du jeu est vraiment élevée, si bien que pour terminer une partie en une seule vie, il faut vraiment tout optimiser (déplacements, troupes, tours), ce qui offre du challenge même après plusieurs parties.

Bon avant commencer toute chose le jeu m'a bien surpris.
J'ai regarder des lives des vidéos et je savais que sa allais être un jeu nerveux.
Mais a aucun moment a me faire os d'un coup très surpris faut vraiment des petits réflexe sa fait plaisir.
graphiquement j'ai rien a dire mélange animé futuriste sa me plais malgré ce que les autres pense.
le gameplay comme dit plus haut déjà bien nerveux a voir par la suite.
quelque bug niveau serveur et une IA un peu a l'ouest par moment mais bon.
Honnêtement un bon jeu je ne regrette pas mon achat et je sais qu'on va pouvoir jouer pas mal d'heure dessus et pour les gens qui cherchais un truc qui bouges le voila.

A very simple idea, but very effective

Well for a basegame the Sims 4 offers an absolute bare minimum to start with simlish stories. You cannot compare this with previous Sims like 3 or 2. Even 4 yrs after release the build mode still lacks in huge amount of tools we used to have. The biggest issue l have that somehow the development team is not really able to provide matching sets in all categories. Some color choices are questionable and very limited. If you plan to stick with the basegame only you won't explore the full fun. You will need to buy DLCs to improve the gameplay. Overall l dislike a lot of things how they handled yet it captivates me and am intrigued by my simmies. I hope they will improve even though they started to recolor and adjust certain meshes which get repetitive and EA wants money for that, too but the Sim community provides million of custom content you can add and make this game your own and with DLCs you can add some gameplay. But don't raise your hopes too high as l said you cannot compare it to previous versions if you do you will be dissapointed. I love it despite all downs and l hope for improvements in future.

Good Story! RockStar like! If you like the GTA Games and the Style you will love it too! Its better than the other parts of the series.And today playable on every low end pc. And the graphics are for today still very good!

So my wife played this game (she is new to games) and I did backseat gaming. It was pretty hilarious to watch her get scared and fumble around in the game. 

See our laughter & gameplay: youtube.com/watch?v=IEXJh4narLQ

The game is pretty short (2-3 hours) depending on how fast you can find the items you need for certain areas. I'd recommend this game for those wanting to explore games that include 3D exploration, light puzzle-solving, light-horror, platform, story-rich.

Comentario: As allways, no problems with this website at all, instant delivery and great prices. Nothing to complain about. I've bought 7 games from Instant Gaming and they all have been instant and WORKED. Thanks! :D

Título: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 Collection 1
Comentario:
Superbe DLC, qui est, contrairement à bien d'autres après celui ci, un contenu sérieux et qui redonne une nouvelle dimension à ce modern warfare 3. En effet, dans ce pack sera inclus :

4 magnifiques maps, qui sont selon moi les mieux pensées de toutes celles qui seront proposées par la suite dans les contenus additionnels (il s'agit de libération, piazza, overwatch, et black box). Comme vous le verrez surement, ces maps sont plutôt petites (mis à part black box qui a une taille un peu supérieure aux autres, mais qui reste tout de même vraiment sympa à jouer). On s'amuse donc beaucoup, le fun est omniprésent dans des combats acharnés, surtout en domination (mode de jeu que je vous conseille vivement) !

2 nouvelles Opérations Spéciales, négociateur et black ice, qui sont comme toute opération spéciale, vraiment fun à faire à deux, et qui se révèlent être un véritable défi, surtout si vous souhaitez les faire en vétéran.

Le contenu de ce pack est donc vraiment complet et procure au final de longues heures de jeux renouvelé.
A acheter,donc, absolument si vous comptez jouer en multijoueur.

Título: The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing Complete Pack
Comentario: Juego entretenido para pasar el rato, solo o en multijugador. El juego tienes unas 16h de juego, y es una alternativa a este tipo de juegos estilo diablo, sacred, etc. Por el precio que no esta nada mal, en cuanto a la historia normalita.

The main issue with the game is the performance issues because of the bad optimizing. You get random lag spikes and the fps is usually low. If it starts to rain, your fps is screwed.

Except from this, the game is very recycled. Pretty much all of the game's mechanics have been seen before in other games. The most original thing is the gun customization. However, it is really big. Every weapon can be turned into 3 different weapons and different scopes and other attatchments can be applied. The good part about this is that most of the weapons are useful, but there isn't really a lot of options. 

When it comes to the story it is quite dull. You don't really feel attatched to any of the characters and the missions are pretty standard. Fetch that, defend that, sabotage that, etc. Capturing bases isn't really a challenge, and gets very repetitive. The most awful things is the yellow zones where there are civilians. Here you run around cutting wires and turning on radios to get the peoples support, but you get like 2%-3% for each thing you do and it feels like it takes forever.

The only part about the game that is above decent is the map design. The enviornment looks great and the graphics are decent, but the way the map is built when it comes to things like side alleys and alternative routes, it is pretty bad. Especially in the yellow zones.

The co-op is actually really fun, but currently there are only 6 missions and people don't play 2 or 3 of them, so that gets boring pretty fast.

All in all, this game is not worth getting unless you're a real fan of it. It can be fun for a little while, but most likely you will get bored quite fast.

Voy a ser muy sincero con este juego, graficamente es muy bueno,(algunos diseños de naves son copiados del BTF2), la época del juego esta chula(Imperio y nueva republica)pero imagense jugar con clones contra los separatistas.... la personalizacion de personajes es... PENOSA(literalmente te puedes hacer un chino con tetas y voz de tia) no deja hacerte a ti mismo(put0s temas politicos xd), la optimización es brutal, los controles son algo raros pero con unas cuantas partidas te haces a ellos.

Conclusion: No esta mal, es mejorable pero yo disfruto jugando, dicen que no le harán updates de contenido y eso es algo.. malo, pero por eso vale 32 euros

Título: Total War Saga: TROY Limited Edition
Comentario:
Gameplay: pour faire simple, il s'agit pour moi du Total War qui propose le moins de contenu et de diversité. Certe cet opus est à prendre comme un "à côté", mais de là à avoir si peux de plaisir en bataille, c'est bien rare de mon côté pour un jeu de cette franchise… Autre point important à noter; On ne gère pas ici qu'une, mais cinq ressources afin de pouvoir développer son armée et ça faction. Malheureusement cela rend le titre moins jouissif et nettement plus (voir trop) contraignant. D'ailleurs, l'IA a tendance à proposer des échanges de ressources trop désavantageuse pour le joueur, preuve que ce surplus de ressource est mal géré... Pour en finir avec le gameplay, les guerres éclates anarchiquement de tout les côtés, rendant l'expérience punitive.

Direction artistique: La MAP de campagne est de toute beauté, et que dire des champs de bataille pleinement réussi. Les graphismes sont d'une manière générale affinés pour cet épisode de Total War. 

Scénario: Difficile de parler de scénario à proprement parler dans un Total War, bien qu'ici il faille protéger ou récupérer la belle Hélène de Troy. 

Durée de vie: Moins importante puisque bien moins colossale en contenu qu'un Warhammer 2, qui reste pour moi le meilleur jeu de la franchise actuellement. Pour autant, il y a déjà de quoi faire pour un bon moment à condition de ne pas être trop déçu et lassé (comme je l'ai été) du cruel manque de diversité dans les unités et des factions.

Just some friendly advice.

Título: Escape from Tarkov: Left Behind Edition (Beta)
Comentario:
Need a Hardcore first personal shooter game to play ? You found it. Escape From Tarkov isn't just a normal game it's a simulator that tries to bring something similar to a real life shooting mission to the players. It's still in Beta, sure, but it already has so much content. Some people who purchased this game started crying and raging because they where killed instantly at the beginning of the match after 5 minutes or less. "Invisible people killed me" those are just other players that probably where far away shooting with a sniper. A lot of people come and are like "Oh this game looks like call of duty" this is where they are wrong. You may be a pro in call of duty but in tarkov you are going to get killed easily. 
The game is really interesting, there are many cool stuff like:

-Drinking and Eating: Yeah this is important because after some time your character is gonna get dehydrated or hungry which makes the whole surviving harder. There are cool animations when the player eats or drinks, bringing more realism to the game.

-Armor: This is a really important factor during the gameplay, in fact if you get into a raid with bad armor or without you have a higher chance of getting killed. Helmets help a lot too but it always depends on what gun was used against you and which kind of bullet. So Based on that a face shiled, for example, could save your life or not.

-Bullets: There are so many bullets in this game than in all the others mixed together and there is an important reason. Basic ammo are usually for beginners or for those who don't want to spend much ingame currency on them. The basic ones sure don't do much damage and a well geared enemy may survive many shots before dying but they are effective versus bots some times. If you instead want to easily kill someone tho you may use penetrating bullets which are the ebst choice for players that want to kill easier their enemies.

-Grenades, Flashbangs and smokes:
Nice and cool animation, the flashbang works properly, some times blinding softly, you can see a flash spot but also the surroundings, and other times hardly, you see the flash spot and nothing else around. The smokes are realisticly looking but there is a - the particles of smoke get through textures smoking parts of a building for example a room close to another where there should not be any smoke. About normal grenades, what to say, they are deadly.

These are some of the many good points of the game. Considering this game is still in Beta and it's not the final product it deserves a 100 vote.

Redout is the go-to right now for an AV Racing fan, it has everything you would expect from a quality AV Racing Game. There are currently better AV Racing games out there under development however as of right now you should grab this one and play if you havent already.
If you do not know what AV Racing games are, they are basically anti-gravity racing games where you control a spaceship and have to be very careful about the physics, you have to constantly keep your ship balanced and not touch the outer edges of the track as well as pay attention because the opponents can literally make you go crushing on walls or with each other, the fun part of these games is also the insane speeds and the insane variety in tracks and how they look.
Definitely recommended for this price.

Géneros: ['Adventure', 'Management', 'Simulation', 'Strategy', 'Mac', 'Linux', 'Indies', 'Dystopian', 'Choices Matter', 'Political Sim', 'Story Rich', 'Singleplayer', 'Atmospheric', 'Political', 'Multiple Endings', 'Dark', 'Addictive', 'Point & Click', 'Politics', '2D', 'Lore-Rich', 'Violent', 'Psychological Horror']
Comentario:
Ein Spiel was viel zu wenig Beachtung bekommt meiner Meinung nach.

Ihr Schlüpft in die Rolle eines Sohnes dessen Vater ermordet wird, dies gilt es Aufzuklären. Das ist aber nicht so einfach euer Vater war ein Hohes Tier in einer Stadt die nicht ganz Koscher ist wie sie eigentlich aussieht. ER arbeitete für das Hiesige Ministerium und war ein leitender Angestellter.

Ihr müsst nun um überhaupt dort Nachforschungen anstellen zu können euch erstmal nach oben Arbeiten, ein Polizist der Geheimdienstes hilft euch dabei, allerdings nur in Form von Ratschlägen.

Man kommt hier ziemlich schnell in einen innerlichen Konflikt, denn ihr müsst Personen aus den Weg räumen die eigentlich ganz nett sind. Aber ihr müsst aufsteigen so sind eure Wege sehr sehr begrenzt. 

Von mir hier eine Kaufempfehlung, den das Spiel ist mega gut gemacht.

Géneros: ['Action', 'Adventure', 'Indies', 'Hack and Slash', 'Singleplayer', 'Surreal', 'Character Action Game', 'Stylized', 'Gore', 'Spectacle fighter', 'Third Person', 'Atmospheric', 'Swordplay', 'Comedy', 'Story Rich', 'Dating Sim', 'Cyberpunk', 'Controller', 'Sexual Content']
Comentario:
Bim ! bam ! boum ! t'es mort !

Killer is Dead est un beat'em all très dynamique mais peu exigeant dans son gameplay. Le nombre de coups spéciaux est relativement faible, et les stratégies à adopter contre chaque ennemi sont peu élaborées. Toutefois, parcourir le jeu pour massacrer du monstre se montre prenant, notamment grâce à l’agressivité des animations. Les boss sont dans l'ensemble mémorables, parfois même magiques ; qu'ils soient complètement fous (Tommy, le train russe qui prend vie) ou plus sérieux (David, le grand méchant du jeu), on prend un malin plaisir à les démembrer et à leur taillader tous les trous tant leur chara-design est réussi. Les difficultés sont bien dosées, et on vous propose pas mal de quêtes alternatives, bien qu'elles soient généralement ennuyantes. Parce que Killer is Dead est japonais, on peut aussi draguer des femmes et même mater leurs sous-vêtements. Sans grand intérêt et pas franchement rigolo, ce mode gigolo n'est là que pour la rigolade (ou si on est un gros cochon). Malheureusement, le jeu souffre d'un énorme problème : son level-design. Catastrophique, vous avancez dans de longs couloirs pas toujours très inspirés dans leur design. On aurait aimé un peu plus d'exploration, plus d'âme. La durée de vie du titre est assez courte : dix heures en ligne droite environs. Heureusement, Killer is Dead dispose d'une bonne rejouabilité.

C'est l'histoire d'un mec qui part sur la Lune, armé d'un katana, pour tuer des humains contrôlés par des monstres et puis...

Visuellement Killer is Dead casse des visages, à n'en pas douter. Que ce soit la direction artistique, proche d'une BD très noire ou encore l'ambiance sombre posée par le scénario. Suda51 oblige, Killer is Dead nous gratifie d'une touche d'humour typiquement nipponne et de scènes complètement déjantées. Surprenant et amusant, le scénario du jeu rame néanmoins sévèrement. Les premières heures excellentes et pleines de mystères laissent présager un bon polar sur fond de fantastique. Puis, au fur et à mesure des chapitres, on s'en éloigne loin, très loin... jusqu'à se perdre complètement. Les personnages secondaires ne sont pas travaillés, les missions s'enchaînent et les clients que l'on sert n'ont aucun impact dans le déroulement de l'histoire. La fin, très ouverte, est sympathique mais laisse un arrière-goût de bâclage et d'inachevé. On ne comprends pas vraiment ce que l'auteur a voulu nous raconter, nous faire ressentir à travers son œuvre. Trop d'éparpillement, pas assez de profondeur, ne serait-ce que dans l'univers dans lequel le joueur évolue. Reste que l'expérience est dépaysante. Quant à la bande-son, elle est également très réussie.

Conclusion

Saisissant dans son ambiance et son style visuel, Killer is Dead se montre également assez marrant à parcourir. Avec sa bande-son aux petits oignons et des décors sacrément chouettes (la maison d'Alice ou la palais sur la Lune), des boss super cool et un gameplay peu complexe mais agressif, on pourrait s'attendre à un jeu presque parfait. Malheureusement, c'est au niveau technique que le jeu pêche : une caméra pas toujours agréable, des missions alternatives et le mode gigolo loin d'être funs, un level-design à l'ouest et un scénario qui ne va pas jusqu'au bout des choses, le titre de Suda51 est à réserver à ses fans, à ceux qui manquent (vraiment) cruellement d'un beat'em all ou qui veulent se plonger dans un délire qui ne laissera personne insensible. 6 sur 10.

Título: Far Cry 5 Gold Edition Xbox ONE
Géneros: ['Action', 'Adventure', 'FPS', 'Xbox ONE Games', 'Multiplayer', 'Open World', 'Shooter', 'First-Person', 'Singleplayer', 'America', 'Survival', 'Stealth', 'Hunting', 'Story Rich', 'Exploration', 'Atmospheric', 'Character Customization', 'Sexual Content', 'Nudity']
Comentario:
Far Cry 5 ist ein solides Spiel und durchaus spassig, allerdings wenig innovativ. DIe KI ist grottenschlecht, die Waffen kennt man irgendwie alle schon, die Gegnervielfalt hält sich stark in Grenzen (dauernd die gleichen Fratzen und Frisuren), die Story hätte mehr Potential und es wiederholen sich einige Elemente einfach zu oft.
Wer alle Far Cry über Teil 3 bis Primal gespielt hat läuft Gefahr hier enttäuscht zu werden, denn wirklich übertrumpfen kann der 5. Teil in meinen Augen höchstens Primal und eventuell noch Teil 4, wenn einem das Montana-Setting mehr liegt. 
Auch die Charaktere denen man begegnet konnten mich nicht so richtig begeistern. Den "Bösewicht" finde ich garnicht so schlecht wie er von manchen Leuten gemacht wird, aber die Begegnungen mit NPCs auf der Karte sind dann doch eher mau. Da sind mir wenige im Gedächntis geblieben, wirklich interessante Begegnungen waren das größtenteils nicht.

Zum für mich Positiven: Ich hatte trotzdem Spass in den Wäldern mein Unwesen zu treiben, Stützpunkte in die Luft zu jagen und zahllose Peggies mit meiner Smilie-Schaufel ins Jenseits zu prügeln. Die Karte ansich hat mir auch gefallen, ich mag Wälder. Kann aber verstehen, wenn es für manche eventuell etwas monoton anmutet. Die Grafik finde ich, für einen Open-World-Titel, auch in Ordnung. Klar ginge da mehr, aber so läuft das Spiel auch auf Mittelklasserechnern in 1080p solide. Ich würde mir zwar wünschen das man ENDLICH zu einer komplett neuen Engine wechselt, aber von der Atmosphäre her war ich trotzdem zufrieden. 

Die Mikrotransaktionen jucken überhaupt nicht, kein Grund auf diese näher einzugehen. 

Arcade habe ich mir noch nicht genauer angeschaut, Potential wäre vorhanden...hier kommt es aber auf die Community an ob das letztendes vom Erfolg gekrönt sein wird. Kann jetzt noch keiner was zu sagen.

Fazit: Shooterfans können sich das Spiel anschauen, Leute denen Far Cry 4 schon wie ein Aufguß vorkam, werden hier wahrscheinlich auch nicht glücklich. Ausnahmen bestätigen die Regel

Título: Call of Duty: Ghosts Gold Edition
Comentario:
Meaningless campaign, entertaining multiplayer and few innovations. 
Call of Duty: Ghosts is here and is really in the ordinary Call of Duty-fashion.

"So we can't change too many of the core rules, and the core rules are really simple. You're a player, it's in first-person, you have a weapon in your hand and you run around shooting other people." 

The words above come from Infinity Wards executive producer Mark Rubin and is about the Call of Duty series. He draws a parallel between the incredibly popular game series and football, and says that if one of the sport's suddenly decided to only have seven players on the pitch and that you also get to use your hands, the people would loose interest and stop attending matches.
This conservative philosophy exist for the huge crowd of fans of the series who will recognize it and not get lost in strange novelties. 
And it has left a distinct mark on the new addition to Call of Duty: Ghosts, as in every way, this is exactly what one would expect of a new game in the series.

The campaign begins in an idyllic American place where you sit and talk with your father and brother.
In ordinary Call of Duty-fashion, there are not many minutes before the first explosion color the sky red and the everything falls into chaos. 
Bombs are slamming into the right and left, buildings destroyed before your eyes and you have to survive at any cost.
It starts out pretty good with a premise that arouses interest. 
The South American Federation takes control of the weapon Odin and kills millions of American citizens with bombs. When they have the upper hand they invade the injured shot nation that relies on it feared special dressing Ghosts to turn things around and win the war against all odds.

The campaign is just as exciting and intense as one would expect, with so many explosions that you almost get a nice tan in front of the screen. In a never-ending stream of scenes, we take us through runaway trains, drive a snowmobile across frozen lakes, deep dive among sharks and visit the vacuum of space while we are shooting thousands of opponents to death.
But unfortunately, while the campaign is very full of action, it's completely brain dead. 
Some scenes are so stupid that I just laugh out straight. Clichés succeed each other and to say the least incredible sequence of events is explained with intrigue that could have been written by monkeys at the zoo. 
Or how about a good guy transformed into a vicious sadist who's fed with crops from the South American 

And we have it here with the Call of Duty dog. Infinity Ward assured that we would care about this mutt that comes with along the way, but that is not the case, and the question is rather if they tried to achieve that goal at all. My dog is acting in a fairly useless in a Supporting Role as quickly wasted and then fall in total oblivion. Infinity Ward know their explosions and "follow the leader with Weapons" torques, but to tell a believable and interesting story, they really can't.
Fortunately, the multiplayer is still the series' strengths and savior. For the most part, I'm having a lot of fun with the various play modes. My favourite mode is "hunted" - a situation where one armed with a pistol at the beginning of the round and then must collect crates to get access to better firepower. Free for all on the game's smallest maps are wonderfully chaotic with the perfect balance between chance and skill.

For me, standing just outside the core group who love the series for what it is, it becomes problematic with few functioning news. Should not a giant company, Activision, with all the money resounding success of Call of Duty draws in, deliver something bigger? Something that makes me lose my breath as nails sticking controller in my hands and pushing me to defy feelings of fatigue and hunger?
There are probably things you don't have time for when a new game is to be replaced every year - then it might just be more of the same. 
Which in the case of Call of Duty: Ghosts works very well because its heart-racing action as the series' hallmark still stands up so well in the competition and delivers an entertaining multiplayer experience.

The question is: How long does it?

As someone who beat Just Cause 1 and 2 I can say that the third installment is the best game of the series so far. 

Not only the controls feel much better, the new gadgets like the (Bavarium powered) wingsuit and the retracting tethers alone sell it for me. Out of ammo? Just pull a helicopter into a gas tank and watch it explode. The world design is just amazingly done and beautiful. It is smaller than Panau from Just Cause 2, but also better filled with interesting landmarks and a better variety of things to blow up. Yes the story and characters are as cheesy as they can get. But do you really expect some serious characters with a rich and interesting past to tell you about? This game is just like it's predecessors a playable action movie with a lot of freedom where you can play with your creativity.

But there is a few big downside which are pretty much unnecessary and could've been avoided in making this game. 

downside:+ a few negative points under this text
performance
The performance is sometimes and without tweaking a catastrophe. My PC is high-end and so way over the recommended requirements (i7 7700k, 16GB ram, GTX1070, game installed on SSD) and the FPS sometimes just tank down to ~40 FPS. But that luckily rarely happened in my hours of play time. A simple restart of the game also fixed that for me. 

There is a very helpful guide in the steam guides posted that helps fixing the performance completely. Aside from the framedrops that I mentioned earlier the game ran always at over 60 FPS with all settings on maximum.

Repetetive 
The whole game feels this way, from the stories to the bases to .. everything. They did well giving another look to each base for sure but it does not feel as rewarding as it was in Just Cause 2. 

All in all I would still recommend this game to everyone who likes a good action open world sandbox, even though the setup is annoying. But the fun you will get out of this game is worth taking the 10 minutes to configure it. As long as you don't tab out of the game of course. :p

Rating: 8/10

What an amazing adventure! The world is superb, the characters are all fun and well crafted, the story keeps your interest, the soundtrack is just sooo good! Gameplay wise it's straight forward and if you played Xeno 2 you will feel at home. I would say it's even easier to comprehend. I just can't stop playing it. Exploration, tons of sidequests, gorgeous vistas and a plethora or creatures to discover and defeat. This RPG is a masterpiece!
