Comentario:
D'habitude, je lis les commentaires des autres, mais pour AWAY, j'ai envie de laisser un vrai ressenti.
Je suis un Gamer qui aiment les jeux inédit et originaux mais avec la notion du héros qui se pointe et règle un problème de dingue. Donc pour ce jeu, je l'ai analysé avant de l'acheter, car je voulais savoir ce qu'il avait dans le game.

Pour ceux qui veulent une réponse très rapide et générale : c'est un bon petit jeu qui va vous changer les idées.
Il s'agit d'un FPS qui cache un aspect lien d'amitié et question-réponse assez marrant avec les personnages jouables qu'il faut convaincre et avoir dans sa petite équipe.
C'est un petit jeu mélangeant FPS, Run, gestion de vie des perso et des capacités.

Pour les plus courageux, qui veulent en savoir plus sans spoiler :
Le thème est très actuel : famille, écologique, complot intergalactique.
Les liens entre les persos dans ce jeu sont importants et utile pour certains moments de l'histoire.
Niveau graphisme, c'est un genre proche des animés, du coup cela change des graphismes recherchant à tout prix, le virtuel et le réalisme à tout prix, c'est une bouffée d'oxygène.
C'est un petit jeu simple et sympa qui permet de penser différemment pour les phases combats : il ne faut pas être bourrin mais réfléchir par de la stratégie et de l'action.
Niveau stage : ils sont répartis en secteur les plus populaires d'une planète : désert, glace, foret, tropical, et les donjons ou souterrains qui sont créés aléatoirement suivant votre arrivée. (rien de compliqué)
Ce jeu est sympa à parcourir pour réaliser un 100 %, moi en presque 8 h, j'ai développé 75 % du jeu tranquillement.

En définitif, AWAY mérite d'être plus développé en termes de niveau et de pousser le concept du héros n'ayant aucun pouvoir sans ses amis, plus loin. Cependant, la simplicité de ce jeu peut déplaire, par son graphisme ou par des joueurs n'ayant pas compris le concept de ce jeu, qui je le rappelle n'a pas beaucoup de jeu qui ont emprunté cette vision du partage de capacité (on pourrait penser à Pokémon, mais AWAY reste un FPS et on est loin de la gestion des évolutions des compétences)
Dans l'histoire d'AWAY, on doit juste se faire des amis et pas forcément chercher le combat à tous moments.

Voilà, j'ai bien aimé ce jeu même s’il est simple, petite durée de gaming, pas dans l'extraordinaire mais assez fun pour passer un bon moment.
Je demande au développeur de nous créer un second AWAY avec plus d'histoires, de défis originaux et plus de personnages jouables. L'idée principale est à garder : sans l'amitié tout chemin reste compliqué.

Comentario:
Il gioco è a mio parere bellissimo: storia avvincente e ben fatta, filmati molto curati sia nei dialoghi che nelle espressioni, le musiche scelte che lasciano immedesimare negli anni 70. La trama principale è distribuita in tante storie varie, forse le missioni secondarie sono un pò ripetitive, ma è un problema superfluo.
il grande problema che ho riscontrato però e che ho anche letto in giro sulla rete è che è presente in questa versione (non so nelle altre) un abbassamento delle prestazioni grafiche (le texture sono di qualità ridotta) e qua e là difetti di gioco, impedendo ovviamente di gustarlo a pieno. Un vero peccato perché è un piccolo capolavoro a mio parere.

ALa première chose qui nous surprend lorsqu’on joue à Trüberbrook, c’est ses graphismes particuliers. En effet, contrairement aux jeux actuels quasi exclusivement réalisés en 3D temps réel, le jeu de btf mêle habilement décors fabriqués à la main et personnages en 3D.
Les paysages miniatures sont peints à la main, éclairés de différentes façons pour simuler différentes heures de la journée et même redécorés pour imiter différentes saisons, un travail impressionnant à la hauteur de films d’animations comme Wallace et Gromit, Chicken Run. Une fois terminés, les décors sont digitalisés à l’aide d’une technique appelée photogrammétrie, et mélangés avec les personnages et des effets visuels. vant de commencer à jouer à Trüberbrook, je n’avais aucune idée de l’aventure palpitante que j’allais vivre à travers ce point-and-click. J’étais très attiré par le rendu graphique et par ce type de jeu auquel je ne m’étais plus essayé depuis Monkey Island et Grim Fandango, mais je ne m’attendais pas à être autant envouté par ce scénario montant crescendo jusqu’à une conclusion épique.
J’ai terminé le jeu en environ sept heures ayant eu quelques difficultés sur certaines énigmes et malgré quelques petits soucis de maniabilité minimes au stick, Trüberbrook est une vraie belle réussite.

Comentario:
This is the best Geometry Wars series made by the same people from Bizzare Creation but under a different name Lucid Games.

Geometry Wars 2 was never released for PC but Geometry Wars 3 made up for it with great gameplay.

Un bon Tower Defense avec un scénario.

Graphiquement joli (qu'on se comprenne bien là-dessus, le jeu est beau mais demande de la puissance. Il ne paie pas de mine parce que c'est un TD, mais le level design des cartes n'a pas vieilli, encore faut-il pouvoir le faire tourner. L'ayant testé avec une gtx950M sur portable et une gtx 1070 sur pc, j'affirme que le jeu ne tourne pas du tout de la même manière sur ces deux supports...), des niveaux de difficultés bien optimisés, un armement bien dosé et voilà, on ne demandera qu'une seule chose, une suite !

Rappelons que c'est un TD, donc toutes les parties se ressemblent un peu, comme Sanctum, mais la stratégie mise en place change à chaque niveau. 

C'est du bon taff.

Un juego carismático tanto por su estética, su increíble banda sonora, la profundidad de su historia y la complejidad de sus personajes únicos que aunque sean solo un par de pixeles se sienten reales y para nada ficticios, que mas puedo añadir? ¡El mejor Juego de 2015! sin ninguna duda, no es perfecto, pero es indiscutible su calidad y el amor realizado en este juego, Una Verdadera Obra Maestra ya no solo de su propio genero (si es que se puede considerar un RPG), sino en global como un clásico moderno que sigue siendo precioso como el primer día, su compra es obligatoria para cualquier persona amante de los videojuegos.

Título: Sakuna: Of Rice and Ruin Switch
Descuento: No hay descuento para este juego :(
No hay descuento para este juego :(
No hay descuento para este juego :(
Comentario:
El remake de Seiken Densetsu 3 es artísticamente precioso, eso salta a la vista. Su otro punto positivo más destacable es su jugabilidad a la hora de combatir, que en sus primeras horas es bastante ágil y divertido pese a su sencillez.
En lo referente a la historia, desde luego es un JRPG clásico, de los que utilizaban la trama como una excusa para justificar el juego en si. En este caso, la historia es un trámite para ambientar la aventura con su entretenido sistema de combate y el bonito apartado visual que ofrece el juego. No se toma muy en serio a si misma, y cuenta con elementos muy caricaturizados. No esperes giros argumentales, lógica o coherencia en demasía. Aun así, mantiene cierto encanto de fantasía.

En contraparte, la repetición de modelos ya en las primeras horas es muy obvia. Quita un poco de inmersión en una historia que empieza con tirones de guión y escenas representadas con poco acierto. Algo forzadas las tramas de los prólogos de algún que otro personaje, especialmente la de Lise/Riesz que incluso incomoda. Pero no eclipsa sus puntos positivos, la verdad.

Comentario: Un juego adictivo, a la par de divertido. Un roguelike pero con su propio rollo en temática. Música, escenarios, personajes, etc. Jugabilidad sencilla y divertida, ya que a medida que avances conseguirás mejoras que estas irán a otros botones y cada vez tienes más y más. Si te gusta matar muchos bichos y el rollo de los años ochenta cómpralo, vale la pena. Puede llegar a ser repetitivo, pero tras infinidad de horas jugadas, no es mi caso.

Título: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt - Complete Edition Switch
Descuento: No hay descuento para este juego :(
Géneros: ['Action', 'Adventure', 'Games for Switch', 'RPG', 'Open World', 'Story Rich', 'Atmospheric', 'Mature', 'Fantasy', 'Singleplayer', 'Choices Matter', 'Masterpiece', 'Nudity', 'Third Person', 'Medieval', 'Multiple Endings', 'Action RPG', 'Dark Fantasy', 'Magic', 'Dark']
Comentario:
The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt is the final chapter in the saga of Geralt of Rivia. It is an action-adventure, open world RPG by the renowned Polish studio CD Projekt Red. As you may have guessed by now, you play as a Witcher, a monster hunter capable of superhuman strength and reflexes having undergone mutations. Our protagonist Geralt is on a journey to find his adopted daughter Ciri, who has been missing for years. He must reach her before the Wild Hunt, a group of ethereal warriors trying to find her for her secret powers. Geralt is aided by a wide cast of friends and acquaintances including Yennefer and Triss, his lovers at points in life, Dandelion and Zoltan. The game has adult themes and requires a certain level of maturity to truly appreciate the intricately woven stories.

The game has many positives that it would be impossible to list them all but I shall try to shortlist the most remarkable ones. To start off, the game is set in a gorgeous world, that you are free to explore, that feels truly alive. From the icy mountains of Ard Skellige to the marshes of Velgen to the City of Novigrad, the different areas in the game have a distinct feel with their own culture and atmosphere. The devs have shown a lot of attention to the tiniest of details to make the world feel real. If you block a pedestrian’s way for too long; they get annoyed. It starts raining, and you see people run for some cover. You can even hear people sneezing and someone else shouting “bless you” at them. There are also tons of easter eggs for you to find in this massive world. You can find a prison akin to the one that contained Tyrion Lannister in the Game of Thrones series. Fan of Doctor Who? Well, you can find the Weeping Angels statues in the game, where they actually move each time you turn around! As for graphical fidelity, even 3 years after release, the game looks as good, if not better, than most AAA games that came out this year. Now that’s everything about the eye candies in the game. 

What can you actually do in the world? Well, A LOT! There are several quests, both main story and side quest. The care taken to craft even smallest of the side quests can be felt. You may even end up confusing side quests with main quests due to their depth and how some of them tie up with the main story. Each quest will give you several ways to tackle them and can even have several endings. which may end up impacting the final ending as well. You can also take up witcher contracts from notice boards to slay different kinds of monsters plaguing the villagers. And if you ever feel tired from the adventures, you can just roam around the game world challenging bar owners and shopkeepers to a game of Gwent, a card game that is now a standalone game of its own. If you take your time and try to finish as many quests as possible, then you will easily have 100+ hours of content in front of you. Even if you choose to rush through the game, you will have 50+hours to enjoy here. The skill tree also allows for different playstyles, depending on which skills you decide to buy and equip. You can invest your points into combat, magic or alchemy, with each offering a slightly different playstyle. These skills can further be enhanced by various mutagens. In the Blood and Wine expansion, you can also develop mutations that grant you further customization options. All in all, the variety of quests and skills allow you to play through the game differently giving it a fair degree of replayability. 

So what about the negatives? Well there aren’t many, and the few ones that I have are just nitpicks. The one that comes to mind is that the combat, along with movement, feels a bit clunky and lacking. You can tap the move key and Geralt will sort of lunge forward 3-5 step. This just feels heavy and not at all smooth, unlike the rest of the game. You can even get stuck because of smallest of bumps since you can’t jump during combat. This becomes a problem when fighting in closed space. Furthermore, In higher difficulties, there aren’t many combat paths that are viable; most notably, Alchemy-centric build isn’t a viable option in higher difficulties, preventing the combat from providing a true RPG experience.

Personally, I enjoyed my time with the game, but I had to keep telling myself not to look at it like a true RPG rather look at it more of an action adventure centred game. There are mods available to improve the combat, which was something that I really needed, and other quality of life changes for small nitpicks you might have. 

To sum it up, this is an amazing game, just not an amazing RPG. Go into this game not looking at the RPG tag attached to it, and you will enjoy it extensively. This game is definitely worth buying, and it will offer you a lot of quality content. The only people I would advise to be cautious are the ones that are either looking for an RPG in the style of the Divinity games, or the Elder Scrolls games, or those that want an amazing combat experience. Although, if you have issues with the latter on PC, you can always get a few mods to improve the combat.

This game is a solid 10/10.

Reviewer: Michael UG

Comentario:
Dreamfall est un jeu très sympathique. On joue deux perso sur trois qui ne sont pas présents dans le jeu d'origine. Le point&click est laissé de côté (hormis pour les interactions) et ça change du premier du nom. 

Même si le jeu finit sur une pointe de floue, celle-ci est un peu balayée par la suite (Dreamfall Chapters).

Malgré que ce soit un jeu qui se joue exclusivement sur windows xp (pour les autres versions windows, vous prenez un risque : vous risquez de devoir formater votre ordinateur) je le recommande. L'histoire est une chose à laquelle j'accorde une grande importance et celle de Dreamfall m'a emportée aussi loin que le premier The longest journey.

Comentario:
20 ans après le chef d'œuvre du dernier opus, Baldur's Gate III ( early access ) chapoté ce coup-ci par les pères de Divinity Original Sin ( Larian Studios ) débarque sur nos machines. 

Early access oblige, vous serez confronté à divers bugs dont certains mettant les nerfs en boule.

Hormis les bugs, si vous avez grandi en jouant aux 2 premiers et que vous vous réunissiez tout les week-end à l'époque en sortant vos feuilles de personnage pour jouer au plus mythique des pen&paper, alors je ne peux que vous conseillez de vous lancez dans le scénario certes cher mais maîtrisé du premier acte de Baldur's Gate III. 

Foncez aventuriers !!

Cordialement, humain clerc de niveau 4 ^^

Comentario:
J'ai énormément joué à ce jeu sur amiga, apparemment c'est le même ; énormément d'humour et de bon moment. 
On doit courir avec le chien pour préparer un parcourt en avance pour que le somnambule évite de se réveiller et/ou mourir. 
Le chien prend tous les risques et toute les souffrances imaginables et distribue les coup de pied dans le fut.
Tres fun, mais a surement beaucoup vieilli.

Le jeu propose un beau gameplay avec des graphismes rappelant le style cartoon. Des mécaniques de jeu intéressantes donnent un coté "unique" au jeu. Le fait qu'on élimine un joueur en le poussant est classique dans le milieu du jeu mais le fait que Sky Noon soit un fps innove en soi. Cependant, le manque de nouveaux modes rend le jeu lassant pour les gros gameurs qui voudront passer plusieurs journées dessus.

Comentario: Compare to FM14 itsa different game, progress are good. I palyed FM 15 long long hours and actualy never tired of this. I have playing football managerssince 2002 or 2003 , before it became FM and I love it.

Recreation of old classic strategy game in new genre, FPS. 

Syndicate had good potential, too bad it is not fully used. Short single player campaign, poor storytelling, could be better. If You like Deus Ex , do not expect Syndicate to be one. It is more linear FPS in the first place.
Okay, it is not everything bad. You got aggressive AI, that keeps the pressure on, gunplay and hacking is also fun.It has very nice graphics, excellent co-op mode. 
So, if you want to play it , I recommend co op, much more fun than go single player.

Also, because it is very cheap on this site (on Origin sale it is not under 10€), you do not get feeling that you are ripped off.
I must mention, if You buy this game, probably you will need to contact Origin support, because of activation. Do not worry,problem is in Origin. I had problems with other games for Origin(Crysis, which I bought in retail,wouldn`t activate).

Géneros: ['Action', 'Adventure', 'FPS', 'RPG', 'Xbox ONE Games', 'Sci-fi', 'Space', 'Singleplayer', 'Atmospheric', 'Horror', 'First-Person', 'Story Rich', 'Exploration', 'Aliens', 'Futuristic', 'Open World', 'Survival Horror', 'Stealth', 'Psychological Horror', 'Violent']
Comentario: can't get enough of this game the story is awesome and it is so different to any other game ive ever played. I enjoyed every second of my playthrough and every second of the second and thrird as well!

You take the cape of Marius, a Roman Centurion and find out how Rome came to fall in the storyline proposed by the game designers. Albeit a short campaign mode, it should sate anybody's need to see flying limbs and smashed heads. 
The combat system is simplistic and once you get the hang ow what mouse button represents what colour, it'll be a breeze to master. That's not necessarily a good thing as it will become quite repetitive as time goes by and the lack of enemy variety does not help at all. 
The story is interesting and has a supernatural part that ties well in with the traditional Roman superstitious nature and brings an added level of intrigue.

Géneros: ['Action', 'Adventure', 'Xbox ONE Games', 'Story Rich', 'Female Protagonist', 'Stealth', 'Medieval', 'Violent', 'Atmospheric', 'Singleplayer', 'Third Person', 'Historical', 'Horror', 'Survival', 'Puzzle', 'Dark', 'Walking Simulator']
Comentario:
The story starts off strongly and definitely brutally. I'm not exaggerating, they definitely did a good job at showing how brutal and disgusting the Black Death was. However even such horrible event cannot surpass how some people were more disgusting to each other and in some cases they use the tragedy for their own benefits. The game portrays that very well.

In that horrible world we find the sister and the little brother who have that innocent and adorable bond. As the story evolves I felt so attached to Amicia, it could be the cute accent, but I think it was also how the character evolves to the point where she would risk anything just for the safety of her brother and that basically is how Amicia grew so charismatic and heroic to me.

Masterpiece.

Comentario: Bon... Vraiment très déçu de ce jeu... c'est dommage ça commence bien, c'est oppressant, beau, bioshock-ien à souhait... Et certaines zones sont magnifiques. Mais plusieurs choses ne vont pas: déjà, le personnage c'est un semi-remorque? Parce qu'est ce qu'elle est leeeente! Ensuite: un scénario un peu facile et prévisible (tout le monde n'est pas Bioshock...) Et... 4 ou 5h de jeu pour une fin FRANCHEMENT nulle. Genre franchement. Nulle. Pas émouvante. Même pas gratifiante. Pas d'apothéose, rien. Je m'attendais à quelque chose de bien fini mais non, c'est aussi frustrant que de lire une phrase pas terminé. Donc un grand braavo à la direction artistique, le reste... vraiment bof. Pour moi ce sera la moyenne pas plus.

Sto aspettando che mettiate il gioco in vendita da un anno e mezzo. Spero che vedrete il messaggio e che mi risponderete. Grazie....ottima applicazione ed affidabile al 100%.Buona giornata a tutti:3..

Comentario:

Comentario:
Lords of the Fallen has fun combat and a good spin on Dark Souls' skill system, but its hero is overpowered 
Lords of the Fallen delivers entertaining hack-and-slash combat centered on combos and spells, but its risk-based reward system seems slightly out of place in a world where its hero so easily achieves great power and defense and makes risk obsolete. It achieves its goal of creating a more accessible Dark Souls-style experience, but unfortunately it goes a step or two too far

Provoquant nombre de soucis dans le couchant. L'histoire nous permet de remonter petit à petit à la source de problème (malgré quelques quêtes inintéressante)

Well for a basegame the Sims 4 offers an absolute bare minimum to start with simlish stories. You cannot compare this with previous Sims like 3 or 2. Even 4 yrs after release the build mode still lacks in huge amount of tools we used to have. The biggest issue l have that somehow the development team is not really able to provide matching sets in all categories. Some color choices are questionable and very limited. If you plan to stick with the basegame only you won't explore the full fun. You will need to buy DLCs to improve the gameplay. Overall l dislike a lot of things how they handled yet it captivates me and am intrigued by my simmies. I hope they will improve even though they started to recolor and adjust certain meshes which get repetitive and EA wants money for that, too but the Sim community provides million of custom content you can add and make this game your own and with DLCs you can add some gameplay. But don't raise your hopes too high as l said you cannot compare it to previous versions if you do you will be dissapointed. I love it despite all downs and l hope for improvements in future.

Overview
Extinction is a Hack and Slash action game with procedurally generated worlds. You play as a hero tasked with saving humanity from...well, extinction! You have to save small pockets of civilization on each map and fight off against the bosses - giants. .

Breakdown
Attack, attack and attack!
Most of the time you will be fighting off against smaller mobs around a small group of people you are trying to save. Once you defeat the enemies in an area, you have to activate a pillar that will ensure that that group of people are saved from the monsters around. Periodically, huge giants will pop up, and you have to fight them. Basically, they are the bosses of each level. But wait, you can’t just go and hack them to death. Each giant will have pieces of armour around its legs, arms, neck, shoulders, and head. You first have to break these pieces of armour, after which you can proceed to take out said body part of the giant. As you slowly do this, you can expose more parts, and once you have exposed enough, you can strike a finishing blow on the giant.

So which map? Oh wait, it doesn’t really matter
There are a few cities you can choose from to play in, but they all are procedurally generated with minor differences. As a result, what might have been an important decision becomes an irrelevant one. This feels like a missed opportunity as they could have made each city, while being randomly generated, have its own features like different types of enemies or additional environmental elements like lava or earthquakes and such. Yet, as they are randomly generated, it does add a bit of replayability to the game which is a good thing.

Remember to fill your damage boost!
One very unique and nice mechanic is that devs have added to this game, is the boost feature. There is a “damage boost” bar next to the minimap, alongside with the health bar. As you kill more mobs and destroy more chunks of armour from the giants, this bar fills up and increases your damage. The game rewards you for playing, and the rewards encourage you to play more at the same time.

Okay, so what else?
Sadly, there isn’t anything else to do in the game which is a big shame, because it is fun to play. The game would be better with a proper progression system or co-op, but the game doesn’t have those features whatsoever.

Should you pick this up?
It’s a tough question. The game does have a bit to offer, but sometimes it feels repetitive, unless you really like melee combat; only then I would definitely say that it is worth it. You can have quite a bit of fun in this game to make it worth picking up. Also, if they add co-op at any point in the future then it would definitely be worth its price tag. In any other case, it is recommended to wait for a big price drop or a deep sale.

Reviewer: Emma UG

The game has massive freezes in campaign. I've never ever experienced that in any game so if anyone is going to tell me to update my drivers or smth similar then I'm gonna lose my mind.

Campaign is actually good and there is a mission that feels close to SWAT 4, which is another level of FPS games. People who has interest in COD games will love this. The game is mostly divided into stealth campaign, which tries to resemble "reality" and the brutality (hostage situations, special force raids, etc.). Then you also have the famous Rambo style type of shooting.

Anyway I finally fixed the freezing issue, or at least most of them. There will be usually a little freeze before performance demanding scenes like explosions. Don't think that the downloading will be done through Battle.net, you will need to be patient and wait for the in-game download that optimizes your game and adds shades for your computer.

ALa première chose qui nous surprend lorsqu’on joue à Trüberbrook, c’est ses graphismes particuliers. En effet, contrairement aux jeux actuels quasi exclusivement réalisés en 3D temps réel, le jeu de btf mêle habilement décors fabriqués à la main et personnages en 3D.
Les paysages miniatures sont peints à la main, éclairés de différentes façons pour simuler différentes heures de la journée et même redécorés pour imiter différentes saisons, un travail impressionnant à la hauteur de films d’animations comme Wallace et Gromit, Chicken Run. Une fois terminés, les décors sont digitalisés à l’aide d’une technique appelée photogrammétrie, et mélangés avec les personnages et des effets visuels. vant de commencer à jouer à Trüberbrook, je n’avais aucune idée de l’aventure palpitante que j’allais vivre à travers ce point-and-click. J’étais très attiré par le rendu graphique et par ce type de jeu auquel je ne m’étais plus essayé depuis Monkey Island et Grim Fandango, mais je ne m’attendais pas à être autant envouté par ce scénario montant crescendo jusqu’à une conclusion épique.
J’ai terminé le jeu en environ sept heures ayant eu quelques difficultés sur certaines énigmes et malgré quelques petits soucis de maniabilité minimes au stick, Trüberbrook est une vraie belle réussite.

Título: Naruto to Boruto: Shinobi Striker PS4
Descuento: No hay descuento para este juego :(
Comentario:
Alors tout d'abord ce jeu va bien évidement plaire aux fans du manga. L'univers est très bien retranscrit, les graphismes sont plutôt bien réalisés, et les combats sont vraiment dynamiques.

Il manque quelques petites choses pour vraiment apprécier ce jeu, je trouve ( pour ma part ) qu'il manque des choses quant à la spécialisation de notre avatar ( je parle pour les jutsus ).

En effet, a la Ultimate Ninja Storm, le personnage dispose de 2 jutsus "de base" et d'un jutsu dit "secret". Sachant qu'il y'a 4 types de jeu qui sont Attaque, Distance, Défense et Soigneur. Je trouve que cela fait un peu léger, et le fait de ne jouer qu'avec ces 3 techniques rends les combats assez répétitifs, et réduit les chances de vous démarquer des autres joueurs. Encore une fois ce n'est que mon point de vue.

Le jeu est très principalement PVP. C'est la source principale d'xp, si je ne dis pas de bêtises ! Les combats se font a 4 contre 4, avec différents enjeux comme capture de base ou encore match a mort, a la call of ! A vous de créer vos synergies avec les différents membres de votre équipe.

Un système de maître assez complet, qui vous permet de choisir un mentors parmi les personnages les plus emblématiques de l'animé, qui vous apprendront leur techniques au fur et a mesure que vous gagnerez de l’expérience dans la formation qu'ils vous enseigneront. 

Notez que vous avez accès a un mode solo, qui n'est autre qu'un enchaînement de missions a faire avec votre maître, ou alors en coop,avec d'autres apprentis ninja :) C'est ce mode qui permet de déverrouiller les différents mentors au fur et a mesure que vous accomplirez es missions qui vous sont confiées. 

Voila donc un opus assez intéressant, plein de bonnes choses, mais comme tout jeu a sa sortie, encore améliorable ;)

Comentario: Big fan of series so maximum points. If you love funny management/city building games buy it.Just hope they put out more free content for the game(old gamer here,hater of dlc stuff).You will have ton of fun with this game 100/100

it has a real budgety feeling to it but its still really fun once you get into it. 

you get to lead your own team of british soldiers into different missions behind enemy lines. while the story is close to non existant it's very easy to imagine your own story with the men you choose in every mission and if they die in a mission, they are dead for the rest of your playthough. 

the game will take you to africa, norway, france and many other location. almost every mission is different so it never feels like you're doing the same thing. in one mission you might have to infiltrate a submarine and the next one lets you help a group of american troops hold a stronghold.

overall, i highly recommend the game if you are ready for a budgety game experience

Comentario:
The positive thing is that 10 years later he returns to PC
The negative is that it is EA, many people even with the latest equipment such as i9 with 1080, have crashes to the desktop unresolved. The most serious one related to Denuvo (the anticopy system) that especially affects xenon processors and that EA has no intention of fixing.
It also happens to others with this:
i7 8700k
16GB RAM
Geforce 1080

Attualmente l'ultimo gioco della serie EA Sports UFC, è un gioco che migliora la grafica rispetto al UFC2, la carriera è ancora molto lineare ma le rivalità sono molto interessanti.

De mémoire il y a: Médiéval ou on a des arcs / katana.
Les autres mode reste comme sur les autres jeux de shoot, Capture, Team deathmatch

Compatible: Oculus Rift + Touch, HTC Vive,PSVR 

Dans le jeu on retrouve:
Cosmetics: On peu avoir des skins d'armes, changer de personnage, changer de banière ou d'image de profil
Sociable: On peu inviter ces amis (d’ailleurs le vocal et super bien fait avec un effets de radio !) au passage les sons.. Son super bien fait !
Loot Boxes: Chaque passage de niveau on reçois une Loot Boxes avec des objets dedans (aléatoire)
Armory: La ou on peu changer le skin de son arme / apparence personnage / Bannière

Comentario: Ich hab "NBA Live 19" zwar noch nicht gespielt, jedoch die vorgänger und die fand ich überragend. Die Story war sehr gut und das Spielerlebnis klasse. Ich finde diese NBA reihe auch um einiges besser als die der Konkurrenz 2k. Spielphysik's sind gut und die Grafik ist auch in Ordnung für diese Zeit. Géneros: ['Action', "Beat'em all", 'Cooperation', 'RPG', 'Strategy', 'Hack and Slash', 'Character Customization', 'Historical', 'Third Person', 'Singleplayer', 'Anime', 'Local Co-Op']

Comentario:
Encontré el juego porque estaba como oferta diaria en Instant Gaming, leí un par de reseñas, y decidí probarlo.

La mayoría de reseñas hablaban de lo bonito que es el juego, los dibujos al estilo japonés, la música...
Y había una que lo criticaba, por ser excesivamente corto, cosa que tampoco me parecía razonable.

Y ahora, tras haberlo jugado...
Ññññe

No voy a hacer spoilers, pero... el juego tiene dos finales; y tras haber visto los dos, no me parece que sea un juego de esos que te toca la fibra. Es previsible, y fin. Así que en cuanto a historia... ñññe
La música... bueno, sin más.
Y los gráficos sí que me parecen bonitos, la verdad.

El principal problema... bugs, curiosamente xD
La primera vez que me lo he intentado pasar, estaba más o menos metido en la historia, y de repente se ha quedado pillado en la conversación.
He intentado todo (que básicamente es moverse a la derecha, a la izquierda, pulsar barra espaciadora, o Esc); y nada ha servido; así que he tenido que volver a empezar, porque el juego se ha guardado automáticamente ahí.
Después, he decidido intentarlo otra vez, y he ido haciendo todos los puzzles rápido, sin pararme; y en una de las zonas, he debido de pulsar la barra espaciadora cuando no debía, y me he saltado la mitad del juego y he ido a la penúltima zona; es decir, prácticamente al final del juego. Lo malo es que he visto el final, mientras sonaba la banda sonora de la zona que se ha buggeado, lo que estropeaba la escena completamente.

He decidido volver a intentarlo, para al menos llegar a al otro final, y me ha ocurrido lo mismo: se me ha buggeado en otro sitio, he tenido que volver a empezar, y al hacerlo sin querer he vuelto a buggearlo y a saltarme la mitad del juego, llegando de nuevo a la penúltima zona.

Así que, por última vez, he decidido volver a probarlo, y me lo he pasado todo, esta vez sí. Y para cuando he llegado al final... estaba más frustrado que otra cosa.
Al menos he podido llegar rápido, me habrá llevado poco más de cinco o seis minutos.

Así que... a ver, el juego no es feo.
Es bonito, y habrá que crea que la historia es bonita (ya digo que sin más, si quieres una historia realmente bonita vete a otros juegos).
Pero yo he estado más frustrado que otra cosa.

Super contente d'avoir retrouvé ce jeu, le jeu de mon enfance des bons niveaux pour l'époque, très ludique et addictif ! le seul point négatif mais qui fait le charme du jeu c'est de devoir tout recommencer dès que l'on perd :p

Comentario:
So this game got promoted with a heavy foreshadowing because it just said " Payday 2 in ww2" they were wrong, the game has many differences from payday 2 in terms of gameplay and story.
the game sadly was rushed so to whoever buys it, don't let the many graphical bugs, glitches and tedious gameplay you may encounter discourage you, gather some friends and play this game togheter and enjoy it especially! this game needs love from the community as it's company that is victim of a publishing company that rushed the game deadline, getting on the shelves a game with many last second cuts and errors.

Título: Trials Rising Gold Edition Xbox ONE
Comentario:
https://youtu.be/CR7deew4bNI

Gameplay et découverte du jeu ci-dessus. Du Fun et des moments difficiles !

Il s'agit pour ma part de mon tout premier Trials. Que dire ? Et bien le level design est particulièrement réussi et bluffant. 
Trois touches principales : Accélérer, freiner et orienter sa moto afin de réussir à passer les obstacles. Le jeu est extrêmement technique et connaître un circuit semble être la clé pour réussir avec brio et parfaitement une map afin d'obtenir le rang maximum de celle-ci. Vous pouvez également personnaliser votre motard ainsi que votre moto avec les différents éléments déblocables dans le jeu.

Le jeu propose également un multijoueur et un mode coop avec deux personnes sur la même moti et là, c'est le fun garantie !

Título: The Division 2 Ultimate Edition Xbox ONE
Comentario: This game is different compared to other Tom Clancy games. The multiplayer is great, graphics good and gameplay is smooth however, they could've improved the AI of enemies and make it more difficult. If you are a sharpshooter, then you will run through this game but if you are not, you will struggle especially when you play the campaign alone. To play the 3 Player Co-Op campaign is great but there must be Teamwork. Teamwork is Key in this apocalyptic genre. Great game and the price is awesome too. A must have!!

Comentario: Oninaki es un buen juego de acción con cámara isométrica que se centra en contar una curiosa historia donde la muerte y la pérdida son las principales protagonista. Es cierto que no aprovecha todo lo bien que podría la posibilidad del personaje de viajar al "otro mundo", pero cumple bastante bien. Tiene unatrama larguilla e interesante, el diseño artístico del juego es precioso y tiene finales alternativos, lo cual suma. Al acabar la historia existe el típico nivel infinito donde matar monstruos sin cesar, aunque hay muchos títulos mejores para este tipo de cosas que Oninaki en si.

Comentario: Well for a basegame the Sims 4 offers an absolute bare minimum to start with simlish stories. You cannot compare this with previous Sims like 3 or 2. Even 4 yrs after release the build mode still lacks in huge amount of tools we used to have. The biggest issue l have that somehow the development team is not really able to provide matching sets in all categories. Some color choices are questionable and very limited. If you plan to stick with the basegame only you won't explore the full fun. You will need to buy DLCs to improve the gameplay. Overall l dislike a lot of things how they handled yet it captivates me and am intrigued by my simmies. I hope they will improve even though they started to recolor and adjust certain meshes which get repetitive and EA wants money for that, too but the Sim community provides million of custom content you can add and make this game your own and with DLCs you can add some gameplay. But don't raise your hopes too high as l said you cannot compare it to previous versions if you do you will be dissapointed. I love it despite all downs and l hope for improvements in future.

Comentario: Ich hab "NBA Live 19" zwar noch nicht gespielt, jedoch die vorgänger und die fand ich überragend. Die Story war sehr gut und das Spielerlebnis klasse. Ich finde diese NBA reihe auch um einiges besser als die der Konkurrenz 2k. Spielphysik's sind gut und die Grafik ist auch in Ordnung für diese Zeit. In diesem Spiel ist auch ein "Ultimate Team" Modus zu finden, welchen ich nicht gerne spiele, da dieser wie auch beispielsweise in Fifa reines p2w ist. Alles in allem hat das Spiel eine Top Bewertung verdient, da es sehr viel Spaß macht und meiner Meinung nach auch besser als NBA 2k ist.

Título: Batman: Arkham City Origins - Cold, Cold Heart
Barrow Hill: Curse of The Ancient Circle

Comentario:
Un clásico y uno de los mejores juegos de la saga. También hay que decir que es el juego mas complicado y exigente del Agente 47, nada que ver con las siguientes entregas y mucho menos con los actuales de nueva generación.

El argumento pasa sin mayor trascendencia, ya que carece de importancia, al final no es mas que una escusa para que 47 vuelva a la carga. La historia nunca ha sido la esencia de los Hitman ni su punto fuerte, y la verdad que tampoco le hace falta.

La jugabilidad es la mítica, nos dan un objetivo y debemos de acabar con el de la forma que sea, orquestando una masacre (no lo recomiendo) o utilizando nuestra habilidad e inteligencia para infiltrarnos. También nos pueden encargar objetivos adicionales o secundarios como recuperar un maletín o similares. Podemos llevarnos las armas del enemigo que al final aparecerán en nuestro arsenal para elegir antes de empezar una misión y en nuestra base (que podemos recorrer libremente para ir probando nuestro armamento, aunque no es muy amplia). El disfrazarnos para suplantar identidades es la esencia de cualquier Hitman y aquí no sería menos, sin embargo no será una tarea sencilla ya que la IA enemiga es bastante complicada y sospecharan ante cualquier mínima cosa, incluso si nos ponemos a correr pueden dispararnos. La acción es complicada ya que nos acribillaran con facilidad y nuestro inventario es limitado, las armas como fusiles y escopetas no podemos esconderlas por su tamaño, a diferencia de armas cortas como pistolas y revolveres.

Apartado técnico decente para la época, actualmente se ve bastante bien y cuenta con buenos detalles, como las manchas de sangre y una balística muy realista, así como el manejo de las distintas armas, cada una con su retroceso y potencia. Especial mención a la banda sonora, muy bien realizada.

El juego flaquea en el desarrollo de algunas misiones, que nos obligara a utilizar la acción directa o la infiltración tipo Metal Gear o Splinter Cell, algo para lo que el juego no esta bien diseñado en cuanto a manejo y controles de personaje.

En resumen, Hitman 2 es una gran entrega de sigilo con toques de acción, entretenido, adictivo y exigente, un juego que nos hará pensar y replantearnos nuestra estrategia en mas de una ocasión para hacer el asesinato perfecto y salir vivos en el intento. El buen diseño de niveles, la variedad de opciones en los escenarios y el amplio arsenal que nos permite jugar a nuestro gusto, hacen de Hitman 2 una experiencia mas que recomendable, al igual que la saga en general.

Géneros: ['Adventure', 'RPG', 'Strategy', 'Mac', 'Linux', 'Indies', 'Fantasy', 'Isometric', 'Turn-Based', 'Old School', 'Party-Based RPG', 'Grid-Based Movement', 'Turn-Based Combat', 'CRPG', 'Story Rich', '2D', 'Singleplayer', 'Retro', 'Exploration', 'Female Protagonist']
Comentario:
Ein typisches Indie-Rollenspiel, was sich eindeutig an Spieler alter Schule mit recht großem Toleranzbereich und Affinität zum Genre richtet. Denn grafisch und soundseitig finden wir in diesem ersten Teil einer Trilogie höchstens Durchschnitt vor. Die Story entfaltet sich durchaus interessant und wird nett erzählt, das Balancing stimmt, obwohl ich bisher nur den einfachen Weg beschritten habe. Leider ist die KI an einem Punkt zu stark und verhindert so meinen Fortschritt. Im Verlauf der Geschichte gibt es Haupt- und Nebenquests, die recht abwechslungsreich gestaltet sind und sich selten wiederholen. Ein gewisser Handlungsspielraum ist gegeben, da jede Entscheidung im Spiel einen verschiedenartigen Ausgang zur Folge hat. Das Schicksal über die zukünftige Herrschaft von Avadon liegt damit also allein in unseren Händen.

Mein Fazit: "Avadon: Black Fortress" kann ganz passabel unterhalten. Vor allem für RPG-Enthusiasten oder die es noch werden wollen. Andere werden hier aufgrund der technischen Limitierungen nur bedingt glücklich werden.

Wertung: 7.5 / 10.0

Introduction
Subnautica is an aquatic-themed survival exploration game. The premise of the game is that your spaceship has crashed on this primarily water-filled planet. You are aware of alien life present on the planet and are armed with just a knife. You must explore and survive, with your end goal being get off the planet by rebuilding your ship. 

Breakdown
Early access done right
I’d like to start off by pointing out that this game started out in early access and has been completed. There aren’t many games that do that these days. A lot of developers just take the cash and announce the full release the game without fulfilling their promises, or don’t even release it at all!. Early access survival games are mostly seen as a cash grab rather than an opportunity to make a good game. If anyone is interested in seeing how to go about making an early access game, then Subnautica is the perfect example. The devs deserve kudos for their work and integrity.

Mediocre story, No combat
You read that right. The gameplay is ok, and combat is pretty much non-existent in this game. Your only lethal weapon is a knife in a huge ocean, the primary biome, filled with creatures that want to kill you. The beauty of this game lies in its emphasis on exploration without any combat. You are aware of the alien presence near your crash site from the beginning. You explore to discover hidden caves and bases which give you new technology that helps you fix your ship. The game might not have any combat, but it shows that not every survival game needs to be about killing everything in your way. 

Beautiful World
The game is gorgeous. When you are underwater, the god rays moving make it look lifelike. It gives the water this turquoise tint that makes everything underneath, from plants, to animals, and even the terrain, pop and give it a little more edge. This ties in well with the biggest plus point to this game: the exploration. While exploring in other games may be tedious, and even feel like a chore, in this one, it fits right in with the outstanding visuals present. 

What about replayability?
Sadly, this is one thing the game lacks. There isn’t really any incentive to play the game again after finishing it as the story is mediocre, and once you’ve explored everything, you pretty much know everything about the game. Although, there is a creative mode which eliminates what threats there are and lets you build amazing bases you can call home. Thankfully, the crafting and base building systems are fully fleshed out and this game mode is a fun experience.

A simple yet wonderful game
As you may be able to tell by now, this game is very simple, yet a fun experience. It doesn’t try to do much and what it does, it delivers phenomenally well. If you are looking for a casual game that you can kick back and enjoy, then this is it. Whether it is after a rough day’s work, or through the Sunday afternoon, this game will relax you and keep you hooked at the same time. I haven’t even mentioned that it is just the type of game that showcases the beauty of VR and should be a plus point for VR gamers. Subnautica offers about 20 hours of content, and would make a fine addition to the steam library of anyone who likes relaxing games with an emphasis on exploration. Definitely recommended!

Reviewer: Kevin UG

Título: Jump Force Deluxe Edition Xbox ONE
Comentario:
Jump force est un bon jeu de salon pour dégommer ces amis avec son personnage préféré. Le jeu part d'un bon concept bien que totalement fan service (mais bon , qui na jamais voulue voir des combats goku vs luffy par ex ^^) , mais est-il bien exploité ?

Le fan service est bien au rdv avec plus de 40 personnages jouables , mais le reste beaucoup moins. Le mode histoire présente aucun intérêt c'est à peine si on le remarque , son seul but consiste à vous faire souffrir avec des dialogues / cinématiques interminable qu'on ne peut pas skip. 

Mais bon , somme nous la pour le scénar ? NON ! mais plus pour la baston , alors que donne ce système de combat. Bhaaaa , il est moyen , il a pour avantage d'avoir une prise en main facile , voir même trop. Il ne demande pas énormément de skill comme Street Fighter ou tekken pour lâcher de gros combo , le système reste trop assister. Et le système de garde lui est aussi robuste qu'un barrage de gilet jaune, il arrête absolument tout et ceci peu donner de combat bien vide contre certain adversaire... 
Si vous cherchez un système complexe vous allez être déçus , mais pour ceux qui veule juste se mettre sur la gueule avec des animations et effets spectaculaires vous n'allez pas être déçus.

Les graphismes sont excellent ainsi que les animations , le seul reproche qu'un peu trouver est que par moment avec certain coup , le jeu peu paraître surcharger d’animation et embrouiller le joueur , hors-ceci rien à redire.

En conclusion , le jeu reste plutôt bon et agréable à jouer , il est idéale pour jouer entre potes. Par contre il n'est pas du tout adapter pour la compétition à l'heure actuel à cause de la simplicité de son système de combat et son histoire est complètement secondaire. Le fan services est présent avec plus de 40 personnage jouable donc un qu'un peu personnaliser . Il mérite l'honorable note de 12/20

Comentario:
Storia ben fatta, facile ma comunque impegnativa, ti fa sentire un detective ma ha un postgame inesistente (letteralmente, non sta nient'altro se non ripetere la storia).
Graficamente è leggermente piu realistico di sole e luna ma solo perchè non ha niente che gli pesa, ha solo una storia a differenza di sole e luna che hanno i pokèmon con le varianti shiny e altre meccaniche.
Le interazioni col pikachu sono divertentissime e numerose.
Tuttavia non riesco a valutare sufficiente il titolo perchè la storia è corta, consiglio di prenderlo fisico e rivenderlo in seguito perchè, come detto, dopo la storia non avrete piu niente da fare se non conservarlo per puro collezionismo

Comentario: In the beginning, there was Final Fantasy XIV, and it was not good. For most games, the story would’ve ended there. But Square Enix, perhaps feeling that its prized franchise's name was in danger of becoming too literal, undertook a mammoth effort to keep Final Fantasy’s legacy from being marred by such a disaster. Final Fantasy XIV: A Realm Reborn is the resulting do-over, and it’s a huge success on PC, PlayStation 3, and PlayStation 4. Beautiful, fun, and only a bit uneven in the late game, this dramatic reinvention easily establishes itself as one of the most sincere and effective apologies in gaming history.

Comentario:
¡Ojo! no es el juego base, es el contenido descargable con una nueva historia dividida en 3 actos.
Por lo demás está genial. Más de lo mismo, más desafíos, enemigos nuevos y perfecto para profundizar dentro del nuevo universo de spiderman en ps4.

DLC for one of the most disappointing games ever. When I finished the whole game, I thought to myself that the DLC may be interesting. And here we have one.

Gameplay isn´t bad at all. It expands basic game, so only thing I could say is that the driving mechanics are really bad and whole driving is odd. For PC it feels like console port and control for gamepads. They promised us tons of things and nothing from it was fulfilled.

From graphics side I can surely say it is one of the best looking games. And if you download one special mod, it will also allow you to manually change it and it deepens the game atmosphere.

Story builds on the predecessor. You have to stop Corporate and regenerate the power from Chicago Club. You can´t trust anybody and your mission is secret. I found too many cliches in this story. It isn´t even interesting.

Overall, from gameplay side, this DLC is good. But in everything else, it´s failling. I would NOT RECOMMEND this expansion.

Título: Sword Art Online: Fatal Bullet Complete Edition
Géneros: ['Action', 'Cooperation', 'FPS', 'Multiplayer', 'RPG', 'Anime', 'Character Customization', 'JRPG', 'Third-Person Shooter', 'Shooter', 'Open World', 'Third Person', 'Singleplayer', 'Nudity', 'MMORPG', 'Sexual Content', 'Fantasy', 'Online Co-Op', 'Visual Novel']
Comentario:
Bon avant commencer toute chose le jeu m'a bien surpris.
J'ai regarder des lives des vidéos et je savais que sa allais être un jeu nerveux.
Mais a aucun moment a me faire os d'un coup très surpris faut vraiment des petits réflexe sa fait plaisir.
graphiquement j'ai rien a dire mélange animé futuriste sa me plais malgré ce que les autres pense.
le gameplay comme dit plus haut déjà bien nerveux a voir par la suite.
quelque bug niveau serveur et une IA un peu a l'ouest par moment mais bon.
Honnêtement un bon jeu je ne regrette pas mon achat et je sais qu'on va pouvoir jouer pas mal d'heure dessus et pour les gens qui cherchais un truc qui bouges le voila.

Excellent jeu de stratégie SF. Très complet et offre une variété de gameplay impressionnante pour qui s'intéressera sérieusement aux différences entre les factions.
La campagne est bien organisée et permet de mettre vraiment en valeur les points forts du jeu à condition de s’entraîner un peu avant. On peut juste "reprocher" les IA en escarmouche dont la violence peut se révéler très frustrante pour les nouveaux joueurs mais une fois à l'aise, elles deviennent d'excellents adversaires pour s’entraîner pour le multijoueur.

Géneros: ['Action', 'Arcade', 'Adventure', 'Racing', 'Simulation', 'Sports', 'Multiplayer', 'Cooperation', 'Xbox ONE Games', 'Massively Multiplayer', 'Open World', 'Driving', 'Flight', 'Singleplayer', 'Third Person', 'First-Person', 'Online Co-Op', 'Atmospheric', 'America', 'Sandbox', 'Funny']
Comentario:
They thought that adding 3 transportation simulations would make the game look more exciting. It is not. Each one of the simulations looks like one of those B rated racing games.

Story looks so uninteresting it made me do something I was always against - skipping a scene. Can you imagine a racing game with a story of getting social network followers? Why is that concept so popular in today's video games? A classic story of antagonists and protagonists would be enough for me, instead we have some degenerate low quality Instagram following story.

With a budget like that it delivered nothing but boredom.

As the game story somewhat related to the previous game, I would suggest play Darksiders first game before this one. 
In Darksiders 2 you will play as one of the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse, Death.

Death, will try to clear his brother War’s name by restore humanity, where War is convicted by destroying it. The story line was interesting and in my opinion it could be better, but in general it’s fine. Even though the world in Darksiders 2 is way bigger than the previous game, but it wasn’t good since there is not that much to explore. I guess the reason is so the can add more side quests and give the game more hours. the game comes with new skill system, where you have two paths, but still can mix each path skill with another. You have Harbinger Tree (Warrior path) and Necromancer Tree (Spellcasting path).

I liked the fact they didn’t make it like the previous game where you can buy your skills, but sill I don’t think it should be that much of skills. War as in the previous game has only four skills and they were perfect as they suite its character, which is the opposite in this game, even though his name is Death, you won’t feel the meaning of his name, except his Reaper form. I fact that you get gold after slaying an enemy when it was a souls in the last game it’s really confusing, since you use them to purchases items from demon called Vulgrim, who mentioned that he have no use of gold in Darksiders 1 and asked for souls as currency. And since we playing with Death, the souls will suit it more.

Weapons system I really didn’t like, in this game they allowed you to use different varieties of weapon; such as, Hummer, Swords, maces and etc, beside Death main weapon Scythe. the problem is unlike the previous game where you can use only War’s sword (Chaoseater), and the more you kill the more Chaoseater become strong and upgraded. In Darksiders 2 the Scythes are not different than other weapons. All these extra thing killed the character, you barley can see him as death. Even his agility, the way he moves, walk on walls doesn’t suit Death. Which makes you wonder how are they gonna deliver Strife character (One of Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse).

The graphics isn’t bad at all, and I hope they won’t change it.

To sum up, the game was a big surprise where there is a huge difference between it and the previous one. Even though they fail to deliver Death character as it should be, you will mostly like and enjoy the fights and the character. the story was great and really interesting. I hope the make the next game more like the first one, more Action than RPG as it suit the story and the characters more.

I just love it! It's the first non shooter game I've played, and it's really more addicting than I thought it would be. The graphics are just amazing, and the story is amazing enough to keep you playing for hours on end.

Título: Just Cause 3: Air, Land & Sea Expansion Pass Xbox ONE
Comentario:
As someone who beat Just Cause 1 and 2 I can say that the third installment is the best game of the series so far. 

Not only the controls feel much better, the new gadgets like the (Bavarium powered) wingsuit and the retracting tethers alone sell it for me. Out of ammo? Just pull a helicopter into a gas tank and watch it explode. The world design is just amazingly done and beautiful. It is smaller than Panau from Just Cause 2, but also better filled with interesting landmarks and a better variety of things to blow up. Yes the story and characters are as cheesy as they can get. But do you really expect some serious characters with a rich and interesting past to tell you about? This game is just like it's predecessors a playable action movie with a lot of freedom where you can play with your creativity.

But there is a few big downside which are pretty much unnecessary and could've been avoided in making this game. 

downside:+ a few negative points under this text
performance
The performance is sometimes and without tweaking a catastrophe. My PC is high-end and so way over the recommended requirements (i7 7700k, 16GB ram, GTX1070, game installed on SSD) and the FPS sometimes just tank down to ~40 FPS. But that luckily rarely happened in my hours of play time. A simple restart of the game also fixed that for me. 

There is a very helpful guide in the steam guides posted that helps fixing the performance completely. Aside from the framedrops that I mentioned earlier the game ran always at over 60 FPS with all settings on maximum.

Repetetive 
The whole game feels this way, from the stories to the bases to .. everything. They did well giving another look to each base for sure but it does not feel as rewarding as it was in Just Cause 2. 

All in all I would still recommend this game to everyone who likes a good action open world sandbox, even though the setup is annoying. But the fun you will get out of this game is worth taking the 10 minutes to configure it. As long as you don't tab out of the game of course. :p

Rating: 8/10

Título: Overkill's The Walking Dead Xbox ONE
Descuento: No hay descuento para este juego :(
Géneros: ['Action', 'Adventure', 'Cooperation', 'FPS', 'Xbox ONE Games', 'Multiplayer', 'Zombies', 'Survival', 'Post-apocalyptic', 'Survival Horror', 'Violent', 'First-Person', 'Online Co-Op', 'Horror', 'Singleplayer', 'Gore', 'Open World', 'Shooter', 'Team-Based', 'Nudity', 'Story Rich']
Comentario: Jeu plutôt agrèable bien que le "Walking dead' dans le titre ne sert qu'à vendre le jeu en lui même et très cool ne vous attendais pas a foncer comme un bourin! non il vous faudrat réflechir et agir en équipe !

Gerade wegen der neuen Bruch-Manöver war ich anfangs skeptisch, schließlich können neue Mechaniken die Balance eines Fighting-Games stören und somit nach hinten losgehen. Im Test stellen sie sich dann jedoch als willkommene Ergänzung heraus, die sich wunderbar ins flüssige Kampfsystem einfügen und neue taktische Möglichkeiten eröffnen. Die herrlich knackigen Kämpfe sind noch immer die größte Stärke der Serie und spielen sich in Dead or Alive 6 geschmeidiger denn je.

Besonders gut gefallen mir zudem die neuen DOA-Quests, in die bereits etliche Stunden meiner Lebenszeit geflossen sind. Dank motivierenden Sternen-Jagd sowie abwechslungsreichen Missionszielen entwickeln die Quests eine Sogwirkung, der ich mich kaum entziehen kann und die mich sicherlich noch lange fest im Griff haben wird.

Título: Resident Evil 2: Deluxe Edition Xbox ONE
Géneros: ['Action', 'Adventure', 'Xbox ONE Games', 'Zombies', 'Survival Horror', 'Horror', 'Gore', 'Remake', 'Violent', 'Third Person', 'Singleplayer', 'Classic', 'Atmospheric', 'Story Rich', 'Survival', 'Puzzle', 'Dark', 'Female Protagonist', 'Difficult']
Comentario:
Estamos ante uno de los mejores juegos no solo del año, sino de la generacion. Es increible como un juego de la vieja escuela pueda volver a hacer historia en los tiempos que acorden, donde los videojugadores valoran mas los graficos, la violencia, y el componente online sobre todo lo extraordinario que ofrecen juegos como este.

Resident Evil 2 es un juego que nadie se deberia perder, si bien se de antemano que no es para todo el mundo, es un juego estresante, agobiante y sobre todo dificil; es para aquellas personas que valoran un reto sobre otras cosas, por supuesto, un survival horror con todas las letras. Y espero que Capcom entienda de una vez por todas que este es el camino a seguir, no solo haciendo remakes, sino nuevos juegos de la saga Resident Evil o de otras sagas muertas, o incluso nuevas, pero de esta manera, sin abusos contra los jugadores, y con una dosis impresionante de creatividad.

Tan solo me queda decir ¡Bienvenido de nuevo Resident Evil! Y espero que esto genere una nueva ola en juegos Survival Horror de este estilo, que ya lo veníamos necesitando desde hace mucho tiempo.

Lee la reseña completa acá... https://aportesur.com/resena-resident-evil-2-xbox-one/

Un bon petit jeu sympathique où on peut jouer à faire tourner les gens en bourrique, littéralement, cette oie est insupportable mais c'est très amusant de la jouer et de compléter ces petites quêtes sadiques, je recommanderais pour une séance de jeu plus chill.

Título: Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire Obsidian Edition
Géneros: ['Adventure', 'RPG', 'Strategy', 'Mac', 'Linux', 'Indies', 'Fantasy', 'Isometric', 'Story Rich', 'Singleplayer', 'Party-Based RPG', 'CRPG', 'Real-Time with Pause', 'Kickstarter', 'Atmospheric', 'Dark Fantasy', 'Open World', 'Exploration', 'Classic', 'Character Customization', 'Crowdfunded']
Comentario:
Pillars of Eternity 2: Deadfire is the sequel to the award winning game - Pillars of Eternity. This game has everything good about the first game plus even more interesting game elements. The biggest addition is the naval combat, which is there in spades. This game is like most other CRPGs where game offers you a chance to make the character you wish and level them up as they progress through the story as well as recruiting allies and teammates.

*Find Yourself!*
This game offers you a chance to create any character you wish. You can make them look however you wish in terms of appearance. You can choose from a variety of classes, you can be a druid or a mage, a wizard or a warrior the choice is wide and it is yours. You can also dual class and be a mix of different classes, for example you can be a battle-mage, a character who is focused on battling with a bit of magic to maybe buff yourself and allies. One thing the game does better than most other games in the genre is that it offers you a LOT of choices, as you level up in terms of new skills and abilities. The game also lets you choose to continue from your save in the first game, if you have played it. You basically take your character and a few decisions from the first game carry over. But fear not, if you haven’t played and are missing out on the story because this game does a good job of catching you up with the events of the previous game. Others have said that not playing the first one didn’t create a huge difference or gaps in story, but they wish that they have had played it, as it is also a great game.

*Best Combat in the Genre?*
I am a huge fan of this genre and out of all the games I must say this is the one. This is a huge compliment because a lot of games don’t do combat right in this genre. This game has real time combat with the ability to pause it. You can also have the AI to control your allies, although as you play more of the game I suggest you take control of them yourself for more precise decisions. This is something that the other games also have, but there is a certain way that combat has been balanced in PoE 2 that it makes everything feel just right without being too difficult to learn. Don’t get me wrong there is a learning curve for the hardcore fans, but the skill floor is quite low to accommodate for newer players of the genre.

*Ship Combat: Good or Bad?*
The answer to that question is - actually both. The naval combat in this game is good but can also be bad at times and that is the only negative thing I have to say about the game. The ship combat initially is quite dull compared to the rest of the game as it takes form in a text-based format. It makes the game feel like the text-based games from 30 years ago but with a lot of RNG. Although there are some elements that are good about it. There are several roles on the ship and you need the right people in the right role to do those jobs. If you have a surgeon firing the canons, then don’t expect to be hitting a lot of the shots. There is also boarding and that is the highlight of the naval combat. The combat scenarios that come up when you are boarding a ship or being boarded yourself are definitely one of the most fun times in this game. I don’t know why exactly but I guess it might be that it is very close quarters combat in a game like this doesn’t happen often.

*Hours and Hours of Content*
This game is definitely worth picking up and it even does a good job of easing newer players into the genre. It has hundreds of hours worth of content and that is just on a single playthrough. This game offers a tonne of re-playability with the option of multiple character with different playstyles. 

Reviewer: Neal UG

Literally nothing - not a single positive point comes in my mind for Battlefield V.
I am not going to explain why the game is one of the worst games ever developed & if you don't get why, please don't talk.
The actual best state of the game was after the release (Edited this review since then).

If you like this game; following things might be the reason:
- You are a casual & just want to play a game (that's totally okay btw)
- You were promoted/paid by EA/DICE to vote their game up (if so, no words for you)
- You started playing the BF franchise with Battlefield V and you have no idea what a good Battlefield is

Friendly reminder if you care about that point - Battlefield V reveal:
"There won't be any microtransactions! Everything can be unlocked trough just playing the game." 
Well, take a look now ;)

Just don't .. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY, NOR YOUR TIME. Why?
Worse than ever before. Just listing a few negative points:
- Lack of optimization 
- Bugs & glitches
- Complete mess called "movement"
- Input delay
- Week for week new unplayable playlists
- no RSP with plugins
- In-game / weapon & vehicle balance 
- Countless cheater 
- Skill trees instead of weapon attachments 
- Level & unlock system
- In-game UI
- Random recoil of guns
- Gunplay in general
+ 5 points down below.
... the list could go on.

@DICE SW / EA - Keep doing what you do: Ignore constructive feedback and you ruin your studio(s) even more then you already do now.

Or instead: Shut down this garbage piece of sh*t and don't ever touch Battlefield again, since you love to ruin great games and or genres anyway.

@DICE LA - Fix this game, PLEASE.

Dropped score from 30 to 10. Would even go lower than 0 if possible.

Think twice before buying Battlefield V.

Jump force est un bon jeu de salon pour dégommer ces amis avec son personnage préféré. Le jeu part d'un bon concept bien que totalement fan service (mais bon , qui na jamais voulue voir des combats goku vs luffy par ex ^^) , mais est-il bien exploité ?

Le fan service est bien au rdv avec plus de 40 personnages jouables , mais le reste beaucoup moins. Le mode histoire présente aucun intérêt c'est à peine si on le remarque , son seul but consiste à vous faire souffrir avec des dialogues / cinématiques interminable qu'on ne peut pas skip. 

Mais bon , somme nous la pour le scénar ? NON ! mais plus pour la baston , alors que donne ce système de combat. Bhaaaa , il est moyen , il a pour avantage d'avoir une prise en main facile , voir même trop. Il ne demande pas énormément de skill comme Street Fighter ou tekken pour lâcher de gros combo , le système reste trop assister. Et le système de garde lui est aussi robuste qu'un barrage de gilet jaune, il arrête absolument tout et ceci peu donner de combat bien vide contre certain adversaire... 
Si vous cherchez un système complexe vous allez être déçus , mais pour ceux qui veule juste se mettre sur la gueule avec des animations et effets spectaculaires vous n'allez pas être déçus.

Les graphismes sont excellent ainsi que les animations , le seul reproche qu'un peu trouver est que par moment avec certain coup , le jeu peu paraître surcharger d’animation et embrouiller le joueur , hors-ceci rien à redire.

En conclusion , le jeu reste plutôt bon et agréable à jouer , il est idéale pour jouer entre potes. Par contre il n'est pas du tout adapter pour la compétition à l'heure actuel à cause de la simplicité de son système de combat et son histoire est complètement secondaire. Le fan services est présent avec plus de 40 personnage jouable donc un qu'un peu personnaliser . Il mérite l'honorable note de 12/20

Géneros: ['Action', 'Adventure', 'Xbox ONE Games', 'Stealth', 'Singleplayer', 'Violent', 'Assassin', 'Third Person', 'Open World', 'Gore', 'Sandbox', 'Atmospheric', 'Puzzle', 'Online Co-Op', 'Nudity', 'Illuminati', 'Third-Person Shooter', 'Funny']
Comentario:
It is very sure that the gaming industry is progressing by leaps and bounds. As a result, we can see many amazing games have been developed. Multiple organizations are working in this niche, and no doubt, they have provided us excellent results. Actions games are one of the most lovable and played games. While visiting the web or the market, you will find a massive list of action games. If you are tied off playing old action games, then how about trying the most updated one? In this article, we are going to tell you about one of the most popular action games that are renowned for its storyline and other features.
"Hitman" is one of the best stealth video game series ever, and to keep your typical sequel expectations in check, it's best to think of Hitman 2 as season two of the 2016 revival. The game doesn't have numerous new highlights, yet it conveys every one of the six of its sharp murder sandboxes on the double.
If we compare hitman 2 with its old edition, we cannot observe many changes in it. Basically, it is quite similar to the previous one, but many more feature is added in it, and graphics are also improved. Simply, it will force you and will also keep you attract with the game.
The game continues the same story by the older version named as a Hitman. If you are curious to know about the amazing new additions and features and the reviews of hitman 2, then let's have a look at the features and reviews that will surely make you fall in love with this game.

More updated features of the Hitman 2
Some amazing features of a game become the reason for engagement between the player and the game. Similarly, some features of Hitman 2 will force you to play the game. One of the essential elements that the programmers have added in this game is the stunning map. At every new stage, you must require a locale with other variety.
Starting the game at the first stage, you will break into a deserted looking fortified beach home, and there you will learn some basics. After that, in other missions, you will explore many other locations. Each level is different from each other, not only story-wise, but the music, graphics, and various characters also play an important role.
Several challenging stages in the game:
If you are an energetic and adventurous person who loves to face challenges and are also fond of living and winning in a challenging environment, then hitman 2 is the best option for you. Hitman 2 is far different from other games where you immediately run to see the missions. Reading the maps in the game is quite tricky, and it will surely consume your precious time. The stunning part about hitman 2 is that at each level, several challenges are waiting for the player, and they are not like the ordinary ones that include killing 20 people or poisoning the person, and they are far more challenging and exciting than what you think. Hitman 2 will also give you many opportunities in the form of surprise challenges that will help you out to earn rewards and much more.

Impressive changes in the game
After attempting HitmanHitman, the audience was expecting more from the developers and no doubt, that they haven't disappointed us. It wouldn't be wrong in stating that hitman 2 came with the same features that we were expecting. Similarly, to the Hitman, you will get the chance to explore six different locations, and to complete your missions successfully, you will make use of people and objects present in your surroundings.
Even the progress criteria are the same that getting caught for the lowest number of times in-game during the mission means more success while the higher caught rate in a mission can lead to lower success or can even lead to a failure in the game. The overall changes and new additions in hitman 2 are more astonishing and breathtaking. It introduces the new qualities for Agent 47 that makes him more efficient as for hitman 2, and he can walk in-crowd, hide in tall trees, to see the enemies or target, a mirror can be used. Else then this, the UI changes are also remarkable.

Ghost mode in Hitman 2
While playing Hitman 2, you will become addicted to it, and you will attempt the same level several times just because while playing, you will understand the character behaviors mechanism and much more in a better way. To keep you connected and interested, Hitman 2 provides you with an amazing multi-player feature called ghost mode. This mode is a big attraction that lets you play against another player and become the first one to hit the target. Hitman is full of surprises and challenges that will always attract you to play it. There are a variety of ways to kill an enemy. Just play the game by yourself and explore what's interesting is inside it.

Power to create their own story
If you get control over the game, what's better than that and hitman 2 gives you the control of the game. Let us observe how Hitman 2 allows you to enjoy the game in your own style.
Well, this feature is not a new one in the gaming industry, but combining with other features enhances the quality of the game.

Cons of the game
As it is a fact, that everything has its pros as well as cons. In a similar way, Hitman 2 also has some cons in it. No doubt, hitman 2 is the perfect combo of entertainment and challenges; some people who have previously played HitmanHitman may or may not find it interesting or unique.
The basic reason behind the disappointment of the people in the game is its similarity with the previous version. There are a lot of new additions, but still, the new version is a continuity of the HitmanHitman. Having similar features in Hitman 2 can be a reason for disappointment for gamers.

Conclusion
Hitman 2 is a full package that contains both entertainment and knowledge in it. It is an attraction for the game lovers. Not just the game idea but its structure, and its music all are loved immensely. If it provides you with several capabilities and systems. It provides a player with various tools to kill and to perform other activities.
There is a strict scoring system in the game, and if you score 91/100 in the game, it is not a bad deal. If you have an interest in action games, then choosing hitman 2 is not the bad option, even it will also make progress in your gaming experience.

Reviewer: Oliver UG

Just Cause 4 is a TPS action game developed by Avalanche studio and published by Square Enix. It is the fourth game in the Just Cause series and the successor to its 2015 game Just Cause 3. A somewhat similar game to this one is Tom Clancy’s Ghost Recon: Breakpoint. They are the same genre, both are TPS shooter and you will find some similarities in the gameplay.
Just Cause 4 is set in a fictional South American country named Solis, which is home to some extreme weather conditions. The game has been launched at the end of 2018.

Special features
In this game you have a wingsuit which gives you some cool gameplay experience. You can go skydiving, base jumping and free dive with no limits. You will fight your enemies under some extreme weather conditions, including treacherous tornadoes and lighting storms. Also, a special thing in this game is that you can use the extreme weather events to your advantage thanks to the never seen before in-game physics.
The plot takes place after the events of Just Cause 3 when Rico Rodriguez is approached by a Solis native, Mira Morales. She convinces him to come to Solis to uncover the truth about Project Illapa. The projects scope is to create weather cores able to control the weather and create storms. Also, Miguel Rodriguez (Rico’s father) had a part in creating those. The project is run by the incumbent Solis leader Oscar Espinosa. He maintains strict control over the people of Solis. What you need to do is to dive into the South American nation of Solis, the homeland of the Black Hand and search of answers.

Graphics and art design
Even though the game still has some bugs the graphics will make up for it. The art design plus the graphics for this game make a good combination making it look somehow realistic with all the shadows and reflections. Speaking of the art design itself, it is very good giving the game a very tropical feeling.

Better that the Older Games?
This game still needs some improvements. The bugs must be fixed for sure, but after all this is still a good game. I can’t say for sure if this is better than some of the older ones in this series, but if you liked previous JC games, you will like this one for its story and gameplay. In conclusion, I can recommend this game for all TPS and JC lovers.

Reviewer: David UG

Le pecche visive non incidono troppo sulla qualità generale del gioco, persino a livello normale, soprattutto ad inizio/mid game, riesce ad essere abbastanza impegnativo e la varietà di potenziamenti sbloccabili (e quindi la personalizzazione), la personalità ben fatta dei Magi e la lore generale riescono a far apprezzare completamente le 16 ore necessarie per finire il gioco (io l'ho finito in 19 ore non completando parecchie missioni, immagino saltandole tutte sia possibile finirlo un po' più velocemente, ma completare il gioco al 100% credo richieda molto più tempo).

Non mi aspettavo molto da questo gioco, l'avevo scaricato dall'humble monthly solo perchè in questo giorni sono in fissa con Warhammer 40k, ma Mechanicus è un gioco a turni di tutto rispetto che è riuscito addirittura ad immergermi ancora di più nella storia di WH40k e a farmi ordinare il mio primo set di miniature di Warhammer 40k degli Adeptus Mechanicus.
