Comentario:
Juego por el que no pasan los años, se sigue disfrutando como el primer día manteniendo la magia que tanto nos hizo disfrutar.

Totalmente jugable en Windows 10 para rememorar los grandes momentos que sus campañas y su multijugador nos dieron.

Las campañas para jugar en solitario están rodeadas de grandes historias y momentos y su multijugador alarga la vida del juego inmensamente.

The game has a lot of issues but can br improved any time by the devs but overall experience has been pleasant. Although this was only in beta not long ago is been a very good experience mainly in coop more so than running in lone wolf

Géneros: ['Management', 'Simulation', 'Strategy', 'Mac', 'Linux', 'Indies', 'Medical Sim', 'Building', 'Economy', 'Sandbox', 'Singleplayer', 'Resource Management', 'Realistic', 'City Builder', 'Education', 'Isometric', 'Real-Time with Pause', 'Replay Value', 'Base Building', '2D', 'Moddable']
Comentario:
Enfin un jeu réaliste sur la gestion d'un hôpital, proche de l'esprit de la série Theme Hospital, mais sans des pathologies imaginaires.

Ici vous allez devoir construire votre hôpital et le gérer en recrutant le personnel, l'organiser en plusieurs services comme les urgences, la radioloagie, la cardiologie, la chirurgie général (interne), l'orthopédie, la neurologie...

La partie construction vous permet de créer des pièces que vous pourrez équiper avec pas mal de matériel, plusieurs éléments de décoration sont possibles. L'installation d'ascenseur vous permet de construire sur plusieurs étages. Les équipements se débloque à mesure que vous réalisés des objectifs pour des assurances, d'ailleurs ce sont ces dernières qui vous enverrons un quota de patient par jour.

Côté gestion, il vous faudra recruter des personnels qualifiés suivant le poste. Leur expérience augmentera avec la pratique et un jeune médecin deviendra performant avec le temps. Il faudra organiser des équipes de jour et nuit, cependant l’hôpital ne fonctionne pas 24h/24 pour les urgences, c'est plus proche d'une clinique. Malgré ce détail, vos ambulances répondent quand même aux urgences que peuvent couvrir vos services.

Le petit plus, c'est que vous avez possibilité de prendre en main directement des patients et décider des examens et traitement approprié, car suivant l'efficacité du personnel, certains diagnostiquent peuvent être erronés.

Les graphismes en vue isométrique sont détaillés, mais il n'est pas possible de faire pivoter la vue. Intégralement traduit en français, il vous permettra de comprendre mieux certaines pathologies.

Un titre recommandé aux fans de construction/gestion, l'approche du jeu reste assez compliquée et demande un temps d'adaptation, les explications ne sont pas toujours très clair sur les différentes interactions avec les salles.

https://youtu.be/NVVL846gEdQ

Comentario:
Un super jeu de plateforme vous attend, beaucoup d'humour, des challenges parfois un peu faciles, parfois durs parce qu’on a juste pas pensé à utiliser un autre personnage.

The Cave a une jouabilité limitée au nombre de personnage certes, mais l’expérience est assez plaisante pour y remettre le nez quelques années plus tard et tout redécouvrir croyez moi.

Paradoxalement très mignon et sarcastique, il est assez cours, mais pas beaucoup plus qu'un Portal par exemple (attention, simple comparaison temporelle, les énigmes n'ont absolument rien à voir).

Un pâle mode coopératif est présent, mais il n'apporte vraiment pas grand chose. Rien à voir avec un Trine par exemple, de mon point de vue The Cave est un bon petit jeu solo !

Un petit bijou de + sorti tout droit de chez Capcom, des clins d’œil aux épisodes de la première heure sur NES datant de maintenant 30 ans. La difficulté du jeu mettra à rude épreuve vos réflexes à la manette comme naguère quand cette foutue manette nous bousillait les mains avec ses coins carrés, des graphismes et des animations en cell-shading de très bonne facture, des musiques qui vous rappelleront le synthétiseur midi de la NES... Bref, c'est une licence à faire perdurer et à faire connaitre aux plus jeunes, j'ai adoré.

Veramente bello! Questo gioco và consigliato a tutti gli amanti dei 3D Platform o a chi semplicemente ama lo stile grafico "cartoonoso" che contraddistingue questo gioco. Colonne sonore ottime e una storia non troppo impegnata.
Il Gameplay è lineare a un normale platform anche se alcune situazioni possono essere risolte in più modi.
Consigliato!

Un peu rouspéter pour avoir 3 jeux pour une campagne, mais en réalité, chaque faction a assez de mission pour se suffire en lui même plus que ses prédécesseurs. Il est bien pensé, belle amélioration et on a des moments entre missions. Les histoires se sont approfondis et chaque faction a non son gameplay, mais aussi son gameplay en campagne. j'ai juste la sensation que ça se réduit au fil des campagnes (comme le choix morale passer outre après les terrans). Je n'ai pas le dlc nova par contre.

Personalmente l'ho provato con Live Gold e posso dire che ha un buon gameplay, una fisica fatta bene ed è fatto in modo realistico il gioco, non so se è una migliorazione rispetto a NHL 18 ma, prendendo il gioco singolarmente, questo gioco va ben oltre la sufficienza

Título: Total War: Rome II Caesar Edition
Géneros: ['Action', 'Strategy', 'Historical', 'Turn-Based Strategy', 'Grand Strategy', 'Rome', 'Tactical', 'Turn-Based', 'Real Time Tactics', 'RTS', 'Singleplayer', 'Online Co-Op', 'Turn-Based Tactics', 'Moddable', 'Atmospheric', 'Education']
Comentario: I didn't buy Rome 2 at release, because I saw it wasn't even playable, but I have to say CA did a fantastic job with patches, and since Emperor Edition the game is really enjoyable. I have played every Total War since Empire, and it is better than all three of them. The grand campaign is sick because the map, despite a few flaws is awesome, and the units are both well made and balanced, especially with mods like Radious installed. The game is way more complex as well, building cities is actually a quite realistic and fun thing to do, and combat has improved a lot, especially combat AI. The AI is actually clever now, aside from a few bugs here and there, but that and all the combat related issues come from the Warscape engine, that dates back to Empire. The same goes for the lags in large battles like sieges or bridge. All in all a very good total war game!

Oh..For Honor..where to start with this game.
This is definately one of my favourite games of all time.When the game launched it was really one of a kind.The characters,the mechanics of the game,the atmosphere and the graphics.
Everything is spectacular.
The game as an idea is totally awesome.I mean,who wouldn't want to control real-time legendary fights between ancient warriors.
For Honor offers many characters for you to choose what suits your playstyle the most.
It's a really fun game to play with your friends when you're way better than them since it feels awesome to hear them cry when you stab them in the foot with your Gladiator!
The game is still alive after all these years..Its community is much smaller now than before but there are still people that are enjoying themselves playing it.
Regular updates are a thing.There is always new content coming up.By saying new content i mean new characters to play cause as far as the events and gamemodes are concerned,your options are really limited.
On the other side of the spectrum though,the game is owned by Ubisoft and this tells us a lot.
It's a great game idea as i said before but the balance between the game characters is ridiculous.Some characters are way op and some others are just dogshit if you can't actually handle them like a pro.
In conclusion,For Honor is an awesome game to play and have fun,but it's also a game that would easily make you throw your keyboard at a wall and make you atheist.I would recommend you to buy it only because it offers a unique experience that no other game of its genre can actually offer you right now.
Enjoy the game!
**ps: Play characters like shugoki or nobushi and tell everyone you got skills!Ez ragequits! :D

지저분한 악몽
우선 게임을 끝 마칠 수 없다는 사실부터 시작하고 싶습니다. 왜냐하면 게임은 항상 마지막 경주 시리즈 중 하나에서 충돌하기 때문에 진행 상황을 방해합니다 (4 번 연속). 그리고 내가 1을 배치 할 때만 충돌합니다. 나는 시리즈를 한 번 잃어 버렸고 3 위를 차지했지만 충돌하지 않았습니다. 기묘한...
이 게임의 또 다른 문제는 연삭입니다. 최종 시리즈의 잠금을 해제하려면 77000 포인트가 필요합니다. 그리고 그것이 무엇을 의미하는지 모른다면, 내가 말해 줄 것입니다. 이 게임에는 "존중 시스템"이 있습니다. 레이스 중에는 다양한 행동 (표류, 위치 획득, 무너짐이없는 랩 등)에 대한 포인트가 있습니다. 레이스에서 승리하면 750 포인트가 주어지고 스타일로 운전할 때 최대 250 점을 얻을 수 있으므로 레이스 당 1000이 최대입니다.
이제 슬픈 부분이 온다. 일부 시리즈에는 1v1 드래그 레이스가 있으며 매우 짧으며 기본적으로 직선입니다. 직선으로 250 점 (주로 표류하기위한 것)을 얻는 방법은 무엇입니까? 최종 승무원에 도착하면 약 73000-75000 포인트를 얻게됩니다. 이제 모든 단일 레이스 시리즈를 재생해야하지만 대부분 1000 점을 얻으려고 노력합니다 (앞서 언급 한 드래그 레이싱 맵에서는 거의 불가능합니다). 당신의 갈기와 함께 행운을 빌어 요!

다음 문제는 게임 경제입니다. 경주 시리즈에서 우승하고 12000 달러를 받았다고 말하지만, 당신은 서투르게 운전하고 있었고 구석 구석마다 항상 차를 추락했습니다. 잘 뭘요? 수리하려면 약 10000 $을 지불해야합니다. (약간 저렴하고 차에 따라 다름). 따라서 실제 소득은 생각보다 훨씬 적습니다. 적어도 AI를 사용하여 베팅을 할 수 있습니다. 더 나은 자동차를 구하려고 할 때 약간 도움이됩니다.

마지막 문제는 엔터테인먼트 가치의 부족입니다. 처음에는 컷씬이 1 개, 끝에는 YouTube에 1이 있습니다. 또한 처음에는 몇 가지 튜토리얼 메시지가 있습니다. 당신은 또한 임의의 AI 캐릭터를 경주하고 (매우 지루해집니다), 자동차를 업그레이드하고, 새로운 차를 구입하십시오 (충분한 돈을 저축 한 경우) 소녀를 데리러 오십시오. 당신의 차 운전을 자동적으로 보는 쓸모없는 특징 (3 개의 관광 장소에서만).
다른 모든 것은 단지

N'ayan pas jouer au premier du nom n'étant pas attirer par les graphisme, je me suis laisser tenter par le 2 et je ne le regrette absolument pas ! Se jeux a vraiment tout pour plaire. 

Le jeux ne se prend pas la tête sur une quelconque stratégie ou autre, c'est un jeux somme toute dans un principe de fonctionnement tout simple, on a un vaisseaux, on améliore ou crée de nouvelle arme, on suis les quète, on gagne de l'argent, on combat, on achète de meilleur vaisseaux, en soit le principe de base est simple.

L'histoire est intéressante, sans être exceptionnelle, les combat sont très beaux, immersif et parfois tactique, le choix des armes est large, le choix des vaisseaux encore plus, et le système de récupération de plan pour ensuite crée des arme, chasseur ou amélioration encore plus puissante est vraiment sympas. Le système qui permet d'améliorer chaque facette du vaisseaux ( comme les bouclier, les arme, les réacteur ) est aussi très interessante.

Se que se jeux a de plus, c'est le fait de pouvoir récupérer les vaisseau adverse en les abordant et en les ramenant a une station spacial ou une base, qui nous demande de vendre ou de garder le vaisseau. On peut aussi choisir de se faire accompagner par 2 mercenaire qui combattrons a nos cotée et de lancer 3 escadrille de chasseur. On a aussi la possibiliter de traquer des '' héro '' qui rapporte une grosse prime a chaque héro abattue, avec une difficulté plus ou moins élevée.

Les 2 DLC du jeux rajoute a eux seul beaucoup de contenue.

Seuls points négatifs pour moi, les mercenaire qu'on engage reste trop loin du vaisseau et intervienne trop lentement, quelque beug très perturbant bien que vraiment rare ( le vaisseau du joueur qui se détruit sans aucune raison avec la vie pleine ), la trop grande faciliter a vendre les arme rare par erreur et enfin, le fait que le jeux devienne assez restreins une fois que tout est fait, même si c'est très long a faire.

En bref un jeux que je conseille vraiment au fan de combat galactique, au fan de grande variéter de vaisseaux et a ceux qui aime les combat sans prise de tête.

Comentario:
Postal 2 is a first-person game that is can be, as dark-humored as you make it. The game has a fully interactive story. This game is a sequel to the original Postal game.
Postal 2 is a game about performing daily errands. The game is a classic, with a ton of re-playability.

How dark do you like it?
Postal 2 has a fully interactive story. You can choose what to do. You can peacefully complete these errands, or create a chaotic environment while completing them. No worries though as the concept of the story is easy to pick up and enjoy. The game includes 89 achievements that can be earned easily while playing the game. The errands in the game can be as easy as returning some library books or buying some milk from the store. You can just do these and nothing else, or create a chaotic environment for everyone. This is a basic summary of the game. 

Feels right:
The story is completely comical. However, please just know that this game can come off as offensive at times. Guns are used in the game as frequent as you choose to use them. The gunplay is pretty good for such a classic. There are a variety of guns to choose from. They each feel pretty realistic, with a realistic tone to them.

Graphics and Sound: In a single-player game, graphics and sound is everything. The game manages exceeds my expectations. The game is graphically pleasing. The audio is wonderful, it has the perfect ring to it. The game’s audio and graphics are easily comparable to a newer game, even though this game is over 15 years old! Although single-player games aren’t as popular, as multi-player games because overall they usually feel the same. This game is an exception because of the originality of the game. The game has the 3 things necessary for a good game, good audio, graphics, and gunplay. This game manages to exceed these, even for being so old. The length of the story depends on what you do. It offers a ton of re-playability.

Reviewer: Daniel UG

Título: Need for Speed: Payback 4600 Speed Points

Comentario:
On pourrait croire que la couleur noir et blanc rend le jeu fade. Mais ces deux couleurs correspondent parfaitement au type de pixel du jeu. Fait que si y'aurait des couleurs (comme du vert du marron ou du bleu) ça aurait rendu le jeu très moche.

J'ai complété pas mal de jeu plateforme, et ça m'amuse de voir tous ceux qui les comparent tous sans arrêt à Limbo et Inside. Comme l'impression que ces gens là n'ont pas d'autres références à part ces deux jeux là. Mais là j'avoue que c'est le jeu qui correspond le + au mélange des deux. Fait que là on a un Limbo et un Inside en même temps. 

Les énigmes sont hyper faciles, j'ai terminé le jeu en 4.2h et en dessous des 4h ça aurait été largement possible. D'ailleurs en one-shot en connaissant tout il se termine en 2h. Donc c'est un jeu relativement court et malgré cela on retrouve quand même énormément d'avis négatifs sur Steam. A part deux endroits où j'étais bloqué parce qu'il fallait aller chercher en hauteur (et pas regarder que ses pieds), le jeu est parfait, c'est un de mes favoris

Excellent game, loved the story and the gameplay. The characters are deep and engaging especially if you played the other ME before. On the downside, there are definitely some fillers in the game which does make it drag on abit and should really be removed.

Graphically, the game is still good, not as great as some of the modern titles but has a very familiar look and feel to the ME universe.

The voice acting is superb as well as the animation. 

I did find however, after a while the combat to be a bit repetitive, it was fun to experiment with biotics at the start. But after you set up combinations that work, its rinse and repeat. Then again this is true of most games and you can change the game setting to a "story experience" to speed things up.

Definitely worth getting but please play ME1 and ME2 so that you have a continuation of the story if possible.

Géneros: ['Adventure', 'RPG', 'Strategy', 'Cooperation', 'Multiplayer', 'Mac', 'Linux', 'Fantasy', 'Isometric', 'Dungeons & Dragons', 'Party-Based RPG', 'Classic', 'CRPG', 'Real-Time with Pause', 'Singleplayer', 'Character Customization', 'Story Rich', 'Old School', 'Magic', 'Cult Classic', 'Medieval']
Comentario:
Icewind Dale: Enhanced Edition is a remaster of a classic fantasy CRPG game that goes by the name of “Icewind Dale”. This game can be considered a virtual Dungeons and Dragons game as well, as it shares a lot of similarities in its RPG aspect. This game is also what has inspired many of the best selling isometric RPGs in the market currently, such as the Divinity: Original Sin and Pillars of Eternity games.

*Write your own stories!*
This game, like the more recent entries in the genre, has a vast and deep character creation system even though this game is around 15 years old! You can choose from a variety of gender, races and professions as well as allocate stats and traits. As you progress through the game you will realize that the story of your friend’s tale and yours will be completely different, simply because of the decisions you have made in the game. At each crossroad or each issue that comes to you in the game there will be a number of different options available for you to take and make your character, be whoever you want them to be. If you want your character to be diplomatic, you can do that, if you want them to be arrogant and cocky you can do that as well. The choice is yours.

*Graphics remade?*
The original game’s graphics definitely looks very dated when compared to modern day gaming. But the Enhanced Edition has polished it up and made it look more modern while keeping the iconic art-style, which is extremely special to the people who have played the original game. Even if the Enhanced Edition graphics aren’t up to the standards of Divinity or Pillars, but don’t let that fool you as this game has so much depth to make up for its shortcomings (which are few). This game has so much quality to offer and to wide variety of tastes. If you like RPGs, sound/music design, art design or great storytelling there is something for you in this game.

*Make your fantasies a reality in this game*
This game lets you go on your own fantasies and adventures, make them a reality, as this game is definitely worth picking up. If you are a fan of RPGs and would like to see how they got to where they are today, then this game will show you what they were like 10-15 years ago. If you are just a fan of quality PC games, then this has quality in spades. Or if you are a game collector than this is definitely a must have for the game library!

Reviewer: Michael UG

J'ai adoré ce jeu notamment grâce a son humour assez fort mais très bien maîtriser et ses référence. Le concept du jeu est assez simple et basique mais la tournure du jeu et très bien faite. Vous ne pouvez qu'aimé ce jeu :')

Comentario: „Über 1000 Generationen lang sind die Jedi-Ritter in der Alten Republik die Hüter des Friedens und der Gerechtigkeit gewesen. Bevor es dunkel wurde in der Welt, vor dem Imperium.“(Obi-Wan, Episode 4). Für uns ist nur der erste Satz wichtig denn wir tauchen in die Alte Republik ein, ca 3000 Jahre vor Vaders Aufstieg. Dieses Spiel hat eine klasse Story und eine sehr tolle Atmosphäre. Das Spiel hat eine Vielzahl an Klassen und Storys und tausende von Nebenquest. Es gibt viele Planeten die man bereist bekannte sowie unbekannte. Was BioWare dort geschaffen hat kommt an die Stories der Original Filme heran. Es macht super viel Spaß dieses Spiel zu erleben. Es ist auf jeden Fall mein lieblings Star Wars Spiel

Si has jugado a red orchestra anteriormente, te gusta el juego en equipo y te llama mas la simulación que lo arcade, te encantará.
-Los efectos de sonido son brutalmente inmersivos. Las balas silbando, oir los stukas, el rugir de los motores panzer....una experiencia excepcional. 
-Gráficamente es notable a pesar de que le falta mejor optimización.
-Jugabilidad de curva lenta, haber jugado a juegos similares ayuda mucho, de lo contrario, recomendado ver tutoriales.
Temo que, como con otros muchos juegos, los servidores queden abandonados a las pocas semanas o meses.

Survival połączony z dobrą fabułą. W Smoke and Sacrifice akcję ukazano w rzucie izometrycznym. Eksplorację otwartego świata utrudnia złożony ekosystem, na który składają się nie tylko wrogo nastawione istoty przypominające zwierzęta, lecz także groteskowe, poruszające się rośliny oraz nieprzyjaźni mieszkańcy krainy; dopełnieniem tego wszystkiego jest tytułowy dym, który może pozbawić bohaterkę wspomnień, a nawet życia, lub zmienić zachowanie istot znajdujących się pod jego wpływem. 
Cechą charakterystyczną Smoke and Sacrifice jest ręcznie rysowana grafika wysokiej jakości.

Overview
Blackwake is a massively multiplayer game centered around naval combat. This game is what Sea of Thieves should have been. You can have massive ship battles against other players. You board ships and fight with guns in first person perspective, which gives this game an FPS element. This game will give you many wonderful hours of playing with friends while fighting off other pirates in the open seas.

Raising a Black Flag
Are you ready kids? Aye aye Captain!
This game has a lot of depth. You can have a ship of upto 10 players with each getting their own role. You may be in charge of manning the cannons, which actually feels realistic and feels amazing when you shoot them. You aim through a small opening in the side of the ship. In the middle of a fight, when your ship takes some damage, you and your crew have to be prepared to split up tasks, as one of you will have to go and patch up the ship, while someone else pumps out the water leaking into the ship. And at the same time, remember to keep shooting those cannons at the enemy. You can even board enemy ships by shooting your grappling hooks. Thankfully, the devs prevents online trolls from ruining your experience by making you need orders from your captain, who is chosen by popular vote, to do so. Fights in Blackwake can get chaotic very quickly, but as long, as you are playing with some friends this will be a blast for sure!

Shoot his head off!
Once the boarding begins, Blackwake becomes an FPS. You will have your loadouts with various guns to choose from, such as: a blunderbuss, a musket, or even just a standard pistol. Moments like calmly drinking tea at the heat of the battle to recover some hp while your friends yell orders and requests for help can be funny as well and adds to the charm of the game. One of the biggest positives for this game is that it has made communication very easy. Even if you don’t have a mic, you won’t have many problems since this game has a really well made commo rose similar to that found in the battlefield series. As you may have guessed, this was a great move by the devs as this game requires a lot of communication.

We’re flooding, Captain!
As for the negatives, the only one right now is the fact that the game doesn’t have a large player base, but you can chalk that down to the game being a niche early access game. Don’t expect this to be a problem after full release. 

Pirates Night!
Personally, this is a fun game to play in some free time with friends. That being said, you can always find players on forums and such to organize play sessions with, quite easily. Trying to keep the chaos that the combat of Blackwake inevitably descends to with friends is an experience that you will want to keep returning to. The game is incredibly well made with the only problem being its somewhat small player base, but once you can find a few friends to play with, it won’t really be a problem. Recommended! 

Reviewer: Sylla

Comentario:
As someone who beat Just Cause 1 and 2 I can say that the third installment is the best game of the series so far. 

Not only the controls feel much better, the new gadgets like the (Bavarium powered) wingsuit and the retracting tethers alone sell it for me. Out of ammo? Just pull a helicopter into a gas tank and watch it explode. The world design is just amazingly done and beautiful. It is smaller than Panau from Just Cause 2, but also better filled with interesting landmarks and a better variety of things to blow up. Yes the story and characters are as cheesy as they can get. But do you really expect some serious characters with a rich and interesting past to tell you about? This game is just like it's predecessors a playable action movie with a lot of freedom where you can play with your creativity.

But there is a few big downside which are pretty much unnecessary and could've been avoided in making this game. 

downside:+ a few negative points under this text
performance
The performance is sometimes and without tweaking a catastrophe. My PC is high-end and so way over the recommended requirements (i7 7700k, 16GB ram, GTX1070, game installed on SSD) and the FPS sometimes just tank down to ~40 FPS. But that luckily rarely happened in my hours of play time. A simple restart of the game also fixed that for me. 

There is a very helpful guide in the steam guides posted that helps fixing the performance completely. Aside from the framedrops that I mentioned earlier the game ran always at over 60 FPS with all settings on maximum.

Repetetive 
The whole game feels this way, from the stories to the bases to .. everything. They did well giving another look to each base for sure but it does not feel as rewarding as it was in Just Cause 2. 

All in all I would still recommend this game to everyone who likes a good action open world sandbox, even though the setup is annoying. But the fun you will get out of this game is worth taking the 10 minutes to configure it. As long as you don't tab out of the game of course. :p

Rating: 8/10

Comentario:
De l'humour, des clichés, des clins d'oeils à des série connues, et un héros comique de service à l'accent sarcastique.
Bienvenue dans Zenith ;)

Les dialogues parfois vulgaires et les blagues/insinuations douteuses ne sont pas tout publique mais m'ont bien fait rire.

Fini à 100% en 10H.
Pas de difficulté, ce jeu se joue vraiment pour son histoire qui si elle n'a pas d'originalité (sauver le monde) amène les rebondissements avec beaucoup de bonne humeur et d'humour.

Musiques : entraînantes et bien adapté à l'univers du jeu.

Graphismes : bon.

Un bug collision sur l'ensemble du jeu qui m'a forcé à charger ma partie.

Gameplay : on ne se prend pas la tête. 
Par élément : 1 enchaînement Cac, 1 att. distante, 1 aoe. Et de toute façon on on ne finit par ne faire que les aoe vu les dégâts et l'inefficacité des autres attaques.
3 éléments seulement, mais si ça parait peu, je préfère ça à certains jeux qui se perdent dans des 8/9 éléments où l'on ne sait pas quoi jouer.
Tous les éléments se valent. Leur puissance ne va être définie que par les pièces d'armures.

Quelques quêtes annexes qui peuvent s'accomplirent tout au long de l'histoire.

Je le recommande vivement à tous ceux qui veulent passer un bon moments sans se prendre la tête.

Counter-Strike Source est un excellent FPS, bien que les années soient passées, on peut dire que ce jeu est indémodable et un des meilleurs des Counter-Strike. Une très grande communauté mature est présente sur le jeu et un très grand nombre de serveurs sont accessible mais faites attention il y a à boire et à manger, ne vous fiez pas à tous les serveurs car je rappelle que les serveurs sont ceux des joueurs.

L'une des qualités de ce jeu est la diversité des cartes qui sont proposées vous pouvez passer d'un mode de jeu extrêmement stratégique à un mode de jeu très fun où le but est de traverser une map semée d’embûches avec des pièges qui vous ferons rager certaines fois ^^.

Ce jeu rend vraiment addictif, je vous conseille vraiment le mode gungame qui vous occupera pendant vos soirées de nuit blanche. Sinon je vous pouvez également avoir votre propre serveur et le gérer comme bon vous semble, ce qui vous donnera certaines responsabilisées assez plaisante.
Je peut dire sans crainte que ce jeu peut tourner sur un très large panel de PC.

The best Hitman game so far

Finally Hitman is back. I was disappointed by Absolution, it was a very dumbed down Hitman game, with only couple of good levels first being the best one. The new Hitman game gave everything I desired and more.

It is a completely different game. You’re being thrown into huge levels and must eliminate your targets. But unlike in Absolution you can choose countless ways to do that. You can explore the maps, find disguises and walk almost freely everywhere or you can sneak. You can kill innocent people or just knock them out. Shooting everyone will not work here like it worked in Absolution. You can make your game easy or hard depending on your playstyle. Sneaking while wearing suit might be very hard. If you get appropriate disguise you’re safe to walk around. So it’s up to you how to play. Disguise works differently now and has logic to it. If lets say you knock out a security guard and get his uniform, some security guards will get suspicious but most of them will not notice there's something wrong with you. Same goes for all other disguises, so while you can move freely you must avoid some people.

You can simply follow your targets and kill them, you can lure them into a bathroom by poisoning their drink and drown them in a toilet, you can set up an accident and electrocute or blow up your target. If you have a required tool you can disguise as mechanic for example and drop the lamp on your poor target. You can infiltrate the most secure zone, make your target think that you’re someone else, talk to him and then kill him. There are countless ways to achieve your goal. This game has really good replayability value, it has challenges and various timed events, so every playthrough can be totally different.

Graphics are really nice, can’t say anything bad about it. Game runs well, there’s many object on the screen and many things happening on the map, fps stays steady most of the time. Game looks brilliant, so much detail, so much going on.

Many people disliked episodic format. I personally liked it. There are couple of reasons why. First is that releasing episode after episode developers always can improve the next episode depending on user feedback. Another thing is, if you want to buy it day one you don’t need to spend 60€ on it, you buy one episode, save some money, buy another one, so it works better for people who can’t pay full price. It’s a shame if this was the reason why the game sold poorly. But I think there’s another reason to it which contributed to poor sales. Absolution…well…it wasn’t good, people were disappointed and were afraid to buy this one, especially when it’s released by Square Enix, I love them, own most of their games, but sometimes they make stupid decisions. But to my surprise this game has only one DLC and no pre-order. I hope the second season will follow the same formula – no DLC and pre-order bonuses.

Another thing people disliked is always online. I personally have no problems with that, but I can understand those who has. But hey it's 2017, who doesn't have internet these days?

So if you like absolute freedom, sandbox style gameplay, want many hours of enjoyment get this, you’ll not be disappointed.

une jeu très sympathique à l'ambiance reposante. fonds marins bien representés même si j'aurais apprécié un peu plus de netteté coté graphiqme (je joue pourtant en quad HD)

les missions sont simples le but étant surtout de se promener et de découvrir différents lieux (au nombre de 3) qui se ressemblent quand même assez (clarté de l'eau et variété des poissons qui varient)

le jeu ne fait que 750mo, il est donc vite téléchargé même pour les petites connexion.

a noter que si vous avez un casque VR comme le HTC Vive, ce jeu est idéal en mode cinéma... on s'y crois encore plus.

une bonne expérience à un prix ridicule.

Comentario:
Le jeu est juste Excellent il y a très peu de point de négatif. Je trouve le jeu assez Lent et le système d'abonnement ma saoulé, a par ça le jeu est vraiment varié.

Il y a beaucoup de classe, une très bonne communauté, le PVE est au rendez vous, au bug niveau serveur, l'ambiance est prenante.... (etc)

The game looks and sounds great. The landscapes vary and look beautiful. The gameplay is also good and very fast (as it should be for an AG-Racing). The problem is that the tracks have so many turns and curves that you can't really catch the beauty of the track and they seem quite random (combined with the game's speed). Also there should be a way to remap the keys for the gamepad (using the triggers to throttle and brake in an AG-Racer isn't a good option for me). A very good game in overall that would be a masterpiece with a few corrections. 
On a side-note, don't expect any physics. The game is 100% arcade and cannot be compared with other AG-Racers like Formula Fusion.

Comentario:
A good game, and a very good deal for this price.

As a good Rogue-like, difficulty is crecendo, and tactic choices will be very important.

Release date change on steam,
"Shoppe Keep 2 will now launch on 3rd May 2018 at 9AM PST/5PM BST."
So if you want to play this game you'll have to wait another week sadly :(
Still hyped but sad at the same time.

Meaningless campaign, entertaining multiplayer and few innovations. 
Call of Duty: Ghosts is here and is really in the ordinary Call of Duty-fashion.

"So we can't change too many of the core rules, and the core rules are really simple. You're a player, it's in first-person, you have a weapon in your hand and you run around shooting other people." 

The words above come from Infinity Wards executive producer Mark Rubin and is about the Call of Duty series. He draws a parallel between the incredibly popular game series and football, and says that if one of the sport's suddenly decided to only have seven players on the pitch and that you also get to use your hands, the people would loose interest and stop attending matches.
This conservative philosophy exist for the huge crowd of fans of the series who will recognize it and not get lost in strange novelties. 
And it has left a distinct mark on the new addition to Call of Duty: Ghosts, as in every way, this is exactly what one would expect of a new game in the series.

The campaign begins in an idyllic American place where you sit and talk with your father and brother.
In ordinary Call of Duty-fashion, there are not many minutes before the first explosion color the sky red and the everything falls into chaos. 
Bombs are slamming into the right and left, buildings destroyed before your eyes and you have to survive at any cost.
It starts out pretty good with a premise that arouses interest. 
The South American Federation takes control of the weapon Odin and kills millions of American citizens with bombs. When they have the upper hand they invade the injured shot nation that relies on it feared special dressing Ghosts to turn things around and win the war against all odds.

The campaign is just as exciting and intense as one would expect, with so many explosions that you almost get a nice tan in front of the screen. In a never-ending stream of scenes, we take us through runaway trains, drive a snowmobile across frozen lakes, deep dive among sharks and visit the vacuum of space while we are shooting thousands of opponents to death.
But unfortunately, while the campaign is very full of action, it's completely brain dead. 
Some scenes are so stupid that I just laugh out straight. Clichés succeed each other and to say the least incredible sequence of events is explained with intrigue that could have been written by monkeys at the zoo. 
Or how about a good guy transformed into a vicious sadist who's fed with crops from the South American 

And we have it here with the Call of Duty dog. Infinity Ward assured that we would care about this mutt that comes with along the way, but that is not the case, and the question is rather if they tried to achieve that goal at all. My dog is acting in a fairly useless in a Supporting Role as quickly wasted and then fall in total oblivion. Infinity Ward know their explosions and "follow the leader with Weapons" torques, but to tell a believable and interesting story, they really can't.
Fortunately, the multiplayer is still the series' strengths and savior. For the most part, I'm having a lot of fun with the various play modes. My favourite mode is "hunted" - a situation where one armed with a pistol at the beginning of the round and then must collect crates to get access to better firepower. Free for all on the game's smallest maps are wonderfully chaotic with the perfect balance between chance and skill.

For me, standing just outside the core group who love the series for what it is, it becomes problematic with few functioning news. Should not a giant company, Activision, with all the money resounding success of Call of Duty draws in, deliver something bigger? Something that makes me lose my breath as nails sticking controller in my hands and pushing me to defy feelings of fatigue and hunger?
There are probably things you don't have time for when a new game is to be replaced every year - then it might just be more of the same. 
Which in the case of Call of Duty: Ghosts works very well because its heart-racing action as the series' hallmark still stands up so well in the competition and delivers an entertaining multiplayer experience.

The question is: How long does it?

Un point n'click au style retro, qui renferme un vrai mystère.

Ambiance soignée, doublages au top, et une immersion agréable via une héroïne un peu décalée.
Un vrai coup de coeur.

Ajoutez à cela un aspect "temps réel", puisque nous avons quelques jours pour le terminer, il y a comme un lien avec la vie réelle : au sens où, chaque chapitre est divisé en "journées".
Excellente idée.

Comptez 10-15h réelles en traînant.

Título: Company of Heroes 2: Master Collection Steam
Géneros: ['Action', 'Adventure', 'Simulation', 'Strategy', 'Wargame', 'Mac', 'Multiplayer', 'Cooperation', 'Linux', 'World War II', 'RTS', 'Tactical', 'Historical', 'Singleplayer', 'Military', 'Online Co-Op', 'Tanks', 'Real-Time', 'Real-Time with Pause', 'Base Building', 'Atmospheric']
Comentario:
Company of Heroes 2
The gaming industry has become one of the largest industries in the world. Every year multiple games are released in the market, and it wouldn’t be wrong to state that those games earn a massive amount from gamers. A successful match comprises multiple elements including, extraordinary graphics, a good storyline, and well-designed characters.
Well, today, we are here with a review of the second part of the Company of Heroes and we are going to touch this game deeply. While discussing the details of the game, we will also let you know the rating of the Company of Heroes 2. A lot of facts about his game are going to be revealed in this article, so read it carefully to check whether this game meets your expectations or not.

Overview
Relic entertainment develops Company of Heroes 2, and a well-known company, Sega published it. It is a real-time strategy game that comes up with multiple missions, fabulous rounds, and perfectly designed characters, weapons, and other items. The game explains the tragic story of World War 2 in which thousands of people were killed, and Germany had to face a destructive moment. A great environment of war has been introduced in this game in which you have to fight along with your force to save your motherland.

Gameplay
A player has to capture the flagged points placed at the specific spots on the map to collect fuel credits and munitions. These items will be invested in assembling the units. The point can be captured only if the player’s units are inside a zone, and there mustn’t be any unit of the enemy in the same area.
You have to attack the enemy’s unit to capture the whole area, and the items present there. Units can occupy public buildings, and they can use it as their temporary area. You will get an extensive collection of guns, grenades, armors, daggers, and other items in the game. If we talk about the weather condition, it has been shown the blood-freezing cold weather. In the few maps, you will also see the dead bodies of the troops stuck inside the snow.

Requirements and other Important Details
Company of Heroes 2 is designed for multiple platforms and you can enjoy it on Microsoft Windows, macOS, and Linux platforms. It is available in both single-player and multiplayer mode, which means you can enjoy this game with your friends or solo. The company of heroes is not a big game; you can smoothly run it on a computer with a dual-core processor. Other than the processor, a high-quality 256 MB graphic card along with 30 GB free disk space should be available on your PC.

Overall Rating
The evaluation of the Company of Heroes 2 is much impressive. It holds a positive rating from multiple platforms. The leading gaming platform PCWorld has rated this game 3.5 stars out of 5, which means this game has satisfied them, but it also lacks few qualities. If we talk about the average rating of the game, it is about 8/10, which is mind-blowing. Some people have complaints about this game, but the majority of gamers convinced that they have a great experience with the company of heroes 2.

Conclusion
Company of Heroes 2 is one of the best action games. It holds a great storyline of World War 2. Through this game, you will have a good action time. Most of the gamers are confused regarding the features of this game, so in this article, we have explained everything that is related to the Company of Heroes 2. A lot of information has been shared throughout this article.
A separate paragraph is also made in which we have explained the rating of the game.

Título: Dragon Quest XI: Echoes of an Elusive Age
Géneros: ['Action', 'Adventure', 'Multiplayer', 'RPG', 'JRPG', 'Turn-Based Combat', 'Singleplayer', 'Fantasy', 'Anime', 'Story Rich', 'Turn-Based', 'Open World', 'Colorful', 'Cartoony', 'Funny', 'Character Customization', 'Third Person', 'Dragons', 'Crafting', 'Sexual Content']
Comentario:
Dragon Quest XI est une pure merveille de JRPG à ne surtout pas passer à coté ! 
Graphiquement parlant il est magnifique et coté histoire j'ai adoré parcourir ce monde et suivre l’épopée de l'éclairé et de sa bande. 
Je recommande ce jeu a 100% ! Vous ne serez pas du tout déçu du voyage !

C'est un jeu que j'apprécie énormément. Il n'y a certes pas énormément de mini-jeux (entre 10 et 15 ?) mais ils sont tous amusants.
Il faut dans chaque mini jeu essayer d'obtenir le plus de pièces, d'émeraudes et de diamant, tout en restant en vie. Cela permet de passer de niveaux et de débloquer de nouveaux personnages ou objets.

Il y a aussi plusieurs modes de jeux, dont le mode chaos que j'apprécie beaucoup. Un mini-jeu commence et alors qu'il n'est pas encore fini, on passe à un autre pour y revenir plus tard, et ainsi de suite.

Il est possible de jouer en ligne et à plusieurs sur un même ordinateur, ce qui est particulièrement appréciable pour jouer entre amis.

Bref, ce n'est pas non plus un vrai coup de coeur ou un jeu extraordinaire, mais il vaut amplement son prix, du moins celui auquel je l'ai acheté (1.04€). C'est un petit jeu bien divertissant !

Descuento: No hay descuento para este juego :(

Título: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 Campaign Remastered
Descuento: No hay descuento para este juego :(
Comentario: MW2.... L'une des meilleures campagne de tout COD confondus. Le remaster est vraiment bien fait avec quelques nouvelles cinématiques, et des graphismes un peut plus poussés, on a le droit a plusieurs easter eggs ainsi que plusieurs mods a activer en retrouvant les objets cachés dans chaque missions. Mais malheureusement la franchise n'arrive toujours pas bien à remastériser ses jeux et ils ont bien fait de pas sortir de multi, les IA sont totalement débiles, malgré de meilleurs graphismes, on n'est pas au même niveau que MW2019, puis l'ambiance de jeu n'est plus la même, les musiques qui étaient poignante au moment de certaines missions et nous faisaient vraiment rentrer dans le jeu, ne le sont pas dans celui ci. Activision doit arrêter avec ses remaster, et la trilogie MW doit désormais rester qu'un bon souvenir

Comentario: As a lover of horror games and the cat and mouse gameplay of games like Outlast, I knew I had to play this game when I saw it and I'm so glad I did. While it may not be as long as some AAA titles, it possesses all of the quality of one. It's dark and atmospheric and genuinely places you in fear as you make your way through this mansion.

Although I had given up with first-person Adventure Games, this one's story intrigued me so I had even pre-ordered it and I didn't regret my choice. Apart from the good graphics and soundtrack (which is almost standard for nowadays quality games), the story was very intriguing. The progression in the game was smooth and the puzzles just as difficult as they should be. The ending also deserved every moment spent to play the game. Had it been a little bit longer, it would be 100/100.
Now waiting for a sequel (hopefully in 3rd person though)!

Bethesda a décidé de ruiner votre vie en sortant un fort joli coffret au contenu assez redoutable puisque vous y trouverez l'intégrale de la série, de Elder Scrolls Arena à Skyrim en passant par Oblivion et Morrowind. Et pour ne rien gâcher, le coffret embarque également tous les add-on de la franchise et des cartes papier des mondes que vous partirez explorer, le tout pour 30 euros +- . Il y a là de quoi passer le reste de votre vie scotché à votre PC. Sortie le 13 septembre.

Título: Need for Speed: Payback 2200 Speed Points

Comentario:
Ce jeu contient Eufloria HD + DLC SoundTrack + Eufloria. 
Le premier Eufloria n'est pas super bien équilibré, vous ne pourrez poser votre jeu que si la disposition de votre jeu est en votre faveur, la plupart des niveaux étant générés aléatoirement. Donc pas mal d'heures de perdues de tentatives, au bout de 28h je n'ai pas terminé le Eufloria 1 alors que seulement 14h m'ont permis de finir le Eufloria HD.

L'autre dernière différence c'est qu'on retrouve des "DLC" supplémentaire sur le Eufloria 1, notamment ce qu'ils appellent le "Community pack levels".

Le Eufloria HD est beaucoup plus agréable a jouer, avec des fonctionnalités supplémentaires qui sont indispensables mais qu'on ne retrouve pas dans le Eufloria 1, comme le "focus des seedlings vers telle planète".

En soi c'est un jeu unique, exceptionnel, je ne sais pas de par quelle imagination ils ont pu créer un jeu pareil. Les succès ont l'air un peu particulier, quelques challenges supplémentaires qui rallongent la durée de vie du jeu. Je remercie Vidéofus pour cette découverte

Géneros: ['Action', 'Racing', 'Xbox ONE Games', 'Massively Multiplayer', 'Open World', 'Driving', 'America', 'Offroad', 'Online Co-Op', 'Atmospheric', 'Singleplayer', 'First-Person', 'Team-Based', 'Sandbox', 'Family Friendly']
Comentario:
Let me start by saying that this game is the best at it's category until and for now. 

The GRAPHICS are top notch, making some landscapes very realistic. Making it seem more like a photo than a video game.
Optimised for high and low performance computers. I was able to play it comfortably on a low budget laptop.

The GAMEPLAY is easy enough to get the hang on and yet full and more complex than a normal racing game. Good enough to make you want to get back in the game even after months of absence.

The STORY is a fair one. Not too complicated, therefore easy to follow. But as an essential part of a game, the main story left me unsatisfied, waiting for more. Which it shouldn't. Therefore i give it a lower rating than the other 2.

Conclusion:
If you like racing games, this one is for you. There is no doubt. But as that - A racing game. You shouldn't expect a mind-blowing story because it focuses more on the experience of the gameplay.

Comentario: Un jeu assez surprenant au fort potentiel, prodigy se démarque de ses semblables par une stratégie de disposition originale, le choix de nos unités impacte notre style de jeu mais également la façon de jouer. Cependant, il a quelques défauts, temporaires car il n'a pas finit son évolution. Moins on a de monstres, plus il est difficile de nous tuer. Certains sont aussi bien trop avantagés comparés à d'autres. Un jeu à surveiller donc, pas à mettre entre toutes les mains du à sa lourdeur et sa lenteur ainsi qu'un manque clair de dynamisme assumé.

Comentario:
Parece un proyecto cancelado de PS3 ( animaciones y gráficos ) 
La IA pasa de ser inútil a ser eficiente hasta el punto de detectarte detrás de coberturas ( paredes, coches, etc...)
La historia ( para mi gusto ) no termina de "engancharme"
La jugabilidad es un poco tosca ( y las horribles animaciones de andar agachado no ayuda )
Es un juego de sigilo pero no tienes "ejecuciones" como tal. Te acercas por detrás y te lías a porrazos con una palanca contra el enemigo al que quieres matar en "Sigilo" ( rezando para que no escuchen el estropicio los demás )
Una IA que te va hablando ingame no parara de spamearte: Warning Enemy Approaching!! ( cada 10 secs mas o menos siempre que estes cerca de un enemigo ) Lo cual es irritante ya que el spam es eterno en zonas con fuerte vigilancia

RESUMEN: El juego esta muy poco pulido,las mecánicas se sienten muy toscas y tiene errores que, de no parchease, harán que el juego sea una penitencia mas que una experiencia futurista.

Pro: Spielsucht garantiert wie bei Alien isolation - man versucht da nur noch rauszukommen.
düsterer Sound - unheimliche futuristische Atmosphere - komische Geräusche- versucht das mal Nachts zu spielen.
Grafik ist okay - Story dünn , aber genug um weiter zu machen.
sehr unheimliche dunkle Raumschiffareale - zu schnelle Bewegungen können Aufmerksamkeit dieser Wesen auf sich ziehen 
Negativ: Missiongoals zu Arteriosklerosemässig gehe Deck 3 besorg dir dies; geh Deck 2 mach das; wiederholt sich zu sehr. Gibt paar Stellen wo das Leveling unfein zu des Spielers Ungunsten ausgelegt ist wie zb. Fahrstuhlstelle zu Deck 2 von einem fast unsterblichen Turbomutanten bewacht. Zum Glück gibts Youtubewalkthroughs. Kein Happyending und man hätte aus dem Ende mehr Story für einen Nachfolger rausholen können.
Zitat: Wenn auch technisch nicht ausgereift gleiche Spannung wie Alien isolation , Dead Space und System Shock - unbedingt empfehlenswert.

Bioware sin duda ha alcanzado el cúlmine de la saga de Dragon Age en este juego (por ahora, aún quedan por venir más) ya que combina lo mejor de DAO (sistema de combate y el número de decisiones) con lo mejor de DA2 (elecciones por personalidad y cámara táctica de combate).

La historia, si bien simple y clara, se desarrolla a buen ritmo y con giros sin perder de vista las historias personales de los compañeros, que son igual de interesantes y que tienen un impacto en la relación que tienen con el protagonista. La historia es más similar a la de DAO, por lo que es claro que están volviendo a sus raíces. Pero no os engañéis, tiene mucho más micro-historias, dobles verdades y mitología de lo que primeramente se ve. Los escritores han hecho un gran trabajo, especialmente con cierto personaje.

Los personajes son increíbles, mucho mejores que sus antecesores, y con una variedad muy interesante, incluso en gusto por romance, lo que los hace estar mejor construidos y darles un punto más veraz. Los banters entre ellos son diversos, aunque me habría gustado que hubiera más, ya que saltan cada 20min aproximadamente y es mucho tiempo. Los romances con ellos son interesantes, emocionan y divierten. Lo bueno es que tus compañeros pueden enamorarse entre sí si no haces romance con ellos, lo cual añade una profundidad a la historia y a la realidad de la misma (no todos los PJ tienen que estar enamorados del protagonista).

El modo de combate está muy mejorado, es divertido y tiene una cámara táctica como en DA2, lo cual permite dar órdenes a los compañeros de manera más sencilla o, si nos gusta la estrategia, pues más clara. Siguen las combinaciones de poderes entre clases, así como la especialización de la clase del protagonista. Lo bueno de la especialización es que podemos "probarla" antes ya que cada compañero es un ejemplo de su clase. (Ejemplo: Cole, Sera y Varric son pícaros; Cole = asesino, Sera = Tempestad, Varric = Artífice).

El ambiente es de los más hermosos y mejores que he visto, están muy detallados y muy conseguidos. Hay lugares donde dan ganas de perderse y quedarse solo observando el lugar. Además, hay mucha variedad: desde páramos helados, a bosques, llanuras, pantanos y desiertos (cada uno de ellos desatando banters al respecto por parte de los compañeros de equipo). Los mapas son abiertos y libres de ser explorados, además de grandes, posiblemente "The Hinterlands" (primer mapa) sera el más grande y tedioso de todos.

La música es una delicia, un poco repetitiva en el estilo, pero cuidada y tratada con mimo. Me encanta el cambio de música en Orlais con su toque "francés" y las canciones de taverna.

Un juego 100% recomendable, una pedazo de obra maestra del RPG!

Título: The Inner World - The Last Wind Monk

Comentario:
We have played this franchise for several generations backward, and Koei Tecmo and Omega Force have decided to try something new with the "Dynasty Warriors 9". In this latest review of the war of the three epic realities, developers have chosen an adventure in an open world in which players can explore ancient China and participate in key battles and witness the crucial moments of a significant era.

If you are a veteran of "Dynasty Warriors" games in any respect, you will notice the familiar elements of the story. Either way, an open world for one player is full of surprises, depending on how you watch it. Only its existence adds a lot of unprecedented shades of gaming, most of which are optional. However, in this part of "Dynasty Warriors," there is much more that you can do than any previous part, and the game also attracts players by having a large number of RPG elements.

Ready Set Hunt!

You will be caressing, lying, cooking and collecting things. Every secondary shootout happens for resources. The items you collect, the animals you hunt and the fish you catch will allow you to make objects and weapons; Cooking meals improves your skills and gives you the chance to earn XP. Of course, you do not have to do any of this to progress through the game. These activities are there only to build your character, and your concern can depend on the campaign and the stories of the person you choose. However, if all these additions were measured on an RPG scale, they would not be worth much because everything is largely lacking in comprehensiveness. Every secondary task is nothing more than going to an object, unless it's about helping your allies get to the main campaign in the campaign. Those who give you tasks and goals themselves are nothing special, nothing worth remembering. They are here to get XP points, prey and (in some cases) to help you learn about the world and how it works. Each side trip serves to help you prepare for great battles.

Then, there is a research, a function that is almost completely new in this franchise. In the typical "Warriors" game, you never really stop to look around. In "Dynasty Warriors 9", the game itself invites you to do just that. When you feel you need a break from fighting and collecting items, you can deal with the viewing of rich environments. Since all of China is accessible to you, you will find yourself in different environments. However, although the open world is relatively beautiful, do not expect to present China in its true light. At first glance, your environment within the game is worth the research. The more you study it, you will be less interesting until you find a new ecosystem. The size of the world in "Dynasty Warriors 9" is, however, impressive, and Omega Force deserves applause for making the world that so easily fits the rural, mountainous and bamboo forest areas. What simply misses the game is less blurry frames.

The Three Kingdoms

Improved graphics can be seen where needed - characters look great. They're not perfect, but they're great. Particular attention has been devoted to the details of all our three Kingdoms heroes. We can very easily say that the characters have the most details in the whole game, and if you are a veteran of the fractions, this can provide you with real pleasure. What makes the game even more impressive is the size of the character set. Developers have once again expanded the list, so the game now has over 83 unique characters. Even worth mentioning to soldiers too. Though you will massacre hundreds, if not thousands, of the same faces, we can not deny that their models have been upgraded, especially with regard to armor that very well reflects the illumination of the world. These details help you forget everything else during the fight, and, to be honest, fighting is what counts. Fighting the "Dynasty Warriors 9" will compensate for some of the gaps in the game. Bending between Lui Bei, Lu Bu, and Zhou Yu, we noticed sharp animations and unique sets of movements, all of which have the same purpose: killing waves by the wave of enemy hulls.

In addition, developers have expanded the battle from previous parts by implementing new stunts, bumps, and counter-attacks. Counterattacks function as in Arkham Rocksteady games, but this similarity to this game ends. When you start killing your enemies, each ability can ease chain combinations of attacks and flowing movements that seem to last for an entire eternity, and in the middle of a thrilling sea of martial arts, you will discover the soul of this game. You may also notice that the sound design is different for each weapon. If it's blunt, the feedback is dull, and if it's a sword, you'll hear the sound of metal, and so on.

Is that your voice Oh brave warrior?!

However, the sound is another problem in the "Dynasty Warriors 9".I am not talking about the ambiance of the environment or the conflict of soldiers, but i am specifically referring to the lending of votes. "Dynasty Warriors 9," tells your story by interlacing the inserts and dialogs in real time (preferring insert). For both of you, you will frown on the characters and their choice of dialogue. This is a joke full of surprises because behind some of the heroes there are good actors, and behind some of them not really. In many unfortunate cases, decisive warriors will excite threats in a faint voice. This is not helped even by the fact that some parts of the written dialogue are simply poor. However, if i need to sort out a good versus bad dialogue, i would say that dialogue, taking into account everything, can pass.

The fact is that "Dynasty Warriors 9" functions as an experiment. This is Omega Force's first attempt to make an open world title, and although every aspect of this game is not great, it still represents a package that provides more where it needs and which, in its essence, retains and improves the original H & S (Hack & Slash) experience. When i found myself in a situation that some of my tasks were dead, i would have skipped it and headed straight to the battlefield. Since boring parts are mostly optional, they are not completely negative. At the same time, i was completely impressed when i realized that all the items you collect and all the sites you discover stay in one place between the campaigns, between the characters, and between the kingdoms. The continuity resulting therewith facilitates progression and allows players to easily approach the main aspect of the game: campaign campaigns, the completion of which allows access to unique characters on the huge list. 

Reviewer: Michael UG

Rate:8/10

Título: Ghost Recon: Future Soldier Season Pass

Comentario:
Alors Ara Fell, qu'est-ce donc ? 
C'est un jeu fait avec RPG maker par un développeur de talent qui a compris ce que les joueurs attendent de ce genre de jeux et qui sait aussi utiliser RPG maker à la perfection.
Donc c'est le style consoles jrpg avec une histoire bien écrite et des personnages intéressants. Je ne sais pas trop quoi en dire d'autre car il faut y jouer.
Ca se passe dans un monde magique qui flotte au dessus des nuages, et bien sûr ce petit monde idyllique est menacé par une bande de vampires qui veulent le détruire. Bref... C'est le point de départ et l'histoire est brodée autour.
La difficulté est bien dosée, pour un jeu rpg maker les graphismes sont très réussis, les dialogues et les caractères des personnages aussi. Bref, il n'y a que du bon. Je ne vois rien de négatif à en dire et en plus il n'est pas cher
Je recommande très vivement.

Now waiting for a sequel (hopefully in 3rd person though)!

Géneros: ['Adventure', 'RPG', 'Indies', 'Atmospheric', 'Story Rich', 'Choices Matter', 'Romance', 'Drama', 'Relaxing', 'Cinematic', 'Casual', 'Singleplayer', 'Walking Simulator', 'Beautiful', 'Time Travel', 'Third Person', 'Puzzle', 'Short', 'Point & Click']
Comentario:
Last Day Of June est une belle épopée temporelle, puisqu’il s’agit ici de sauver sa bien-aimé via un système d’effet papillon, qui demandera de résoudre divers énigmes avec plusieurs personnages. 

La durée de vie est éphémère, 3 heures environ. C’est très peu, mais honnêtement, ça suffit amplement pour cette mini aventure. Je ne me serais pas vu continuer sur ce gameplay assez répétitif et souffrant de lenteur plus longtemps. 

Cependant, on peut dire que cette histoire est très jolie, avec une fin vraiment touchante, avec une belle patte graphique cela dit en passant.

Une merveille graphique pour cette réédition d'un des bijou de la SEGA Master System!!!

Comentario:
Je vais faire court : Ne l'achetez pas :)
Beaucoup trop bien vendu par la comm', ce jeu est très laid visuellement, les zombies ont un comportement... indescriptible. Certes, le but est de s'en servir, mais quand chaque team possède une horde de zombies et les fait se fracasser, je vous promet un show improbable.
Clairement, il faut que les devs fassent progresser l'ensemble du jeu, il ne vaut pas du tout son prix, même au prix avantageux d'IG.
Passez votre chemin, et préférez Killing Floor 2 :)

Comentario: Bon on va être direct: ça n'est aucunement Red Dead Redemption 2. C'est Wild West Online, un MMO en multijoueur typé RPG qui se déroule à l'époque du Far West. Bien qu'actuellement en accès anticipé et disponible via le site officiel, cette première monture de ce WWO est quelque peu vide actuellement. Mais c'est qu'un EA. Donc, le jeu est appelé à évoluer. J'ai pris le pack ''TOWNIE'' mais vous pouvez aussi choisir un pack un peu plus gros. J'attends de voir l'évolution de ce jeu qui, graphiquement sympa (un vrai bonheur de parcourir les plaines à cheval). Le jeu est actuellement limité mais ça n'en est qu'au début et ce que j'en ai vu jusqu'à présent me semble très prometteur. Dommage qu'une campagne solo soit inexistante mais ce genre de jeu a le mérite de rappeler quelques classiques qui ont fait la marque de Rockstar par son monde ouvert gigantesque. Je mettrais à jour ma critique au fil des mises à jour de l'EA.

Géneros: ['Action', 'Adventure', 'Xbox ONE Games', 'Open World', 'Post-apocalyptic', 'Driving', 'Survival', 'Singleplayer', 'Third Person', 'Exploration', 'Atmospheric', 'Story Rich', 'Third-Person Shooter', 'Sandbox', 'Shooter', 'Sci-fi', 'First-Person']
Comentario:
There's a good reason why the new Mad Max game occasionally resembles this year's Mad Max: Fury Road: it's a canonical prequel that pits you against Scabrous Scrotus--son of the film's sinister Immortan Joe. Mad Max's wasteland is greasy and dusty, a place where mechanical monstrosities clash against the natural beauty of the desert. You play the part of Max, an unfortunate wanderer with a troubling past. You charge across open roads in search of redemption, running over those who stand in your way. Driving is central to life in the wasteland, and it's the basis for the game's best moments, too. The combination of an intriguing world and great car combat make Mad Max an occasional joy to play, but shallow ground combat and a handful of other missteps ultimately drive the game off the road.

Spent over 15 hours exploring the dangerous yet beautiful world of Mad Max, completing the story mode and looking for cars to blow up just for the fun of it.

Ce jeu est une agréable balade dans un monde étrange et beau. On apprécie l'imagination et le soin apporté à l'ambiance. Calme et surprenant, il convient aux joueurs souhaitant explorer un univers sorti d'un rêve. Si au contraire vous cherchez à vous défoulez un bon coup ce jeu risque de vous décevoir.

Insgesamt bin ich mit Conarium nicht warm geworden. Die Story finde ich persönlich nicht fesselnd, es ist alles nichts neues oder unvorhersehbares. Dagegen fand ich das Gameplay mit Rätseln und erkunden deutlich besser. Gute Mischung. Die Rätsel sind insgesamt machbar, nicht zu leicht oder extrem schwer. Was mir am besten gefallen hat, ist die Grafik. Schöner Stil, Beleuchtung und Orte. Der Tag bzw Genre Horror passt hier nicht wirklich. Kein richtiges Gruselspiel. Klar gibt es paar Jumpscares, aber die sind eher nur am Anfang und aus dem Horror wird laufe der Zeit ein Abenteuer Game. Gerade für den Vollpreis nicht zu empfehlen. Da die Spielzeit ca. 4 Stunden beträgt. Es gibt zwar ein zweites Ende, aber dafür lohnt es sich nicht es nochmal zu spielen. Man kann es gut mit speichern und neuladen sehen..ohne viel Schnick Schnack.

Das Konzept des Spiels ist meiner Meinung nach sehr gut angesetzt, es ist so Action reich wie es im Trailer gezeigt wird und mach auch alleine sehr viel Spaß.
Selbstverständlich ist dann das dass Spiel in einer Gruppe wesentlich mehr Spaß macht.
Anfangs ziehmlich leicht, doch von Zeit zu Zeit werden Mission wesentlich anspruchsvoller als sie am Anfang sind, was zwar Sinn macht, aber auch hier wieder sehr gut umgesetzt wurde. Auf High-Level mehrere Missionsziele Gleichzeitig erfüllen etc.

La infelicidad de Mousecraft con su matrimonio hizo que buscase la compañía de otros, intimando algunas veces con Queso, aunque su preferido era Chedar. Hefesto fue informado del adulterio que su esposa mantenía con Queso por ellos. Planeó entonces atraparlos con una red de cadenas invisibles que había dispuesto sobre el lecho, capaz de inmovilizarlos. Ares sabía que Hefesto retornaría al hogar al salir el sol, así es que prevenidamente o casi, dispuso de su secuaz favorito, Ratón, para que le avisara. Pero Ratón se quedó dormido. Efectivemón, el sol salió, y las redes cayeron sobre Queso y Mousecraft «en plena ocasión», y quedaron inmóviles. Hefesto enfurecido llamó a todos los demás dioses olímpic de lyon para burlarse de Helios («las diosas se quedaron en casa, todas por vergüenza»); y contrariamente las burlas cayeron sobre Hefesto: algunos dioses adoraron la belleza de Mousecraft, otros comentaron que con gusto tomarían el lugar de Queso. Hefesto no los liberó hasta que Parmesano le prometiera que Queso pagara desagravios, pero ambos escaparon tan pronto como levantó la facebook y no mantuvieron su promesa. Queso convirtió a Puigdemon en gallo, para que nunca más se quedara dormido o casi.

Comentario: il est efficace dans ce qu'il propose : un gameplay accrocheur et des effets visuels dans tous les sens. Comentario: During my time playing Dragon Age: Origins, I found myself getting lost in time. Time would pass me by and I wouldn't even notice. The game is old, yes but that doesn't deminish what it brings to the table! An RPG with an Amazing story and Character building that really places this high on my list of Best Games. I have played and completed this game several times and each time I play through it I find something new or read information that "Clicks" from a former playthrough and amazes me. One thing that really made me fall in love with this game are the Conversations that occur when traveling with you party! Randomly the characters will start to chat or tell a story And EACH and EVERY time I stop what I'm doing and just listen. It always captures my attention and leaves me laughing or in awe. By far one of the best parts of the game! <3 If you are looking for a Solid RPG that you can chill through and enjoy, You can't beat this.

Comentario: Le deuxième volait de Five Nights at Freddy's un jeux ou l'on retrouve nos animatronics préféré et aussi les nouveaux dans ce jeux la difficulté a beaucoup augmenté et ça donne un défis au joueurs d'essayer de passer les six nuits tout seul

Parcourez de long en large le Japon féodal & ses batailles de clans historiques !

A travers les membres du clan Sanada & plus de 60 officiers jouables, vous avancerez sur des conflits en temps réels, vivrez des batailles épiques.

La destinée du clan Sanada est retracée sur des faits réel & historiques, bien sûr romancé pour une bonne touche d'action & rendre le scénario exaltant.

Quelques nouveautés comme le "Stratagème" fait son apparition permettant au joueur de déclencher des événements scriptés lors des batailles ( lancer des attaques surprises , faire appel à des assassins...).

L'exploration est aussi de mise avec des objectifs, items à gagnés pour des améliorations de nos officiers, XP etc..

Le village des Sanada servant de base, évolue au fil du temps, s'agrandissant & proposant de multiples activités ( quêtes, pêche, agriculture, entrainement, forgeron etc ).

Pour faire cour, c'est un bon Beat'em All & un très bon "Musô" pour les amateurs du genre, on se défoule bien en faisant des batailles épiques, tout en avançant sur une histoire & une campagne intéressante.

Je recommande !

Descuento: No hay descuento para este juego :(
Comentario:
In schnellen Multiplayer-Gefechten, die selten länger als fünfzehn Minuten in Anspruch nehmen, stehen sich 24 Spieler in zwei Teams gegenüber. Unseren Kahn steuern wir ganz simpel über WASD. In vier Stufen bestimmen wir den Vortrieb, links und rechts geht's stufenlos. Ganz simpel also - und dann doch wieder nicht. Schiffe sind mehr wütende Nashörner als Sportwagen. Richtungsänderungen oder Haltewünsche wollen früh genug vorausgedacht werden, sonst geht's geradewegs auf die nächste Sandbank. Selbst World-of-Tanks-Spieler, deren Tiger-Kampfpanzer auch nicht gerade die Fahrleistungen eines Ferrari bieten, müssen sich daran erst gewöhnen.
Stets gilt die Faustregel: je dicker desto träger. Leicht gepanzerte, wendige Zerstörer manövrieren die gigantischen Schlachtschiffe einfach aus und jagen ihnen aus kurzer Distanz Torpedos in den Rumpf. Die Ozeanriesen, die an Feuerkraft und Panzerung jeder anderen Schiffsklasse überlegen sind, benötigen deshalb Geleitschutz durch Kreuzer, die einen guten Kompromiss aus Feuerkraft und Agilität bieten. Ihre kräftigen Luftabwehrgeschütze halten außerdem den Luftraum sauber.

Flugzeugträger besitzen selbst keine Geschütze und sind deshalb voll auf die Unterstützung ihrer Teamkameraden angewiesen. Dafür sind ihre Torpedobomber der Schrecken jedes Schiffkommandanten - aktuell sind die Träger sogar noch etwas zu stark, sodass das Können der jeweiligen Spieler oft über Sieg oder Niederlage entscheidet. Hier sollte Wargaming noch etwas am Balancing schrauben. Die Stärken und Schwächen der vier Schiffsklassen greifen aber schon jetzt perfekt ineinander.

Auf U-Boote müssen wir übrigens verzichten. Die Unterwasser-Jäger seien an der Wasseroberfläche vollkommen schutzlos und abgetaucht für Teamgefechte nutzlos, so die offizielle Begründung. Ganz ähnlich könnte man aber auch gegen die Implementation der Flugzeugträger argumentieren, die doch ganz hervorragend funktioniert. Für die Zukunft hoffen wir also, dass Wargaming diese Entscheidung nochmal überdenkt, schließlich wissen wir nicht erst seit »Das Boot« oder den Silent-Hunter-Spielen, welchen Nervenkitzel das Duell Zerstörer gegen U-Boot bietet.

Géneros: ['Adventure', 'Simulation', 'Mac', 'Linux', 'Indies', 'Cyberpunk', 'Visual Novel', 'Pixel Graphics', 'LGBTQ+', 'Dystopian', 'Story Rich', 'Point & Click', 'Choices Matter', 'Female Protagonist', 'Memes', 'Casual', 'Transhumanism', 'Life Sim', '2D', 'Anime', 'Cute', 'Funny', 'Sci-fi']
Comentario:
"Time to mix drinks and change lives"

Va11 Hall-A nos sitúa en una distópica ciudad futurista con estética Cyberpunk, todos los hechos y la historia nos llega a traves de Jill, la camarera del bar apodado "Vallhalla".

Como en toda novela visual, leer es la parte más importante del juego, por lo que si no eres mucho de leer párrafos y párrafos de texto, olvídate, porque este juego es un 90% lectura. Dicho esto, si te gusta leer y seguir una historia que te mantenga enganchado, este es tu juego, incluso al principio de este nos recomiendan coger unos snacks, algo para beber y que nos pongamos cómodos.
Por esta parte, de lo que voy de juego ninguna queja, historia interesante, personajes bien escritos y una camarera aun mejor.

El gameplay/jugabilidad, pasando al apartado de la jugabilidad no hay mucho que decir, tienes la mecánica principal de servir bebidas, con las que igual tienes que "experimentar" un poco para encontrar la correcta pero no tiene demasiado misterio.

La musica es sublime,además de que el juego tiene un porrón de canciones sobre las que elegir, la gran mayoría son obras maestras, la gran mayoría pegan con el ambiente del juego, cabe destacar que las canciones fueron compuestas exclusivamente para el juego, lo cual no siempre se ve en juegos indie así y para mejorarlo aún, puedes elegir cuales suenan y en que orden (incluso pudiendo controlar el saltarse una canción o volver hacia otra in-game).

Visualmente el juego destaca, ese estilo de arte pixel art con inclinación al anime le da un toque bastante interesante y agradable a la vista. 

Y no se si tengo mucho más que decir, pero bueno, el juego es muy bueno, y por el precio que está aquí creo que es una compra casi obligada.

Un saludo!

Sincèrement je suis déçu des développeur qui pourrais faire une mise a jour, mais non, il n'en font pas, donc tous ce qui on ce problème qui le note sur steam comme sa les développeur pourront voir que le jeu ne marche pas pour certaine personne, merci d'avoir lue ce message.

Título: Dragon Quest VIII: Journey of the Cursed King 3DS
Comentario:
Ya en su momento éste fue uno de los mejores RPG's de su generación, un imprescindible de PS2 que hizo de Dragon Quest una saga con el reconocimiento que merecía fuera de Japón. Ahora imagina el mismo juego, extenso, desafiante, repleto de personajes carismáticos, ¡pero con aún más opciones! Nuevos monstruos, nuevos episodios, ¡y todo en un atractivo formato portátil! Sólo a cambio de un ligero sacrificio gráfico y sonoro.

Es un título que, en poco tiempo, ha desaparecido de muchas tiendas, así que si buscas por internet lo más probable es que lo encuentres al doble de su precio oficial o incluso más (así funciona la especulación, por desgracia). Afortunadamente, si no te importa tenerlo en formato digital y puedes liberar algo de espacio en tu tarjeta SD, tienes ante ti la mejor opción posible actualmente. Sea como sea, no te puedes perder este grandísimo clásico de los RPG's.

Ben je klaar met het enorme Wildlands, dan biedt deze uitbreiding een echt nieuwe uitdaging, maar helaas wel op bekend terrein.

Título: Call of Duty: Black Ops II Digital Deluxe Edition
Comentario:
EDIT: I didn't excpect to make this review and make it the most popular review I made, but what ever, its the top of a super popular game over all the other reviews that actually review the game.

First thing is that you are here to see a review for the MULTIPLAYER and not the SINGLEPLAYER, (Campaign) there are way better games for that. The main reason I got this is because I always loved killing people and getting those radical killstreaks. Not for the campaign, but for the multiplayer. If you are here for the campaign, leave, campaign is about 6 hours long, and there is a lot better games for that, like Far Cry 4, got lots of hours in that for singleplayer only game time. If you are here for multiplayer, then get your wallet ready!

Some FAQ:

Q: Do people still play?
A: Yes, at certain times and places. Where I am i can get a game quick from 10am to 10pm (West Coast, USA)

Q: Is it worth full price? ($60)
A: No, I did not get it for full price, why should you. Buy on sale or through trading. (Key Trading bots/people)

Q: Should I use my controler?
A: No, you will cry cause you get 0 kills.

Q: Can I read?
A: Yes.

Q: Are you just making up questions to make this review longer?
A: Yes.

Q: Why?
A: Why not? Plus I can't think of them, so ask away!

Review for each part of the game:

Campaign-
No, get other games, its fun but to short.

Multiplayer-

Better then most other CoDs. MW2 I own, to many hackers. MW2 being a good CoD.
This game is one of the best and still has a strong community of people that make it hacker less. 
I also own AW, its bad, and now 0 people are play, #2MuchDLC. 
Worth the buy if it was just for this.

Zombies-
Its another fun game, fun by youself and with others!
Different from most zombie games.

Other Pros/Cons

Pros-
-You get 3 games in your Library
-You only have to download the part of the game you want to play, so less space used!
-Not many hackers! Always a good thing

Cons-
-So much paid DLC; a Gun thats super amazinly good, maps that I would like to play, skins. What is this CS:GO? Paying for skins is so CoD, oh wait.
-Less 8 year olds, I like to talk to them, there fun to mess around with
-Sadly no price drop, unlike MW2 and such old games.

So overall well worth the money for the Multiplayer/Zombies!

Original that made me famous:
Still better then Call of Duty: Ghost
Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare and 
Call of Duty: Black Ops 3 combined!

I feel ashamed for this game. 
They tried to copy Banjo&Kazooie's style (I think we all bought it for that reason), but they failed miserably.
This game is boring, enemies are retarded, levels are big and full of nothing, dialogues are embarrassing, the protagonists and main characters are flat and without personality. Minigames are worthless... The music sounds like a pitiful remake of Banjo's soundtracks.
I don't like a single thing of this game.
What a waste of money.

Im allgemeinen ist diese Erweiterung sehr gut.

Wie unten schon erwähnt ist das DLC für seinen Preis echt überteuert, da eigentlich nur Polizei Autos hinzugefügt werden.

Außerdem ist diese Erweiterung nicht realistisch z.B.: haben alle Amerikanischen Polizei Autos auf der Seite stehen was sie sind (Sheriff, Highway Patrol u.s.w) und man kann nicht einfach so random andere Spieler anhalten. Man kann auch nicht auswählen für welche Abteilung man fährt.

Außerdem wird nicht erklärt was genau der sinn ist mit einen Cop-Auto einfach so durch die Gegend zu fahren da man wie oben erwähnt keine anderen Spieler anhalten kann.

Wenn einen das ganze nicht stört ist das DLC ziemlich gut :D
(Entschuldigung für Rechtschreibfehler)
